case.state: ....Hey, do they let cows into this bar? There was one waiting in line to get in.
Hey, I think those bouncers over there are the same ones that worked for Club Titiboo! Hope no dog-like dudes were trying to get in here.
"The Inventory", huh? That name's kinda cool, actually. Short 'n sweet.
Heh, that ol' blacksmith Bronson woulda loved havin' a bar right on the beach! Guess I'll just have to enjoy it for 'em!
I love sun bathing as much as the next guy, but it's nice to have a lil' shade, too! I'd rather not fry like bacon out here, ya know?
Someone needs to go tell that sun-bathing pig over there to be careful. Too much sun, and he'll fry!
Just look at the sun shinin' on the waves...! I've seen a lot of things on my travels, but nothin' compares to the sea!
I don't see any Oxygen Machines around here, 'n trust me, those fishy dudes stand out. Hope everyone can swim!
So this is a "classroom", huh? Back home on the Nowhere Islands, you just had your parents teach ya things.
This Inventory place even has classrooms?! That's crazy! I mean, I think it's supposed to be weird. Tazmily didn't even have a school to begin with.
Naked hijinks on the roof, huh? Sure, why not? At least we get a pretty nice view from up here.
Playin' roof poker, are we? No problems here! I like the outside air.
This'll be fun! I say we all dunk whoever loses first!
I'm not a fan of the way chlorine stinks, but swimmin' is always a good time! Unless you take a dive in a trash pond.
Hoo boy, it's steamy in here! They must want you to strip quickly, huh? Take too long, 'n you'll pass out.
...This is a real hot spring, right? I haven't eaten any mushrooms since TaneTane Island, but I can't help but be paranoid. I still remember the stink of that trash dump...
Oh man... It's hot as hell! Wearin' this hoodie was bad idea. I'm already gettin' flushed...
It sure is a lot bigger than a Magypsy's seashell house, but the decor is gaudy and fancy just like theirs. Makes me miss 'em...
Livin' the high life in here, ain't we? I wonder if there's any eclairs around here. It'd be nice to know what they taste like when they ain't rotten.
Okay, I don't know what's goin' on with all these decorations, but those presents are callin' my name! Maybe some magic pudding is in 'em!
Score! There's an obvious, suspicious pile of highly-visible presents under a suspicious, highly-visible tree!
Perfect! A pretty, pristine, polished and posh purple room! ...What? Somethin' on my face, ~player~ ?
Gee, I wonder what the room designer's favorite color was. Better than neon green, I guess.
...Really? We're gonna play a strippin' game out here? I ain't shy, but this feels just embarassin'.
Okay, who's the idiot who came up with this idea? If any of those slobberin' onlookers come near me, I'm freezin' em solid.
~player~. This idea stinks. It really, really stinks. Stinks like a pile of sentient sewer puke. It reeks, even.
Cozy! I see you're not one for decoration, ~player~. Me too! As long as I have a place to sleep, I'm happy.
Bold of you to host a game like this in your own room, ~player~. You expectin' somethin' to happen afterwards?
I've been in haunted castles before, and I've been in dangerous forests, too. I figure I can handle the two mashed together.
...I don't think buidlin' a poker bar near a forest crawling with ghosts was the best idea. Luckily for you, I know a thing or two about kicking butt.
An arcade, huh? I didn't like the one in New Pork City, but... This place probably isn't built over a sewer like that one.
I'll admit that I was kinda curious about the games in the last one I was in... You mind playin' one with me, ~player~?
So this is what an actual city looks like, huh? Whoa...
It's weird seein' a big city like this, and it's not all cardboard. I'm likin' this view...
...Alright, listen. I'm not into cheesy lovey-dovey stuff, but... This view is kinda romantic, ain't it?

Hello, ~player.ifMale(sir|ma'am)~! What can I get you? Nothing goes better with strip poker than some Big City Cola!
*giggle*

Welcome to the Inventory, ~player.ifMale(sir|ma'am)~! Can I offer you something to eat? Maybe quench your thirst?
*giggle*

Hi! It's always nice to see a refined ~player.ifMale(gentleman|lady)~ such as yourself at the Inventory! May I take your order?
*giggle*
Oh, hey Nord! I'm happy to be playin' with ya, but I'm not gonna step on you, so stop askin' me.
Look who it is! 'Sup, Nord? This is gonna fun! I'm not gonna step on ya, though. Hate to burst your bubble.

Good to see ya again, ~player~.
...What? Somethin' on my face? It's like you've never seen the ultimate life form before.

Player~! Yo! Check this out this getup! I hear people are wearin' scary stuff right now... and it doesn't get more scary than an ultimate chimera!
(Chirp!)
Yo. The name's Kumatora. We gettin' this thing started, or what?
Your name's ~player~, huh? Nice to meetcha'! Now, let's get ya naked!
You better watch yourself, ~player~! You're playin' with royalty!

...What in the hell are you wearin', ~larachel~? Have you finally lost it?
...Not that you weren't weird before.
Oh no. Her few remaining marbles have left this mortal coil
Ha! Looks like we got another pink-haired firecracker! I dunno if this table can handle both of us.
Whoa! You kinda look the way I did back when I was a lil' runt. You got the same fire in your eyes, too!
...Who are you? Somethin' about that look in your eye makes my gut twist up.
Lemme give you some advice, ~player~. She is not your friend. There's no life in those eyes of hers.
I dunno what your deal is, but you're givin' me some serious, slimey Fassad vibes, lady. I'm keepin' my eye on you.
"L'arachel". Yeesh, even your name sounds stuck up, lady.
Oh boy, here we go. She kinda reminds me of how... pompous the Magypsies can be.
Man, could ya not be so loud, lady? You're gonna make my eardrums bleed if ya talk like that all game!
Whoa. I'm gettin' some real weird vibes from this chick, ~player~. Ya sure invitin' her is a good idea?
Okay, I'm just gonna be straight with you, ~player~. Seein' this girl made my stomach twist, and it's not 'cause she's cute. Be careful invitin' her.
~player~. I have PSI powers, which are psychic in nature. This chick is givin' me the willies. It's like she's lookin' straight through us. Do we have to have her here?
I've got a good feeling about you, Amy... You seem like a fun time. You've got a good eye, ~player~.
There's somethin' about the combo of red hair and glasses that's doin' it for me. Good choice, ~player~!
...You're joking, right? We're not actually about to play with... this, are we?
~Player~, I'm gonna be blunt: Playin' poker with this... thing is something we're gonna have to carry for the rest of our lives. Is it worth it?
Awww, don't you look like the sweetest girl who ever lived? That band-aid tells me you're not afraid of a little danger.
Hey there! You seem like the nicest girl on the planet, but that bandage tells me you're tough, too! Nice to meet ya!
(Oh geez...! I thought I was done with killer robot maids...)

Ack! Uh, something in my throat, sorry.
(If she whips out some giant scissors, I'm outta here. Don't wanna go through that again...)

...Hey there.
(Why? Why a robot maid? Why here? Why? Some higher power is probably just laughin' at me. Bastard.)
...I'd normally find meetin' an alien to be excitin' or whatever, but... there's something different about this guy, ~player~. Makes my head throb when I look at 'em...
Out of everyone you could've picked, you went with a freaky-lookin' alien, ~player~? Makin' eye contact with 'em is givin' me a headache...
What kinda hocus-pocus are you talkin' about, Miku? Nintendo? Switch?
The more, the merrier! Let's get this table filled already!
Hey, nice to meet cha'! Hope you don't mind gettin' naked.
Come and have a seat at our table! Or don't, since this place doesn't seem to give us chairs.
Yeah, yeah, welcome and all that. Get your butt over here so we can get started already!
We're gonna be makin' memories here tonight, you know. Let's try to make 'em good ones.
Yeah, that's be pretty scummy to bring someone here 'n they didn't know that...

condition.saying: A table full of pink-haired badasses

case.state: It's the best kind of type to have, if ya ask me. You've got good taste, ~player~.
It's pretty flatterin', honestly. I'm touched, ~player~!
...Yo, are we playin' with that Butterfly over there, or is it just here to help refresh people post-nut?
Hey, there's a magic butterfly over there! Those little dudes are so helpful, restorin' your PP for the entire party! My PSI is all maxed out right now, though.
A talkin' butterfly ain't all that weird. I mean, I've met a magical Butterfrog before, flyin' with fairy wings. That was a weird day.
...Fine. Don't say I didn't warn you. Don't come cryin' to me when you feel the weight of your sins crushin' your spine.

Sigh...
I was hopin' to make some new memories that I'd remember for a long time... but not like this.

I'm lookin' forward to gettin' to know you better! Maybe we'll be best friends-
And she's gone.

I've got a good feelin' about you, Frisk. Maybe you'd like to meet some of the folks back home-
...She left. Did I scare her off?
Y'know what? I'm callin' you Sunshine, lady. Seems fittin', right?
I'm bein' slapped around by inspiration, lady, 'n it's tellin' me to call ya "Sunshine". Wonder why, huh?
(Psst! Hey! It's me, Kumatora! I bet you couldn't recognize me in this old uniform of mine, huh?)
(Yo! ~Player~! It's me, Kumatora! I must look like a completely different person in this girly getup, huh?)
(Heh! You should see the expression glued to your face, ~player~! It's me, Kumatora! This is my old waitress outfit.)
Tell ya what, though: If ya win this game, I'll do something special. Sound good?
Sorry, I just can't step on a nice guy like you. I'll give ya a reward if you win the game, though!
This little guy is called Queso. He likes to tag along with me sometimes. He kinda reminds me of a certain monkey pal I used to know...
Everyone, meet Queso! No Ultimate Chimera is complete without a lil' bird buddy! That, 'n really sharp teeth. I don't have those, so these spiky gloves will have to do.

This handsome lil' fella is called Queso! If you think that's a weird name, stuff it. It's better than Guacamole or somethin'!
(Chirp!)
Let's make like a dung beetle and get rollin'!
A little nudity isn't gonna scare me! I've gone to the hot springs with my buddies more times than I can count.
Alright, here we go. Tonda Gossa! ....Man, that STILL sounds super lame. Let's just get this started.
I bet not many other princesses got the guts to play somethin' like this. Good thing I'm far from your average princess, huh?
Good luck! Or not, actually. I'd rather win.
Uh... I guess I'll do ~cards.text~ ~cards.ifplural(cards|card)~...?
Somethin' tells me swappin' ~cards.text~ ~cards.ifPlural(cards|card)~ would be best.
Hell, I dunno. Let's go with these ~cards.text~ ~cards.ifPlural(cards|card)~.
Maybe ~cards.text~ ~cards.ifPlural(cards|card)~ would work. Or somethin'.
Lemme think... alright, take ~cards.text~ ~cards.ifPlural(cards|card)~ of 'em back.
I'll swap out ~cards.text~ ~cards.ifplural(cards|card)~.
Hurry it up, dealer! Swap ~cards.text~ for me!
Heh heh, go ahead and take these ~cards.text~ ~cards.ifPlural(cards|card)~. I'm feelin' lucky!
Yeah, yeah... here, get rid of these.
You're pretty quick at dealin' out cards, Dealer! I guess you'd be a lame-ass dealer if ya couldn't, though. Oh, uh, ~cards~.
Hmmm...Think I'll go with ~cards.text~ ~cards.ifplural(cards|card)~.
Hmm... gimmie ~cards.text~ ~cards.ifPlural(cards|card)~, man.
I'll go with ~cards~ cards or whatever.
I'll take ~cards~, Green 'Stache.

Ehe! I hope you don't mind waiting just a while longer to see my uniform come undone.
*giggle*

This lovely uniform is a girl's pride and joy! I'm not going to make it easy for you to take it apart. Sorry, ~player~.
*giggle*

While getting a well-earned tip feels wonderful, nothing beats seeing a customer give you a well-earned smile. It always makes my day!
*giggle*

The policy of Club Titiboo is to always wear your brightest smile! Who knew it came in handy for poker, too? You probably can't tell what kind of hand I've got!
*giggle*

Wonderful! A truly superb hand! It's nice to be able to sit back and enjoy the show for a change. I'm normally too busy!
*giggle*
Oh, hell yeah! I don't have the best understandin' of the rules yet, but even I know three of the same thingies is good!
(Alright! These're great! I'm supposed to pretend like they're not, though, I think.) Darn. My hand suuuucks.
Call it beginner's luck or whatever, but I'm probably sittin' easy this round!
There's nothin' like good company, right? Do you guys have friends you're especially close to?
If you're waitin' on me to comment on my cards, you just keep on waitin'. Hell if I know if this is good or not.
Haha, awesome! I'm feelin' lucky! Maybe after this I'll head into Sunshine Forest n' find some Soot Dumplings. Those guys are hard to find!
My buddy Lucas loves to go on n' on about how good his mom's omelettes were. He says that eatin' 'em feels like she never left.
Ya know, I always thought it was weird that a grizzled cowboy like Flint had a shy, sweet kid like Lucas. Then again, Lucas is tougher than steel, so maybe it's not weird after all.
Gettin' a solid hand is nice 'n all, but nothing compares to learnin' a new PSI spell. Though, I haven't actually learned any since I learned PK Ground, come to think of it...
I haven't played poker before, so I can't say if this hand is any good or not. It probably isn't.
So... what brought you folks here, anyways? Lookin' for new friends, or are ya just wantin' to see some nudity? Or makin' new, nude friends?
Havin' PSI is great! Everyone seems to have their own specialties, too. I've got a lot of skills that freeze, burn or shock bad guys! I can't heal anywhere near as well as my buddy Lucas, though!
Just waitin' for things to happen... Still waitin'. Let's go!
These are good? I think? Maybe? I guess I don't know what I'm doin'? I'll probably figure it out?
I doubt playin' this game will shred my tendons, but a good stretch never hurts. Unless it does. Life is funny that way.

...You know, it's pretty convenient we all speak the same language.
...Something's tellin' me I shouldn't think about it too hard.
I'm lookin' at a smash hit, ladies 'n gents! I'm so confident in this hand, I feel the need to announce it!
Haha, yes! "Never back down, even when you're naked in a strip poker game and can't afford to lose again" is my motto, ya know!
Nice. Just cause I'm on the ropes doesn't mean I'm just gonna roll over n' die! Ionia didn't raise a pushover! Oh, uh, she was one of the Magypsies.
Hell, if Rope Snake can keep on truckin' despite messin' up a lot, then I can keep on playin' this game, no matter the odds. Well, he goes by Snake Rope now, I guess, but whatever.
Guess this means I won't be schlikin' it just yet. Sorry to disappoint you, ~player~.
Okay, I'm not down n' out just yet! (Whew... cuttin' it mighty close there, Kumatora...)
You wanna trade hands, ~player~? Too bad! I don't plan on losin', even if I already lost my modesty!
I love it when an enemy thinks I'm screwed if I use up all my PSI. It makes the surprised, pained look on their face when I sock the grin of 'em all the more rewarding.
Porky pushed the world to the very brink of destruction, but me and the gang never stopped fightin'. I won't give up here, either!
Whelp, you got both the spats and the panties off me, so I guess you've earned a look, right?
I'm not one for showin' off... but I do think I have a nice butt. Am I right, or am I right?
Not too shabby, I guess. I'm gettin' the rules down, I think. I'm a fast learner!
You know, when I was a bit younger and still learnin' how to use PSI, I would feel feverish and sick pretty often... but once the fever broke, I learned some new kick-ass PSI to use!
I'm thinkin' about checking on Alec after this game's done. He's the grandfather of Lucas. Nice guy, but kinda... pun drunk.
Animals are a lot weirder than you'd expect. Like, Alec has this one pig who told me "I really want to see a pig seeing the ocean". Weird, ain't it?
How does Duster get those wall staples, anyway? A giant stapler...? Oh, sorry. Gettin' distracted.
Uh, just askin' for a friend here... do they let dog-like dudes in here?
I'm feelin' great! I bet I could win this faster than a sprintin' pig workin' for a paycheck!
Do you play these kinds of games often, ~player~? You look like you know what you're doin'.
So... do you like hot weather, or cold, ~player~? I prefer things to be a bit on the chilly side, though I don't enjoy hypothermia much.
Gettin' healed with Lifeup makes you feel warm and refreshed! It's like coffee, but instant.
You sure like takin' your time, ~player~. Not that I'm tryin' to hurry your slow butt up or somethin'.
Man, some magic pudding would really hit the spot right about now. I'll admit to havin' a bit of a sweet tooth.
Heh! Just like stoppin' the recharger at exactly 15 seconds! Oh, uh, you probably don't know what that means, huh?
I'm just gonna be sittin' back and enjoyin' the show for this round. I wish I had a hot cup of that Mr. Saturn coffee. That stuff gets you relaxed like nothin' else!
Heh. I bet some of you didn't notice I'm wearin' a necklace. Well, pendant. Whatever.
Do any of you guys have a dog? I'm pretty damn sure I know the best dog who ever lived, 'n his name's Boney!
(Time to show my lyin' skills!) This hand is crap poop. (Ha! Nailed it!)
...Heh. You really do remind me of Flint, ~player~. You're a regular chatterbox, you know?
Do you folks have any bands that you're into? I've only known one, 'n it's good ol' DCMC! Their bass player is especially cool.
Have any of you guys been in a limo before? I don't care much about cars, but that limo was awesome! It even had a hot tub inside!
Sorry, ~player~. It probably won't be me this time! I wonder if you're gonna be the one lose...
Feelin' the breeze on my hands feels kinda weird. I wear those gloves all the time, after all!
Hey, ~player~! Hurry it up, will ya? It's rude to keep a lady waitin', you know?
I knew how to flirt with the guys who came to Club Titiboo, but this is kind of... completely different.
This hand kinda stinks, man. What'd I do to get such craptastic cards?
I see you glancin' at me, ~player~. I don't really mind it. Hell, I figured the odds of me gettin' through this with most of my clothes on were pretty slim.
Do any of you guys appreciate nature? Where I'm from, some butterball tyrant came to our islands and stank up the place. Me n' my buddies worked together to stop 'em.
Normally, I enjoy eatin' sweet things, but I'll make an exception for beefy jerky any day! I like how it's tough, like me!
...Let's show our hands already! I'm havin' a hard enough time kickin' my habit of tapping my feet when bored, so don't make it worse!
You know, all Mr. Saturns are called Mr, even the girls! Not that you can tell just by lookin' at 'em, I guess.
I miss the Magypsies. They were a bunch of weirdos, but they were family. They took me in when I was just a lil' orphan baby, and even taught me PSI!
I've always liked the sound of an electric guitar! You folks have any instrument in particular that you enjoy?
Nice, a strong hand. ....What? Do you want me to sing a tune and dance a lil' jig for every hand?
Luck may be on my side for now, but it's a fickle bastard. It's a good thing I know how to handle those types... Well, maybe "good" isn't the right word.
I'm not the shy type, if you couldn't tell by now... but bein' the center of attention gets exhausting. Club Titiboo taught me that real quick.
One perk of workin' at Club Titiboo was perfectin' the art of "The Smile™️"! See?
Heh. The goods are stayin' covered for now. Mine are, at least! Well, the important bits, anyways.
Wearin' these panties under the spats feels... wrong. It's kind of like I'm committing some kind of... heresy. Oh well!
Sometimes, life deals you a crappy hand. You've just gotta do the best with what you're given. Uh, no, this isn't a poker metaphor!
Luck's too unpredictable for my tastes. Sure, I can relax this round, but I might be releasing my honkers next round.
Naw, I'm not embarrassed! Well, yet, anyway. Who knows how I'll feel with the goods out? You won't be findin' out this round.
I wonder which one of you will be takin' the plunge this round... Try 'n impress the pretty princess.
I've got a good hand... I feel this weird need to report that, kinda like someone needs to know... Weird.
Remember to treat frogs with respect! Those dudes have super long, accurate memories. If you piss one off, they'll remember.
You know, my hoodie does a great job at hidin' my chest, I'm bettin' my boobs are bigger than you guys first thought, huh?
I usually prefer not wearin' a bra. I find 'em kinda uncomfortable. It feels nice to let the girls breathe a bit.
Alright! It looks like I'll be gettin' a show this time. I hope it's somethin' exciting...
Looks like the princess of Osohe Castle is still in this! Grovel 'n all that crap.
Earlier today, I was stretchin' after I woke up, 'n whacked my elbow on my table. That shit hurts! ...That ain't poker-related.
Life's real good at puttin' you in sticky situations... That just makes the good times even sweeter.
Okay, I guess I'm feelin' the pressure now... This hand is a sight for sore eyes! Bein' completely naked isn't somethin' I'm used to!
Whew... Hey, don't give me that look, ~player~. I get embarrassed too!
Alright! Nice and solid! ...What're you snickerin' at?
Heh, guess I have nothin' to worry about, for this round at least. It's kinda nice to kick back and enjoy the banter without worryin' about your clothes.
Sweet! It's like gettin' a present after fightin' a tough enemy. Come to think of it, where do those gift boxes they sometimes leave behind come from, anyway?
If one of my Magypsy pals were here, they'd be like "Oh, how wonderful, simply divine! A beauty like me deserves the best! (heart symbol)". They never did get me to talk like that!
Hey! Where were you guys when my boots needed ya?! Dumb cards...
Alright! I've got some good luck this time. Since I had bad luck earlier, I guess this means my luck is plain. Average. Normal. Yay...?
I love takin' hikes! It's fun to just kinda wander around 'n enjoy the sights, you know?
I was thinkin' about runnin' a zoo, since I love animals... but animals deserve to be free. Would you be happy, stuck in a cage or pen?
My lucky, bad-guy-slappin', unfingered gloves are safe for another round!
Gettin' all cock-sure is a sure-fire way to get your ass kicked... But there's nothin' wrong with enjoyin' a good hand.
Ha! Boots-schmoots! I don't need 'em to kick lady luck's ass! If that makes her mad, maybe she should square up 'n fight me!
Cozy little place, ain't it? It almost feels classy, if you ignore the naked 'n moanin' people.
This place feels... quaint. I don't even know what that means, but it sounds right.
Honestly, I kinda expectin' something... I dunno, trashier, when I heard about the Inventory. I guess you can be classy and naked, huh?
You one of those blue-collar types, ~player~? Nothin' like embarrassin' yourself in front of strangers to unwind after a long week.
I'm guessin' you've got some kind of borin' day job, ~player~. Guess I can't blame ya for wantin' to do somethin' fun 'n dumb like this.
Is this what you do to relax after a long-ass, exhausting-ass week, ~player~? You're a strange one, ain't ya?
Talk about kickin' your week off with a bang, ~player~. At least, I bet that's what you're hopin' to do.
Man... This is how you start your week, ~player~? You've got guts. You're still gonna lose, though.
Guess you're not one of those crusty, musty "I hate Mondays!" types, ~player~. Me neither.
Tuesdays are kinda borin', huh? They're just kinda... there. Guess I can't blame ya for wantin' to spice things up a bit, ~player~.
If the weekdays are like a big ol' family, then Tuesdays are like the forgotten middle child. They don't stand out.
Tuesdays are as bland as unflavored yogurt. At least somethin' terrible like trout-flavored yogurt is interesting.
Wednesdays are kinda excitin'. Well, they used to be, back at my old waitress gig. They always meant the weekend was fast approachin'.
Hope you're havin' a good Wednesday, ~player~! I used to love 'em back at my old job. Meant the crummy week was about to screw off!
Heh. Wednesdays always get me in a good mood. If you survived the week up until now, then it means the rest of it will be a breeze.
Guess you couldn't wait until tomorrow, huh, ~player~? Heh! I'm not complainin' that we got to meet, though.
Hope your week hasn't sucked eggs thus far, ~player~. Maybe takin' a load off by unloadin' your load is what the doctor ordered, though. If ya lose, that is. That sounded better in my head...
Thursday might be a weird day to play this game, but it just kinda felt right. I'm guessin' it's the same for you, ~player~.
Weekends don't matter as much to me anyway, bein' jobless 'n all that noise. I still enjoy 'em, though.
Man, Saturdays are just the best, ain't they? There's just somethin' in the air that gets me pumped!
Lots of people go out with their friends on Saturday, yeah? You hopin' to see a large crowd, ~player~?
Gettin' in some last minute humiliation before you've gotta go back to the grind, ~player~? Haha!
Tryin' to end your week on a high note, I see... I'm hopin' you'll be singin' a pretty tune, too.
Last chance to see somethin' a bit raunchy, huh? I'm not gonna make it easy for ya just because it's Sunday, ~player~.
...You guys ever wonder who first discovered that a cow's milk is drinkable? Like, they musta thought "I'll drink whatever comes outta these things".
Hmm... usin' this hand'll be a bit of a gamble. I've never let a little risk stop me, though!
You know what's kinda weird? When talking about it in general, we call it "PSI". We call the actual moves "PK", though. Wonder why?
I'd say I got about a 50/50 shot with this hand. Sometimes, you gotta just hope fer the best.
Sometimes, you just gotta be willin' to take a chance. I mean, bein' naked, in most situations, won't kill ya. Except on Snowcap Mountain.
This hand ain't great, and it ain't terrible. Whoa....for some reason, sayin' that just now really ticked me off. I wonder why?
Guess I just gotta throw caution to the wind, huh? Don't throw too much caution to the wind though, otherwise the Word On The Wind will have some colorful phrases to tell ya.
Just average, but hey, I got respect for average. Duster looks about as plain and unassumin' as they come, but that dude kicks all kindsa ass.
Ionia always said I was a risk taker. She also used to say I was a trouble maker, too. He's not wrong, really.
Can we get get some snacks during the game, or is that bar just for show? I'm starvin'.
Anybody seen a doorknob layin' around here? Lucas has been lookin' all over for it. I don't really get why it's so important to him, but who am I to judge?
You know, this place really reminds me of Club Titiboo. At least we don't have to "giggle~" at the end of our sentences. I hated doin' that.
You guys come here often? I know that's the lamest icebreaker ever, but I'm genuinely curious. I haven't been in a place like this before.
I've been tryin' to think of new hobbies to occupy myself with. I might take up boxing! I'm no stranger to throwin' hands.
On my way over here, some bearded weirdo descended from the sky and took my picture, instantaneously. He then flew away like it was nothin'. What the hell?

You want some wisdom, ~player~? An apple a day keeps the doctor away.
...Unless you choke on the core or somethin'. Avoid that.
C'mon, let's go already. Procrastinatin' ain't my style. Gotta face the music eventually.
...You tryin' to read our minds, ~player~? You keep starin' at everybody with a goofy expression on your face.
...Y'know how those little hardhats workers, moles, 'n workin' moles wear? I wonder why they're all yellow. Is yellow a sacred color or whatever?
Well, I ain't really showin' any skin yet, at least. Maybe this boring-ass hand will keep it that way.
I've only taken off my trinkets so far, but honestly, I'm feelin' pretty damn naked without that necklace round my neck.
In Tazmily, we have this really freakin' weird dude named Nippolyte. He was the village gravedigger. He liked to grow omelettes near Osohe Castle. I didn't even know you could grow those.
Average. Boring. Lame. Whatever. Forgettable. I'm sayin' these words for no reason, I promise.
It's nice to be able to just sit back n' enjoy a dumb game like this. Free time like this is what I was fightin' for!
Always watch where you're steppin', guys! You never know when there's gonna be some ants on the ground. They've got lives too, ya know?
Whoa... I got kinda dizzy all of a sudden. I wonder if I'll be learnin' a new PSI move soon?
Are you a fan of cheese, ~player~? It seems like you either love or hate it. Personally, I'm not a fan. It makes your breath reek!
I wonder if strip arm wrestling would be any fun... I bet I could kick all of your asses, no problem! Kick 'em with my arms, I mean.
This hand is too boring to comment on. Sorry, ~player~. I'm sure everyone else has something fun to say.
Overusin' my PSI tuckers me out, 'n gives me a killer headache, too. It's what stops me from shootin' psychic meteors as often as I'd like.
Bein' able to waste time by playin' a goofy card game is really nice, y'know. Havin' fun is what life is supposed to be about, if you ask me!
What, ~player~? You gettin' tired of seein' me make this itty-bitty flame? Whatcha' gonna do about it?
Yeah, I'm havin' fun. I can think of at least three much worse things we could be doin' instead!
Hmmm... Who knows how this'll go? Maybe you'll see somethin' fun, or maybe you won't! I can't see the future...
I'm not exactly one of those shy types, but I don't normally jibber 'n jabber so much, either. Wonder what's up with that...
(Poker face time. I've been told it's intimidating. ~Player~ seems better at it, though...)
This hand is about as average as they come. It kinda reminds me of Duster's face, in a way! Though, I trust that guy more than I trust these cards.
I'm not sure if playin' it safe is better, or if takin' risks is. Calculatin' probabilities ain't my strong suit, you know?
You know, most little doodads, like charms n' stuff, give me better protection from damage. This pendant doesn't, though. It gives my PSI a boost, though!
I guess I'll just be takin' another shot in the dark. Castin' lightning is the same thing. Except, you know. With electricity n' junk.
...What if I mix magic pudding and magic gelatin together? That sounds so good!
You know what might help make your turns go faster, ~player~? Picture somethin' called an "A Button" and mash the hell out of it!
Anyone down for a game of rock paper scissors? It gives us somethin' to do while everyone is slowly takin' their turns.
Have you guys ever wrestled a Drago? I have, n' it's a damn good time! They're surprisingly nice for bein' such big bastards. In their natural state, anyways...
You ever get a song stuck in your head? Normally it's stuck 'cause it's a good song, but hearin' it on repeat all day gets annoying.
This hoodie is pretty versatile, you know! It keeps me warm when it gets chilly, but leavin' my legs bare keeps me cool when it's hot!
Bluffin' ain't worth diddly-squat in this game, but that's not gonna stop me from tellin' ya my hand is godly, ~player~.
Lucas is still missin' that doorknob that broke off his door. Maybe I should invent some new gizmo that opens doors, like bottle openers. But with doors.
Yup. This sure is a hand. In this here poker game.
Normal poker gets tournaments 'n stuff, right? Does strip poker get those, too? I guess it ain't family friendly...
I like to imagine I've mellowed out a bit over the years. World-endin' quests tend to do that to someone, I guess.
Well, it's a gamble. At least the world won't blow up or somethin' if it all goes to crap.
I like the way my body looks... but standin' here naked is a little bit embarrassin', to be honest.
Say... do you have any plans after this, ~player~? I wouldn't mind gettin' a bite to eat or somethin' once the game's over.
Hey. I noticed the big-ass barrel with "Lost and found" painted on it when I came in. Has anyone seen a doorknob in there? ...Don't give me that look!
My heart's racin'...! No cryin' until the end, though, right?
I wonder how Rope Snake... uh, I mean, Snake Rope is doin'. That dude is always beatin' himself up...
This ain't really here nor there, but... watch out when you chop down trees! You never know when they'll explode.
I'm almost always wearin' gloves, so my hands feel pretty naked right now! Then again, maybe that's just because I am naked.
I've been up against worse odds before! I bet I'll still be hangin' in there.
Well... Losin' here ain't the worst thing in the world...
Hm.... nope! Readin' these cards backwards ain't makin' them any better. Damn.
If I'm gonna lose and get myself off on the floor, I'm doin' it with confidence. Let's get goin' already!
Whoa... This place is givin' me real weird vibes right now... Horny ones, too. I wonder if I'll be feelin' that if I lose...
Man, it feels weird bein' a naked-ass lady, showin' my naked ass, and still tryin' to play the game.
Oh, silly me! I seem to be facin' the wrong way, showin' off my rear end! Oh my! Goodness! Other such crap!
Eh, no worries! I think this hand's got enough bite to keep me in the game. Though, if it bites too much, they might kick me out of this place...

I'm no singer, but I've got a feelin' I might be playin' you guys a hot, heavy, 'n passionate tune in a second...
Or not!
I'm not about to start shakin' it for ya, but I think you guys earned a peek.
You don't have to keep sneakin' glances, you know. I'm glad you're likin' what I've got.
I love my hoodie, but I don't mind standin' here in my undies. This is usually what I sleep in, anyway! Minus the bra, duh.
You know, me n' the gang once had to put on those dumbass Pigmask suits once, so we could blend in. Those things are hot, and I've been inside a volcano!
Uh, there aren't any weird maids workin' here, right? After fightin' that tin-can maid robot, seein' maids gets me all antsy.
Meh, just another average hand. I wonder if Duster would be any good, playin' this game. That dude has both the best and the worst luck.
...I see you lookin' at me, ~player~. "Subtle" ain't a word I'd use to describe ya! I don't mind it, though.
I didn't know these were called "spats" until recently. I always called 'em "tight-ass shorts".
I still have my old waitress uniform back home. I never could bring myself to get rid of it. Maybe you'll see it someday, ~player~...
Savin' the world is heroic 'n stuff, but man, it's a lot of pressure. Sometimes, you just wanna meet new 'n hot faces, ya know?
Family is important, but it's not just about blood. Friends that stick with ya through the hard times matter just as much.
You know, water is good for ya, but... Soda just tastes so damn good! I love how bubbly it is, you know? ...Oh, right. Poker.
People would call Lucas the "black sheep" of his family... but sheep only turn black when struck by lightning. Then again, that kid did get zapped pretty often...
Well, this probably won't be smashin' it outta the park, but I've got a tingly feelin' it'll work just fine.
This strip poker game seems like the perfect place for some wisdom: Puttin' a hotspring inside a bathroom ain't practical. Trust me.
You can usually tell someone's personality from the way they knock on doors. I like to rapidly punch the crap outta the door with both hands.
Does anybody actually sing in the shower? I'm too busy soapin' up to do that.

Mmmm... Ah!
Nothin' like a good stretch, man. Unless you go too hard 'n tear a tendon. That's bad.
It's a whatever-flavored hand, but no sweat! I shoot fire and I've been inside a volcano. I'm used to heat.
...This game stinks.
Ah... I'm gettin' pretty comfy. This is the getup I "wear" when I sleep, so I'm gettin' weirdly relaxed.
This hand is boring. There's literally, actually, for real no way I can say somethin' interesting about it.
Yech... it's like those slightly unclean n' not-very-tasty nut cookies Mike used to make. Not bad, but not somethin' you want, either.
This hand isn't giving me anything to say, so I'll just ask a question; How do I look so far? I'd like to think I've been keepin' myself in shape.
Weird... I was tryin' to think of somethin' to say other than how good my hand is, but... I get this weird urge to blurt it out!
You know, I've always wanted to give video games a try. They seem like fun!
Risky... but also excitin'. Average hands are a lot more fun when you're down to your last few layers!
Is it a good hand? A bad one? Who knows? What's life without a lil' mystery, hmm~?
Heart...symbol...! Heartsymbol! Hearrrrt syyymbbballll...? Nope, no dice. I'm not sure I'll ever figure out how to do that...
I wouldn't mind a bike or somethin'. I'm always trekkin' on foot, after all. I might have to look into that...
...A slightly-less-crappy hand is better than a crappy hand, I guess. It's still crap, though.

Oh crap! I think I left the stove on at home!
...Oh wait, no I didn't. I don't own one. False alarm.
This hand... It's kinda like grabbin' a handful of grass, dumpin' salt on it, and callin' it a meal. More flavor than usual, but it's still grass.
I ain't spillin' the beans yet, ~player~. Or flyin' those beans, for that matter.
Am I gonna lose? Or am I gonna stay barely modest? Who knows?
...Do you think seein' naked people get old after a while? ...Nah, probably not.
Here's some Almost-Naked-Lady advice for you boys n' girls; Don't eat weird lookin' mushrooms you see on the ground, even if you're starvin'!
Let's go! Let's go! Let's goooo already! I wanna see what you guys have!
Gettin' down to the wire! What kind of wire, you ask? Hell if I know, bub!
Dang... I'm really gettin' hungry. Normally I'd go for somethin' sweet, but some beef jerky would really hit the spot right about now...
Heh! This hand is so average that I can't help but root for it! It sucks just enough to qualify as an underdog!
Whelp, I can confirm that havin' your tits out doesn't make standin' around 'n waiting any more exciting.
"Yogurt" is such a weird name for a food, ain't it? I wonder who came up with that...
...Starin' at me isn't gonna make me jump outta my panties, you know.
There's something weirdly relaxin' about makin' a little fire like this. Kinda weird, huh?
...Not knowin' what'll happen is kinda... excitin'. My heart's beatin' a little faster... but I don't think it's embarrassment.
Ahhh... Man, stretchin' feels even better when you're mostly naked! I'm learnin' all kinds of junk today.
...Man, I'm gonna be out at this rate. My clothes are dissappearin' faster than a ball of soot in a hurricane.
Puttin' your hands on your hips like this does wonders for your confidence! I used to do this when demand- I mean, askin' for a raise back at my old job. I had clothes on, though.
You've gotta roll with life's punches sometimes, or your metaphorical teeth are just gonna get metaphorically smashed out. Remember that, ~player~.
I wonder if I'm done growin'? I feel shorter without my boots...
A decent hand.... Do I have to keep givin' colorful commentary for each of these? It almost feels like I have to say somethin' every hand. Wonder why that is...
I can use ice 'n lightning PSI, you know. Keepin' a small flame like this is easier to do casually, though.
Meh... Eh... Whuh...? Don't give me that look. I ran outta "whatever" noises.
"Average" doesn't always mean "forgettable", you know! Average is always better than bad, after all.
I kinda wish I ate something before comin' here... I forget to eat sometimes! I'm a busy gal.
I'm never in one place for too long. I'm always hikin' around. It's fun to walk 'n appreciate nature's beauty!

....Did I leave the stove on, back home...?
...Oh yeah. I don't have a stove. Guess life can play nice every now 'n then.
I used to have a bad habit of tappin' my feet on the ground, usually when impatient. Tryin' to kick it ain't easy... but stretchin' is a good substitute.
A gamble, huh...? As long as my cards don't explode or something. That highway bot was not happy with us blowin' him up by overchargin' him.
I wonder if these cards would catch on fire, if we were playin' in a volcano.

Never take a gamble you ain't prepared to lose.
Profound, ain't it? 'Cause we're playin' strip poker. 'N I've got most of my clothes. Heh.
I betcha' that a lot of tables get flipped around here. I've got that on my bucket list, actually...
Here's Kumatora's word of the day: "Kerfuffle." Heh! It's just fun to say.
I think I'll check out the rest of this place after the game. I love explorin' new places! I've seen every nook 'n cranny in the Nowhere Islands, so some extra spice is nice.
Did the Egg of Light come from a Chicken of Light? Technically, isn't every egg an "egg of life"?
If my thief buddy Duster were here, he'd do one of those fancy flips of his to turn the tables around. Probably wouldn't work on cards, though.
Damn. It's like casting PK Thunder Ω, and none of the stupid bolts hit anything.
I've got some advice for you guys: If you see a present sittin' in a dusty 'n crusty old castle, don't open it. Ghosts like to hide in those things.
One bad hand ain't gonna kill me, I guess. It's probably 100% guaranteed that I'll maybe have better luck next time, anyways.
Well, that's lame... That I got such an amazin' hand, that is. Yup.
My buddies Lucas and Duster love scarfin' down cheese. Ugh... just thinkin' about cheese makes me wanna gag.
I love havin' PSI, but damn, I really wish you didn't get sick every single time you learn a new move! Bein' feverish suuucks!
Yo, ~player~. This hand is of exceptional quality. Wanna trade? A true princess never lies.... pffft, okay, I can't keep a straight face. It's crap.
Damn. This hand stinks. It sucks. It's terrible, bad, smelly, awful and I don't like it.
Well, this hand just sucks. Maybe if I keep complainin' about it's crap-level quality, it'll toughen up into somethin' usable. Then again, that didn't work for Negative Man...
Phyrgia, one of my adoptive "parents", is always snoozin' the day away. I never understood that. Sleepin' makes you miss out on life, ya know?
I might not be mopey like Lucas can be sometimes, but I can't say I'm a ray of sunshine 'n optimism like Doria is, either.
I'd kick his ass if I found out he was tryin' to get into a place like this, but I wonder if Lucas could handle this kinda thing. He somehow has the best and worst luck imaginable.
Well, this'll be a life or death gamble. Just, y'know, without the dyin' part.
...Hm. I should get a day job. Then I'll quit it 'n become a wannabe card shark, so I can regret quitin' my day job for this crap.
...Now that leaves a bad taste in your mouth. Like tea, but with more regret.
Life would be pretty boring without setbacks, don'tcha think, ~player~? No use cryin' about it.
Oh no, I might be... slightly more exposed after this round! The horror.
...You're kiddin' me. Lovely.

Son of a-... er, witch. Lucas keeps tellin' me to watch my language. I wouldn't listen if anyone else asked me to, but I gotta set an example.
...Like not playin' strip poker. Whoops.
Yeah, sure, just keep givin' me crap hands. Why not?
Wonderful. 'Guess this means I'm on my way to bein' a nudist. I've got the feelin' ~player~ wouldn't mind that, though.
Whelp! I've faced worse odds before. I mean, I managed to blow up a freakin' tank with my PSI and monkey pal. Wess was there too, I think...?

They sell beer here, right? I bet most of you would guess a rough n' tumble girl like me would enjoy it, right? Truth is, I can't stand the way beer tastes. It's like sucking the cream outta a rotten eclair, for me.
...Life is like a mailbox. You sometimes get nice surprises... and other times, you get nothin' but screams. Life is kinda messed up.
I'd moan 'n whine, but... if sheep can be happy with their life after gettin' zapped by lightning, I can probably handle a little extra nakedness.
I blame you, ~player~. Your silent, smug aura is messin' me up. Sing a lil' ditty or somethin' next round.
...Man, I miss that guy with the big-ass cart. He'd store items 'n junk for us, and always tell us he believes in us. I could use some of that energy right about now...
I'm always tellin' Lucas to look at the bright side of life, no matter what sucker punches life swings at ya. Time to practice what I preach.
Well, crap fire! This poker stuff is harder than I thought.
Rottin', stinkin', sucky-ass cards...
I've got a bad hand. I'm naked. What do you think's gonna happen now, genius?
Uh... no sweat. I've been in worse binds before...aw, hell, I'm gonna lose, aren't I?
Oof... maybe this is how Negative Man feels...
Whelp! Lookin' at these cards is givin' me a headache, so I'm just gonna... look over here. Don't mind me.
Well, who knows? Maybe someone else has a hand that sucks even more butthole.
...You might as well have given me a piece of paper that says "Get masturbatin', loser!".
Awww... It'd be better if I had a chance, at least. You might as well have just painted a big, flamin' middle finger on these cards.
Well, I guess I'll be facin' the music... Knowin' you're probably gonna lose makes it kinda embarassin'.
Haha... Heh... I'm gonna lose.
You won't be seein' this durin' the forfeit I'll probably have to do, so take a good look while ya can!
...If I'm playin' like ass, I might as well show you my ass, right? Seems fair to me.
I'm beginning to question my life choices!
...I see that look, ~player~. You're hopin' I'll lose, ain't ya? I'm flattered. Really!
I've been feelin' all tingly... 'n not because I have a fever. Maybe losin' ain't so bad...
There we go... Nice 'n limber. I don't wanna explain how I pulled a muscle in my arm while at a strip poker joint.
Not too shabby, huh? It doesn't wobble when I walk, but I bet it's nice to look at anyway.
...Y'know, I should be feelin' kinda cold right now... But I'm burnin' up. Can't imagine why...
Heh. Guess the fat lady's about to sing, huh? At least she's not the one you have to watch...
Whelp, guess I've gotta kiss my pendant goodbye. If anyone touches it, I'll break their fingers.
Aw man...this is probably gonna cost me my necklace.
Somehow, Duster takin' my pendant ain't so bad... but If any of you swipe it, you'll be sorry.
I wish I had Duster's Siren Beetle with me. I could slip some cards in my sleeve while you're all distracted!
...Do any of you have a favorite phrase you save for somethin' that annoys you? For no reason in particular, I promise.
I wonder what happened to that weirdo, Dr. Andonuts. I haven't seen that egghead in forever. Maybe he found a new trashcan to live in...
Mushrooms are nothin' but trouble, kids. Either they grow on your head and make you all confused, or they make you see disturbin' crap you'd rather... not.
...Settin' cards on fire is probably a no-no here, right?
...About as pleasant as steppin' on a tack.
Talk about a kick in the family jewels... This hand's gonna cost me my necklace, isn't it?
I don't mind takin' a few hits, but it adds up quickly. It ain't even the fun kind of slippery slope that you ride a fridge down...
Well, well. A hand that stinks, reeks, 'n sucks. Guess I gotta throw you a bone every now 'n then, ~player~.
This hand stinks. I'd do a back-flip or somethin' to save face, but I'm too comfortable standin' here. Just picture it in your head, ~player~.
Crap. Crud. Filth. Doo-doo feces, even. I think you get the point.
Y'know... I bet I could turn these cards into deadly weapons! Just freeze 'em, 'n you get card-shaped bricks!
(Uh oh. It's lookin' like I'm gonna be down to my last bit of HP. Time to bluff!) Man, it sure is nice havin' such a sure-fire hand! (Nailed it!)
Boney is the best dog anyone could ask for, and I love him! I just wish he didn't eat the healin' items he's supposed to be givin' to other party members...
Well, I won't be outta the game with this trashy-ass hand, but it's still gonna put me deep in the danger zone...
I knew the odds comin' in to this game. After all, only one of us is gonna leave this game clean between the legs. That doesn't mean I'm not gonna try to win!
Well, well. It's lookin' like you're gonna get me completely outta my clothes, ~player~. Lucky for you, I don't mind it too much. I ain't gonna roll over n' quit, though!
Hmph. I'm not shy about showin' my body. I just don't like the idea of losin'! Next hand, let's go!
You know, I never did start hatin' pigs, even after dealin' with those Pigmask bastards for so long. It's not their fault some jerk liked them so much, yeah?
...There's some real weirdos in this place, huh? I'm pretty sure there's some Mr. Saturns hangin' out in that booth over there. Those lil' guys are weird magnets!
Man, my mouth is gettin' dry. I wish brought somethin' to drink...
So long, panties... You weren't as comfortable as goin' commando, but you served me well.
(...Huh. I'm not sayin' anything, but ~player~ is lookin' at me like I'm talkin'. Wonder what that's about...? I do have my boobs out, but...)
...That's not good. Guess wearin' this dumb-lookin' "armor" was the right call.
Whelp. No point in bein' naked and tense. Let's loosen up a bit...
...Yeah, I knew this could happen when I walked through that door over there. Doesn't make this any less embarrassin', though...
Guess I'll be showin' all of the goods now, huh? Don't count me out yet! I ain't goin' gentle!
Here's some advice for ya: If you don't wanna lose, don't play like me, apparently.
If you're some kinda weirdo who wanders around graveyards at night, watch out for the big tombstones. They like to fall over on people, n' those bastards are heavy!
Whelp! Seein' as this hand is slightly... disgustingly awful, there's not a lot of point in pretendin' it's anything but crap.
You know, I'm called the "Princess of Osohe Castle", but I don't actually live there. It has a bit of a ghost problem. It's super dusty, too!
Ever since we fought that artsy-fartsy ghost conductor, Mr. Passion, hearin' classical music just turns my blood cold...
I never had any siblings growin' up. Well, I consider my pal Lucas to be a little brother, I suppose. Still, I wonder what havin' actual siblings is like...
You ever hear of that "if a tree falls in the woods, does it make a sound?" question? It annoys the hell outta me. Of course it makes a sound, ya dumbass!
Haha! This hand is garbage! Lookin' at it makes me angrier than you can possibly imagine!
I don't mind losin' my bra, honestly. I normally go without it anyway.
Well, when life gives ya lemons, you don't squeeze 'em in anger, because that'll get juice in your eyeballs.
I'll probably lose this round... Maybe I could make things a little spicier for you guys. Give a lil' wink 'n slooooowly let them flop out...
Mopin' around when life deals ya a bad hand does jack squat. Just roll with the punches, 'n take off your clothes!
...Alright, alright. I'll admit it. I'm havin' fun... but I'm gettin' a lil' nervous. I'm only human, ~player~...
...Dunno why I'm thinkin' about this, but... One time, I was handing Duster some cheese 'cause he was hungry. I dropped it into lava by accident... He was heartbroken.
I'm always tellin' people to keep their chin up 'n puff their chest out... Time to practice what I preach, hmm?
I might be showin' more skin than usual, but I'm feeling downright naked without my hoodie.
...I like to joke about one of my friends wearin' an afro wig, but maybe I should cut 'em some slack. The only other guy I know with an afro is the town drunk.
Right outside Tazmily Village is the Sunshine Forest. It was a quiet, safe place until the Pigmasks decided to set it on fire usin' Fire Bugs. Scum buckets.

This weird guy named Reggie liked to say "People can forget happy things. They can probably forget sad things, too. People have the power to forget." I don't think I'll forget about bein' here anytime soon...
...Do any of you guys know what a "hippie" is? I've seen one in my dreams a few times, but hell if I know who, what, or why...
Crap...well, now I know how Lucas musta' felt after his house got struck by lightning for the 50th time. 'Course, that wasn't natural lightning.
After runnin' the numbers through my head 'n doin' the fancy calculations, I've come to the conclusion that... this hand stinks.
If Lucas can beat up giant, killer robots with a dinky lil' yo-yo, I can find a way to not expose myself usin' this foul, horrendous hand.
Heh! This hand is the worst! I'm literally shakin' in rage! Don't freak out if smoke starts leakin' out my ears.
Tch! Damn. Losin' doesn't scare me, but that sure as hell doesn't mean I enjoy bein' on the defensive...
Looks like I'll be givin' you guys a show this round. I'm sure that's just devestatin' news. A tragedy, even.
I'd be lyin' if I said losing is a hoot 'n a holler... But I'd be lyin' if I said it's not makin' my heart beat faster...
Well, how about you give mine a look too, ~player~? Who's got the better one?
You may have the personality of a rancid Drago turd, but there's nothin' wrong with havin' a small schlonger, dude. Just don't bring it anywhere near me.
I don't like ya, Kazuma. Not even a little. That doesn't mean I'm gonna make fun of what you were born with, no matter how little it is.
Same here! If ya haven't tried magical sweets, like magic pudding, ya haven't lived!
Rock 'n roll for me! Nothin' sounds more badass than electric guitars.
I love listenin' to shreddin', electric guitars! Rock 'n Roll gets me pumped up!
Well, happy birthday, Jura! I ain't about to start singin' for ya, though.
Hey, if you don't wanna make a scene about it, I don't blame ya. I never liked havin' parties thrown for my birthdays, either. I'm just glad you're here.
Ain't that the sweetest thing you've ever seen, ~player~? It's good to see Nat bein' nice to her for once.
Awww... ain't that the sweetest thing you've ever seen, ~player~? I'm not givin' ya a hug just to make you feel included, though.
Happy Birthday, Frilly Mascot Lady!
Well now! Happy Birthday, Miss Brainiac!
Awww, ain't that the sweetest thing you've ever seen, ~player~?
D'awww. It's so cute seein' them becomin' friends. Ain't that right, ~player~? Oops, sorry. I meant "Isn't that right, Instructor?".
One of your murder-happy blood buddies, I take it? What's with givin' killers like you with normal-ass names?
"Freddy" 'n "Jason ain't exactly dread-inducin' names, you know. You'd think you'd call yourselves somethin' scary.
Who know what will happen in a game like this, Nagi? If someone tries creepin' on us, I'm make sure to make 'em... reconsider.
Listen, Amy. If you want, I can warn you next time. You're an adult, and you're not stupid, so I can understand if you don't want me sayin' anything.
I'd like to assume we're friends now, Amy. If you get distracted like that again, I can give ya a warning. I don't want to overstep, though.
Happy Birds 'n The Bees Takes Its Natural Course Day, Miku.
Sometimes, ya just gotta roll with the hand you're dealt. Er, in life, that is. Not this game. I guess that applies too, though...

...I don't enjoy killin' either. I've had to put down rampagin' Chimeras before. It's not the animal's fault that they were captured and welded together by Porky... but they're dangerous all the same.
Paintin' figures, huh? No offense, ~amy~, but you don't really strike me as the patient type. They'd have to be something cool to keep your attention, yeah?
Huh. That's not what I was expectin'. I'm not tryin' to be mean, but they'd have to be badass to make someone like you sit down 'n paint 'em, right?
I'm flattered you were lookin', Amy. I wear these under my hoodie since I tend to get into fights 'n stuff, Nat. A skirt just gets in the way.
What do I think? I'm pretty damn into it. It's not like I have any real siblings anyways...
H-hey, are you okay, Amy? I'm here, 'n ~player~ is too. Focus on us. You're here, with us.
M-maybe you should sit down, Amy. ~Player~ 'n I are here for you. Your friends will always be here with you.
("Not in front of her"?) You still with us, Amy? Do you want to take a break, maybe get somethin' to eat?
("Not in front of her"? Is this something she can control?) Yeah, gettin' something in your belly might help you feel better, Amy.
Heh! Who knew you were such a lady killer, ~player~? Love triangles must be stressful.
Haha! Look at 'em glare at each other! I guess love triangles happen no matter how smooth you talk, huh?

...What're you goin' on about? Why are you gettin' all red-
...Oh! Oh geez. Yeah, I get it. I was just lookin' for something fun.
Sounds like a good plan to me. I just think he's hot 'n ready to trot. You two seem like better coffin mates, anyways.
Ain't that the sweetest thing you've ever heard, ~player~? There's magic in the air tonight. Heh... 'n maybe some tension.
Doesn't that just warm your heart, ~player~? There's some magic in the air... and possibly tension, too.
...Normally, I'd be kinda worried about you teachin' people things, Hooter. You seem to know what you're doin', though. Sure, why not?
Heh. Learnin' stuff from you is normally a bad idea, but I can't deny you're more experienced than I am. I don't mind some help.
Yeah, they're all over the place. They might be annoying when they block your path, but ya still shouldn't step on 'em, you know?

That's pretty big. When me 'n the gang were walkin' on the sea floor, these Rooound Fish kept pickin' fights with us. They were kinda freaky lookin', havin' five eyeballs. It had only one mouth... but that's normal, I guess.
I remember helpin' this hermit crab out by findin' him a new shell to live in. I don't think those guys dig holes, right?
Whoa! Watch it, ya psycho! Damn!
I'm pretty active, so wearin' a frilly dress like yours is just askin' for trouble. This hoodie gets the job done, 'n it's durable as steel!
Not even once, Fluttershy! I've just been throwin' caution to the wind this entire game. The Word On The Wind might not like that, though...
Oh, you know... I was lookin' for members for a Dolphin Ossicle Collector's Club.
I dunno who "he" is, but send him my regards! That cute butt of yours means he's doin' God's work.
What're you gettin' shy for? That is one killer butt, Perona! That guy's clearly doin' you a favor!
A little variety keeps things interestin', you know! You wouldn't mind seein' him naked, would ya?
Man, you really didn't know 'bout the game very well goin' into this, did ya? I hope nobody tricked you into comin' here.
Well, where there's naked girls, there's bound to be a boy around to see 'em. Don't worry, I'll make sure he behaves himself, capiche?
Are you tryin' to tell us you ain't afraid of strippin'? Heh! You've got guts, Komi-san.
Haha! This just got even more interestin'! You're gonna race me after this game, even if I don't lose the hand!
Heh, I'll take that bet! I bet ~player~ couldn't keep up with ya anyways.
Is that supposed to scare me? Get over yourself, ya crappy discount demon-wannabe!
Pffft. I can handle some try-hard creep no problem! I've seen what real monsters look like. You're nothing.
I finally get to shut you up, huh? It's about damn time! Let's dance, ya ugly-shirt-wearin' embarrassment!
Lookin' for pilots, huh...? I did enjoy speedin' around in a Pork Bean car... Are you just fightin' to survive, or is there more at stake here?
Nope! I've never finished a book in my life. I just don't have the patience for that.
I've tried to read books before. Things go smoothly for the first few pages, then I realize I "finished" a chapter without actually readin' it.
Alright, classy cat comedian. Let's see what you've got!
Who knows? Maybe some kind of crime lord runs this place. There could be all kinds of shady things goin' on... or maybe they just run a bake sale on the weekends.
Well, I wouldn't call 'em a pet, but I do have this monkey pal. His name's Salsa! He's the sweetest lil' thing you'll ever meet. He's always lookin' out for his monkey girlfriend, Samba!
Sure I do. I barter with mole crickets all the time! They offer good prices on weapons, charms, 'n healin' items. They're usually in convenient locations, too!
You know, that doesn't surprise me. You're a freakin' weirdo, but you're also surprisingly sharp. Give me one about mankind's hubris.
I'm no poetry expert, but anything that comes outta that freaky brain of yours is bound to be... interesting. Give me a poem with some bite!
That power of yours is cool 'n all, but I don't like threats, Perona. Try anything funny and that cool dress of yours is goin' up in flames.
If you thinking threatenin' me with sad ghosts scares me, you've got another thing comin', lady! I've got powers of my own, 'n I know how to use 'em!
Yes, I'll tell the knife-weildin' ghost about my greatest fears. Are you kiddin' me?
Uh-huh, and my greatest fear is lyin' ghosts. Good thing there's none here, right?
My greatest fear is stupid ghosts askin' me about my greatest fears.
...No. I... haven't had the best experience with robots 'n stuff like that.
No.
Can't say the thought of meetin' someone here for that kinda thing didn't cross my mind...

He wasn't literally a pig, because that would've been an insult to pigs! He's a time-travelin', animal-abusin' sociopath. His name is Porky, which is probably where his weird pig obsession comes from.
I'm always carrying this pendant around. It's the only thing I have that my birth parents gave me, after all. It makes me feel like they're always here... Though, I'm glad they're not here for this.
...I've already talked my pendant, dude.
...Well damn, that hits close to home. Now I'm just sad...
I'm glad you asked. My hobbies include savin' the world, punchin' bad guys, commitin' general acts of ass-kickin' heroism, 'n leavin' the Gs off the ends of words!
I can understand the locket, I guess, but you're not even puttin' the knife down, huh? Does it get separation anxiety or somethin'?
The locket makes sense, but you're not gonna drop the knife? What, are you afraid of us or somethin'?
Aw, don't take it so hard. ~Player~ looked... uh, too heartbroken to move. Yeah...
...Don't worry, Perona, ~player~ noticed.~human.ifMale(He|She)~ were gettin' a little teary-eyed... for real.
That's not something you typically ask a buncha strangers, but... I want my friend Lucas to be happy. That kid's been through so much...
Well... My adopted family, the Magypsies, are all gone now. I don't want their memory to fade into history, so I'm tryin' to keep their traditions alive. That's what I want.
Heh. I knew a buncha ghosts that threw parties 'n drank wine. Of course, it'd just spill on the floor, but they liked it, I guess.
I knew a bunch of party-crazy ghosts back in Osohe Castle. They loved eatin' and drinkin', though it would just kinda... plop onto the floor under 'em.
That sounds excitin', but I think I'll have to test it out. Y'know, puttin' it in-and-out a whole bunch to really get a feelin' for it.
Oh yeah, totally. I've been usin' my blood ritual magic stuff to cheat at a strip poker game. You've got me all figured out, kid.
I don't, but my buddy Lucas really likes sunflowers. They were his Mom's favorite flower... he and his dad Flint usually leave a bunch at her grave.
No offense, but I'll pass. I never was one of those art nutsos. The last artsy guy I met was a ghost, n' he tried to make one outta me.
What kinda idiot goes around tellin' people that? What a garbage-spewin' fraud! Of course I don't believe it!
Hell no! Spewin' Kangashark crap about people like that is messed up. It takes a special kinda dumbass to think a nice guy like you enjoys that, Ignatz.
Assassin exam, huh? Well, I can't say I know too much about bein' all sneaky and stuff... but I think the general goal is killin' things. Hope that helps!
Hell yeah, that sounds awesome, Iggy! Paint me wearin' big ol' medieval armor! Oh, 'n give me a cool, flaming sword! And show me shootin' ice out of one of my hands, too!
Seriously? Cool! Paint me punchin' a dragon! Oh, and paint me drop-kickin' a demon! Oh, and paint my buddy Duster too, but give 'em a silly mustache!
I can't say I care much about flowers 'n all that... but my friend Lucas loves sunflowers. They were his Mom's favorite flower, so he likes plantin' them. He also likes to leave some at her grave...
You kiddin'? Birds love talkin', even if you don't wanna listen! Sparrows like givin' all kinds of useful advice, though.
Hey, that's not a bad idea! I've always been a fan of my legs. I don't use 'em to kick things like my pal Duster does, but I think they look nice... and so did the customers at Club Titiboo!
I like the way you think, Nami. Yeah, I've always liked my legs. They always got me attention when I was workin' at Club Titiboo.
Dreams, huh...? I strive for a peaceful world, so people like my buddy Lucas don't have their families ripped apart by evil, depraved jerkwards, who do it just for their own sick amusement.
Hm... The Magypsies raised me 'n taught me everything they know. I want to repay 'em by makin' sure they aren't ever forgotten! I do my best to carry on their legacy... just with wearin' less makeup.

Call it cheesy if you want, but I want a world where people and animals can exist in harmony. "King" Porky tried to stitch animals together 'n make 'em violent, like they're toys! I fight for a world where that doesn't happen.

...Make sure you stay far, far away from TaneTane Island. It's close to the Nowhere Islands, but it's isolated by strong currents. It's got mushrooms that make you see horrible things. Oh, and there's a trash dump there, too.
I don't blame ya for showin' that off, Amy! That's a butt to be proud of. ~player~ seems to think so, too!
Whoo! You know how to grab ~player~'s attention, Amy!
Sure, why not? I don't care much for the artsy side of things, but I know my way around a Sound Battle or two.
The last person who tried to teach me about classical music was an angry ghost. You're not either of those things, so I'm down for listenin'.
I'm not big on technology, considerin' what it did to the Nowhere Islands... but I'll admit that cars are pretty cool.
I've had less-than-stellar impressions of technology, seeing how it corrupted the Nowhere Islands... Cars are super fun, though.
I already knew that, but it's still annoying as hell! I'm just glad you're droppin' the "clueless airhead" voice you've been usin'.
If you're wantin' to fool people, maybe don't use that dumbass "I'm so helpless and airheaded" voice. It just announces to everyone that you think we're stupid.
You sure did! I'd take gettin' naked with strangers over sittin' at a boring-ass beauty pageant any day.

Heh! That sounds like my buddy Duster. He's a strong, agile, 'n tough fighter that can deliver some mean kicks with his limp leg! He's very skilled in the Thief Arts... but he's also a bit bum-like and gets into all kinds of trouble on his own.
Uh... that's an interesting way to use your ice powers... Frostbite ain't sexy, though!
From that laid-back attitude of yours, I'd say you've been around the block once or twice, Leon. You think a guy like you could show an inexperienced gal like me the ropes?
Is that so...? Color me interested, ~leon~...
Do ya, now...? Alright, I'll nibble on the bait you're castin', ~leon~.
You wanna know what I'd do with that, huh? I'd like to explore it with my hands, glidin' my fingers all around it, lookin' for your weak spots...
Well, ~leon~, I've always wondered how it'd... taste. I wanna see the way you squirm as I work my tongue on ya...
You strike me as the type who enjoys takin' the lead, ~leon~. Maybe you could show me what your favorite moves are, hmm?
Well, I'm sure you know what you're doin', ~leon~, but I'd prefer to set the pace. Lookin' down at ya while you're on your back sounds like a good place to start.

Awww, cut me some slack! You don't see someone in a walkin' tank everyday, or some lady steppin' out of it with a wetsuit on, either!
...Okay, I guess you do, but still.
C'mon, lady. Seein' some woman in a tight-ass wetsuit makin' her fancy, brightly-colored armor dissapear ain't exactly a common sight. Except for you.
Hell yeah! You're lookin' good, girl! I'd say I actually find ya kinda hot.
Of course you look good! You have such pretty blue hair, and you're rockin' that rack of yours!
To be perfectly blunt, you've been really doin' it for me. You're obviously doin' somethin' right.
Awww, you're kinda shy, ain't ya? You're a beautiful dame, Sayaka. ~player~ obviously can't keep their eyes off ya, and I don't blame 'em.
Judgin' by how both ~player~ n' I have had our eyes glued to the sight of ya, yes, you're a hot chick.
Heheh. If ya want the answer to that question, just take a look at ~player~. They've been checkin' you out this whole time. Me too, of course.
...Wait. I was so busy blabberin' that I didn't notice what you took off. You don't look any different to me...
So, Amy, what do you like to do for fun? Other than gettin' naked with ~player~, I mean.
I already know that you enjoy gettin' slightly more nude than usual with ~player~, but what other hobbies do you have, Amy?
Funeral Director, huh? That... wasn't my first guess. What led you to do that kinda work, anyways?
That's... a surprise, and I'm not sure why. What drew you to that line of work, Hooter?
Hey, ~amy~? You have a hard time focusin', right? Do you want me or ~player~ to warn ya if you start strippin' a bunch of stuff by accident?
Y'know what, ~yuri~? I like you! I'm gonna give you a nickname, but I want you to pick it. I normally give people sarcastic names, so this is a rare opportunity.
You've been pretty cool so far, ~yuri~. I wanna give you a nickname... I'm gonna let you choose what it is. You're a sweet gal, so I don't want to give ya something snarky.
Nah, don't feel bad! It's cool hearin' about your home. I can tell you stuff about mine, if you want!
I haven't dated any men, Meia. I did travel with two of 'em on my journeys, though. One was a kid named Lucas, 'n the other was a bum-lookin' thief named Duster.
I was never big on the datin' scene, but I can tell ya that men are just people. There's good ones, and bad ones, being human beings n' all.
Well, not personally. I did know this one married couple. Flint 'n Hinawa were their names. They say their love made the birds in the tree jealous.
Pfffft! It ain't rocket science, you know. All I had to do was giggle at their dumb jokes n' give 'em a wink.
.. Seriously? You, of all people, are havin' trouble with gettin' guys? You're already a bombshell! Just giggle when ya talk to 'em, and you're set.
If you think I'm gonna start playin' harder because you bribed me... You'd be completely right! It's a deal.
It's probably not "becoming" of royalty to take bribes... but they wouldn't be playin' this game, either. You're on!
Oh, you know this lady, ~player~? I guess she talks loud enough for the both of ya.
You sure know how to pick 'em, ~player~. She is kinda cute, I guess?
Man, she's eager to talk about ya, ~player~! Who could blame her? You seem like a fun ~player.ifMale(dude|lady)~.
Talkin' about ~player~ again? Already? Heh! I can see where she's comin' from. You seem like a cool ~player.ifMale(dude|lady)~!
Oh! So, hey! Try Osohe Castle! It's got a lot of art, not to mention ghosts! There's even artistically-inclined ghosts, too!
Well, it might not be the most excitin' place around, but humble lil' Tazmily Village might be worth a visit. We wouldn't mind showin' you folks around!
Well, there was this one time I ran into a floatin' frog wearin' a tutu. He said his name was "Magic Butterfrog". Is that a weird enough word for ya?
I've always found the word "Antidisestablishmentarianism" to be kinda weird soundin'.
You must know all about "humiliatin'" if you walk around in that getup everyday...
...I think if this person is goin' around, doin' nothin' but creating mayhem, destruction n' death, then they gotta be put down.
Me n' my friends had to fight a bratty, disgusting, hateful tyrant.He would have destroyed the last place on Earth for people to live, and he even wanted to end the universe. I'd kill 'em.
Sometimes, you gotta make that call, and it never comes easy. Without gettin' too heavy, my buddy Lucas had to make the worst choice possible to save the world, and he pulled through.
...Life is full of these tough situations. I've had to do some things I ain't proud of. I think the guilt means you're still a good person, 'cause that means ya still care about who gets hurt.
Whoa...really? That's pretty stupid, honestly!
That's about the dumbest thing I've ever heard. Trust me, I've heard and seen some super dumb stuff, dude.
Nope! I don't have a single dollar to my name, Polly. It turns out that just bein' called a princess doesn't make your life a cushy paradise.
Nah, that's tryin' too hard... How about "The Orange O-nnihilator"? That suits you.
Hmm... I think we can do better. How about "Poker Powerhouse Pinelli"?
That's kind of crap, so I'll do ya one better! I think "Lewd Lovin' Lance Lady" is perfect!
Cute, huh...? I'd say Mr. Saturns are cute, in their own weird, small, big-nosed way. They say the weirdest things!
C-cute... This one time, my thief buddy Duster said I look cute when I cry... Smug bastard...
There's this one frog that loves drivin' around Tazmily, in a tiny, frog-sized car! Watchin' him zoom around is weirdly hypnotic...
If that's keepin' the float in your boat, why not? It's not gonna kill me. Probably.
Hey, if faith keeps your plane in the sky, more power to ya. It can't hurt. Hopefully.
(This chick isn't talkin'... but I can kinda understand what she's thinkin', almost like something's narrating for her. I'm gonna try something on her turn...)
(I don't know why this girl ain't talkin', but... It's almost like she doesn't need to. It's like she has a narrator or whatever. I've got an idea...)
Oh! A tall, loud skeleton with a cool outfit! Yeah, sure, why not?
Nice outfit, dude! I'll miss that girl from earlier, but you seem like fun! I won't say no to a loud skeleton.
Snnrk! Yeah, it's a real mystery, ain't it?
I'm a fan of rock in general, but I'm pretty much down with anything! Well, as long as the beat doesn't constantly change. That just gives me this weirdest anxiety...
I'm sure it's weird to you, but I consider them family. I find that fightin' and strugglin' together tends to help people bond.
Heh! Yeah, they're a buncha' dorks, but I trust 'em with my life. They're the best kinds of friends!
...My bad, Meia. I don't mean to talk down to ya. The idea of the two genders thinkin' the other one ain't human is just kinda... alien to me. No pun intended.
I, uh, don't mean to be insensitive or whatever. The concept of the opposite gender not being seen as human is... slightly weird-as-hell for me.
Yeah, I guess that's true. I haven't met the love of my life yet... but I also haven't been losin' sleep over it.
You'll get there, Meia. Probably when you least expect it!
Yeah, I guess we are kinda strange, huh? Most priestess-types 'n princess-types wouldn't come to a place like this, huh?
You know what? I guess some pink-haired lady callin' themselves a fire-shootin' princess is a little weird, huh? Haha!
I didn't have much contact with people other than the Magypsies, but at least there were six of 'em. Did you have anyone else at all?
That's rough, Fina. I at least had the six Magypsies to talk to, and sometimes this old coot named Wess. Were you totally alone?
It just so happens that I've got experience fightin' stuff that threatens the world at large. Sounds like a good cause to me!
Hell, I've already fought a regime that put the entire planet in danger. I might as well beat my record and save several planets.
Pfft. This Goddess is the one that gave ya a willie to begin with, right? She's also the one that gave ya... "urges". I'd say this is perfectly natural, Iggy.
You might say I'm a little bit proud of what I'm packin' in the trunk, Nami.
...If you say so, Fluff.
Snnrk! I'm flattered you think I'm hot enough for that, but I was just a waitress. It wasn't a strip joint, despite the name!
Pfft! While I'm sure that woulda made a lot of people happy, I didn't strip at the Club. I was just a waitress. Thanks, though!
I'm takin' up their frilly mantle 'n keeping The Nowhere Islands safe. I'm a little more hands-on than they were, though!
Magypsies have the power to see PSI potential in people, 'n even "activate" it. I'm tryin' to figure out how to do that... Not a lot of luck so far.
Yeah, I'd be down for that, Mari. The piano is a cool instrument. You can do classical, funk, 'n even rock with it!
Snnrk! That's too dumb to offend me. Ya don't floss your hair, ya stinkin' goober.
Heh. Try something, and I set you, that frilly dress, and that freaky doll on fire. Capiche?
I wonder what part of ya will freeze first after I blast ya with ice. I'm bettin' your head will be last.
Huh! That's surprisingly sweet and down to earth, Miko. You ain't wrong!
Well, "used to fight" would be more accurate. They were an army of idiots wearin' pig costumes, callin' themselves "The Pigmasks". They were lead by a guy named Porky.
I'm sure that painting will make me look badass, ~ignatz~, but you're the one bringin' it to life. You're the one inspirin' people. Remember that.
Couldn't have said it better myself, ~jessie~! I'd just tell your manager to stuff it. A little chub never hurt anyone, anyways!
You've got refined tastes, ~jessie~! Besides, a lil' bit of plumpness is cute! Your manager's not very good at his job if he can't see that.
...You're good, ~jessie~. You know just what to say, don't ya? I'm not shy about you showin' me how a pro does it...
...Man, you know just the right thing to say to start a fire goin' in the loins, huh? You showin' me how a pro handles things sounds good to me...
How... creative,Pit. I'm the one who asked, though, so why not?
You're not winnin' any points for creativity, but it works, Pit! "Tora" it is.
"Drink of the Gods", huh? I'm guessin' that's not somethin' you can just order at any ol' vending machine, huh?
If they're gonna call it "Drink of the Gods", it better be good. I'm guessin' you can't just buy it at any ol' food stall.

Oh, step off, L'arafrufru. What do you know?
...Actually, I don't know if my parents named me, or if the Magypsies did. Huh.
"Rausten", huh? Is that your home turf, ~larachel~? What's it like?
Brought it back to life, huh...? That sounds a lot like what happened to someone I knew. Let the dead rest.
They revived it, 'n welded a cannon on it's back... I don't like how similar that is to what happened to him... Death's supposed to bring ya peace.
"Tora," huh? It's not winnin' any creativity points, but it's short 'n sweet! I like it.
"Tora." I like it! You might not be blowin' me away with your creativity, but who cares? It's short, sweet, and kinda cool soundin'.
...Though, it does take a lot of energy to do, if you use it too much. Nothin' a good soak in a hotspring can't fix, at least. Does usin' magic make you tired?
...To be honest, though, overuse can really exhaust ya. At least takin' a nice soak in a hotspring will fix ya right up. Does usin' magic wear you out?
...Twins, huh? Funny you mention that. I happen to be close to a guy who had a twin brother. I hear they used to be inseparable...
What're the odds of that...? I know a guy who had a twin brother, too. He talks about 'em all the time, and they used to be inseparable...
Just your regular name, huh? Alright, that's fine by me. Those dumbasses who gave ya bad nicknames are missin' out on makin' friends with a cool lady like you.
