If that's what you want, sure! The idiots who gave you a hard time don't deserve to be friends with you anyways.
"Lily" it is, then! A pretty name for a pretty awesome lady. I bet the people who made fun of ya don't have the guts to play strip poker.
"Lily" sounds good to me! A cool person deserves a cool name. Those morons wouldn't do something bold 'n adventurous like playin' strip poker.
I'd say family is very important. I never knew my birth parents, but the Magypsies raised as one of their own. They meant the world to me.
(I'm gettin' a weird impulse to comment on Miku's height all of a sudden...)
(I don't know why, but I'm gettin' a strong urge to comment on Miku's shortness... Since it didn't end so well last time I teased Lucas for his height, though, I'll keep my trap shut.)
You musta' read my mind! Or, more accurately, my gut. I personally love me some nut bread with a side of magic gelatin! This lady in Tazmily can bake a mean loaf of bread.
Nope! Not even once. Hell, I've never played any card games before.
Not even once in my life, lil' mage. I did study up a bit on the rules before I came here, but that's it.
...Wait, what? You use a net to collect cabbage? Does it run away from you or somethin'?
What kinda weird-ass cabbage do you guys have where you're from? Someone usin' a net to catch the cabbage is 'bout the dumbest thing I've ever heard.
Green's not a bad choice, but do ya really gotta call it "slime green"? Anyway, pink's always been my color, if ya couldn't tell.
Yep, n' gladly too! Slap, punch, kick, elbow drop... Those are the tools of the butt-kickin' trade! You do what you've gotta do.
Yeah, I do. The folks back home on the Nowhere Islands respected nature. That is, until Lard King Porky showed up n' started addin' robot parts to all the animals...
My home, the Nowhere Islands, was a peaceful, humble little place... until Porky, the fat Pig King, came and started tearin' everything apart.
Thanks, Zoe! I like your hoodie and... leg-mouth. You're right, the Magypsies kept tryin' to get me to dress all fancy-like. It came in handy when I had to lay low. I hear you're good at it, too.
Yup. They're known for throwin' parties and not smellin' particularly nice. They like collectin' rotten eclairs, after all. They hassle anyone who goes inside the castle.
They're really... real, Meia. They like throwin' parties, and the rowdier ones pick fights with people in the castle. They like rotten eclairs, too, which explains their... smell.
I'm glad you've come around! Er, no pun intended. The Goddess wouldn't have given ya a boomstick if you weren't supposed to use it.
Nah.
Nope, I'm good.
Okay, besides that bein' the most irresponsible thing I've ever heard, the Needles only tell if you've got a pure heart, not if you've done any crimes.
Ya sure about that? The people on the Nowhere Islands got along just fine without all of that crap.
"We are the miracles", huh? I like it! You've got a kickass singin' voice, Amy.
I've never heard of "Yakiniku" before, 'n it sounds like some kinda horrible disease... but sure, why not?
Gee, you're a real saint, showin' that much restraint, Saki.
Sure thing, Miku. It's not gonna win any creativity points, but I like it anyways.
"Wyvern", huh? Never heard of 'em, but they sound badass! I'm also bettin' they ain't easy to tame, right?
Yeah, deer are pretty cool animals. They can also be pretty dangerous, actually, if someone makes 'em into a Chimera...
Hands-on experience, huh? That doesn't sound very noble 'n hoighty-toighty to me, m'lady.
Heh, you've got me there! I like all kinds of sweets, but there's plenty of other stuff out there too. At least you're not picky!
A fellow sweets lover, huh? Where I'm from, sweet foods restore your PSI power. Is it like that where you're from, too?
"KT", huh? I'm diggin' it! That'll do the trick. Not bad, Hilda.
Psh! "Cursed", my ass. I get the feelin' you enjoy sayin' your own name.
You, uh... You sure know how to pick 'em, ~player~...
Ugh! What the hell's goin' on with your eyes?!
Wha- Like you weren't creepy enough already...!
You, uh... You sure know how to pick 'em, ~player~...
Ugh! What the hell's goin' on with your eyes?!
Wha- Like you weren't creepy enough already...!
Awww, what's the matter? Feelin' the pressure, even though I'm butt naked? I didn't know demons were so easy to scare.
...Just shut up 'n play, "all-powerful demon" Chara.
Yeah, yeah, I'd be shakin' in my boots, if I still had 'em on, anyway.
You're lookin' kinda nervous over there, Chara. What's a strong, almighty demon afraid of?
This is it! Time to finally shut you up!
This'll settle things! You're not the first homicidal maniac I've put in their place!
Not sure about 'em, huh? Maybe you should come see mine! It's got plenty of space and some soft-ass carpet! You'd like it, Fluff.
Heh! Good point, Soo. Life's pretty empty if you don't have somethin' pushin' ya forward.
That's true, Soo! People need something to work towards. That's what keeps you goin' through life's rough patches.
That kid is the toughest person I've ever met, Soo. He's doin' better than ever, and I couldn't be more proud of 'im!
Don't worry, Soo! He never stops gettin' back on his feet, no matter how often life kicks 'im in the shins! He's tougher than dried gum!
Don't mention it. Your crew is always welcome to stay at Tazmily, if you ever find yourselves out there.
You've got a good head on your shoulders, Soo. If you guys somehow find yourselves at The Nowhere Islands, you're welcome to stay in Tazmily as long as you need.
They don't really serve a purpose, as far as I can tell. I just know they wash up on the beach all the time... It's not any weirder than collectin' trivia cards.
Beats me! I just pick 'em up when I see them at the beach. People collect all kinds of useless crap, like trivia cards.
Rolls right off the tongue, Miko. I shoulda asked Tojiko.
Huh. You've got more friends than I would've guessed, Miko. How did you win over their loyalties, anyway?
Speakin' of dancin'... You sing and dance as an idol, right? Which do you prefer doing, Homegirl?
Yikes. I bet you wouldn't be sayin' that if ya actually met one, ~perona~. What did big noses ever do to you, anyway?
Yeesh! I didn't know havin' a long nose was a war crime or something. I bet you'd be singin' a different tune if ya actually met a Mr. Saturn.
I know it's a cliche, but knowledge is power. Power-hungry dictators can whiff out ignorance right away. I've got some leftover DP you can have.
What, do you think I'm made of paper or somethin'? We're gettin' naked, lady. Just about anything is appropriate here!
Do I even have pubes? Who knows? Maybe I shave. I'm flattered you're thinkin' that far ahead, Twin-tail Tyrant.
"Cummy-tora". You can do better than that. That's low-hangin' fruit. It's like me callin' ya "Tiny Tits Tina" or something.
Well, now... How could I say "no" when you've got that twinkle in your eye?
"Flam-babe" is gold, so hell yeah, I'll take it! You're one tough lady yourself, so I think I'll be callin' ya "Fist Mistress".
Only if ya come over here 'n make me, "Mama Mimi".
How about we make this a truly royal, hoity-toity game of strip poker, your royal "Thigh-highness"?
"Wildfire", huh? Yeah, I like that! Thanks. You've got the same fire ragin' in your belly, you know. Maybe I should be callin' ya "Hellion".
My friends like to call me that, actually. Since I'm gonna see you naked 'n diggin' into yourself, I'd say you qualify as "friend", Classi!
Snnnrk! Sizzle Tits! Holy crap, that's amazing. Those are way too good for me to get offended!
Nope! Those are all terrible, Rosa. I appreciate the effort, though.
Guns are for wimps, anyways. I find a nice, long hike helps you clear your mind. Sounds like he could use that.
Anytime I need to get my mind off of things, I like to take a long hike. I just let my feet take me where they want! Guns are for chumps, by the way.
What, you think I can't bear the burden of such an unladylike name? "Kuma" works just fine, ~ignatz~.
I think getting hit because you were worried about your glasses would've been way more embarassin'.
Dark secrets? No, not really. I'd like to think I'm a pretty straight-forward gal. I don't have anything to hide.
That's a dangerous game you're playin', Jessie. It's easy to tell yourself no one's gettin' hurt.
Well, smokin' stinks, and really clings to ya. However, if that's your thing, I don't really care.
So, ~hilda~, mind tellin' me about this "Claude" character? It sounds like he's a sneaky guy, but you trust 'em anyway.
You wanna tell me about this "Claude" guy, ~hilda~? The way you talk about 'em makes him sound sneaky, but you clearly trust him, too.
...People like suckin' directly on a cow's udder? That's... kinda-super-gross.
That's not a bad idea... but I want ya to earn it, ~jessie~. It's not a pay-off without a lil' teasin'.
I like the way you think, ~jessie~... Life's no fun without a lil' teasin', though. If you want to see my hoodie hit the road, you've gotta earn it.
I can believe it, ~jessie~. You fit right in here. How about you tell me about one of these pals of yours?
Makes sense to me, ~jessie~. This kind of place fits ya like a glove! Wanna tell me about one of these friends you've got?
What, you mean everyone callin' you a princess doesn't automatically turn your blood blue? Maybe I would've learned that if I went to fancy princess school.
You're tellin' me that everyone just callin' me a princess doesn't fill my veins with blue blood? I probably would've learned that at frilly princess school, I guess.
...Altering it in a way you don't like, huh? Sounds like we've got some common ground here, ~perona~. I know what that's like...
Now there's a respectable goal! Havin' a place where you can relax 'n hang out with your buddies is pretty much sacred, ain't it?
That's a dream you can be proud of, ~natsuki~! I'd say that a fun place where you can relax with your buddies 'n enjoy some good is downright sacred.
Well, you won't be winnin' any originality points, but I like it. Straight to the point!
It ain't fancy, but I'll take it! It's kinda cute.
...None at all? Uh, geez, sorry. You seem like a sweet gal, though. I guess I wouldn't mind bein' your new pal.
You mentioned "unlikely allies," right? I know about those. My own crew had a shy kid, a thief with giant staples, 'n a dog who could walk on two legs!
"Unlikely allies," huh? You 'n me both. Back home, I rolled with a shy, psychic kid, a thief that used giant staples, 'n a dog who could walk around on his back legs!
Nah, water doesn't bother me. I spend a lot of time soakin' in hot springs. Maybe bein' able to shoot ice and lightning helps balance it out or something.
Gettin' a little wet never ruined my day. I can shoot ice 'n lightning too, so maybe that balances out the elements or whatever. It doesn't keep me away from hot springs, at least!
There's an entire city of people like me? I'm surprised it hasn't burned to the ground or something! I take it that's where you're from? Maybe I should visit sometime.
Is that so? A place full of Kumatora-like people must be pretty rowdy. I'm guessin' you're pretty tough if ya survived livin' there. Maybe I should take a tour sometime, huh?
You didn't have to flirt, huh? How about we slap the ol' Club Titiboo waitress uniform on ya 'n see how you do? I bet you'll be a natural.
Didn't get your flirtin' practice in, huh? This place is as good as any, I guess. Maybe if we got ya all dolled up in a waitress outfit, you'd be a pro in no time.
...Police are the guys who go around throwin' people in jail 'n eatin' donuts, right? Can't say I ever pictured myself bein' one. What does the International Police do?
I'm pretty sure the police are the dudes runnin' around with donuts 'n throwin' criminals in jail. I never thought about bein' one before. What does the International Police do?
"Kumie". Yeah, I don't think so, buddy. I've got a good nickname for you, though. How does "Hugh Bort" sound? I think we'll just call ya "Bort" for short.
What're you babblin' about, lady? You're makin' ~player~ nervous.
Huh? I don't know what you're talkin' about, but you're makin' ~player~ all twitchy 'n weird.
"Tora" works for me. I've got the eye of the tiger, after all! At least, that's what some ol' coot back home used to say.
Sure! "Tora" is short 'n sweet. Plus, some crusty ol' geezer back home used to say I've got "the eye of the tiger," too!
A fellow newbie, huh? I've heard some guys don't last very long on their first time, but they get better over time. You've gotta whip 'em into shape!
Heh. I'm new to sex stuff too, but even I know that some dudes don't last long on their first time. It just takes practice.
Nope. No fancy tricks up, down, or around my sleeve, ~magical_sempai~. Parlor tricks ain't my thing.
You can't replicate it with magic, 'cause it's PSI. It's sophisticated. Not some hooey-phooey illusion.
Well, it's pretty simple. You've gotta let me drag ya to a special hot spring, 'n dunk ya under the water for an extended period of time. It's not guaranteed though.
Easy! Get your butt to the Nowhere Islands, 'n let me dunk ya in a special hot spring! After you're in there for a while, you might awaken new PSI powers. Or not!
...Yeah. I'd say so. Bein' able to take life's gut-punches 'n walk it off ain't easy.
...It is, ~kaz~. A friend of mine... had it rough. Took him years to get himself outta that hole. Metaphorically. Not an actual hole.
I dunno about that "brand" stuff, but... I appreciate that, ~kaz~. You're a smooth one, ain't ya?
Wow. I had to process that answer for a minute. Can't tell ya what my "brand" is, but I can tell ya it was a sweet thing to say. You're not so bad, ~kaz~.
...Also, is it normal for your species to be as blind as you are? I'm no insect.
Smug-ass alien, callin' me an insect... Maybe you should use your space technology to fix your eyesight.
That's an... interesting combination. Do ya cook the leek, or eat it raw?

Pardon me, esteemed guests, but since I'm taking part in this fun little game, I won't be taking any orders. Apologies for the inconvenience.
*giggle*

Forgive the interruption, but I'm actually a player in this fun game of strip poker. I won't be able to get you snacks or beverages for the time being. I hope you understand.
*giggle*
Okay, startin' to feel mighty silly just standin' around naked. Let's wrap this up.
I won't lie; standing here naked is kinda embarrassing. But if my lil' monkey pal Salsa can put up with Fassad makin' him dance like a circus freak, then I can put up with some nudity.
Gettin' down to the wire.... this has been a slog, but I ain't down for the count quite yet!
This game is takin' a while, ain't it ~player~? You don't seem to mind it too much, if you're constant starin' at my birthday suit means anythin'. Not that I mind, of course.
...Ya know, I'm used to bein' naked at a hot spring, but that's with my buddies. Standin' around nude with people you don't know while not submerged in warm water is a whole different ballgame.
...I'm not a fan of this "war of attrition" crap. Let's end this game already!
...We're havin' a real hoot, I see. It's that time of the year again, huh?
You fancy yourself a funny guy, ~player~? Your jokes can't be any worse than Alec's terrible puns.
You know what's a real good joke? Nintendo releasing my game overseas. The day that happens, I'll wear a clownsuit.
Are any of you guys regulars here? I've been enjoyin' myself so far, so I might decide to come back to this place again if I can hang out with more of you cool folks.
There ain't much strategy to this strippin' version of poker. I ain't whining, though. Something a little more laid back like this is more my speed anyway.
Yo. The name's Kumatora. My hobbies include throwin' fireballs, throwin' punches, and maybe saving the world.
Kumatora's my name, and slingin' PSI around is my game. Nice to meetcha!
You chumps are playin' with a princess, you know? I'm a real shinin' example of dignity, grace, and all of that stupid crap. Heh!
Hey. I'm Kumatora, and I'm representin' the Nowhere Islands! Let's have a good time n' stuff.
Yo! I'm Kumatora. I'm much more used to fightin' bad guys than gettin' naked with strangers, but I'm here anyway.
If you could choose one kick-ass superpower, what would you want? PSI is nice... but bein' able to conjure up a hot spring anywhere I want is better.
"What if" questions are pretty fun, yeah? If you folks could pick a super power, what would ya go for? I'd want to have the ability to never get my clothes dirty. Laundry sucks.
So... how about a hypothetical... thingy? Would you rather be extremely poor, but with good health? Or would you rather be extremely rich, but you're sick and smelly all the time?

Let's say you're forced to eat one of two mushrooms. The first makes you constantly horny, but won't let ya get off. The second makes you never feel horny again, but makes ya get off every single day. Which do ya pick?
Uh... how about a hypothetical situation that I made up? If there existed a machine that was completely, absolutely safe, but required you to be sealed in it forever, would you do it?
Well, I'm out of my hoodie now... Hey, ~player~. I've learned how to flirt 'n stuff back at Club Titiboo. How's about I show off my skills, hm?
Whelp! You don't need psychic powers to tell you're not into ladies, ~player~. That's no big deal. You still seem like a cool dude.
I know I called your clothes frufru, but it's pretty obvious your personality is also drippin' with frufru energy. "L'Arafrufru" it is!
It's pretty clear that goofy-ass frufru stuff is a big part of your life, lady. I'm thinkin' "L'Arafrufru" is a fittin' name for ya!
Does this place do anything other than poker? You know, somethin' like Boxing Night At The Inventory on the weekends or somethin'.
I think I'm gettin' the hang of it. Don't count on me turnin' cocky, though.
Yeesh. We've been here for like... five minutes, and I've seen some weirdos walkin' around. This place attracts all kinds, huh?
I hope my table horse is safe out there in the parkin' lot... What? Well, I guess a "table horse" is kinda weird. It's a table thing that you ride on, like a horse. The Mr. Saturns lent it to us.
...Sorry, didn't mean to bring the mood down. I wasn't expectin' to get... sappy.
I've fought the Grease Tyrant Porky, 'n his army of Pigmask goons. They were catchin' animals, rippin' off their body parts, and mixin' 'em together! Made 'em violent, too!

So, yeah, I use somethin' called PSI! It's like magic, but cooler. Not everyone has potential for it, 'n not everyone can use the same PSI. My psychic specialty happens to be butt-kickin' stuff, like shootin' fire.
Long story short, I traveled around the Nowhere Islands my buddies, kickin' butt 'n savin' the world! I'll tell ya about 'em in a second.
The population's pretty light, back home on the Nowhere Islands. Pretty much everyone who is there lives in Tazmily Village.
Uh, ice breaker... I used to work at a place called "Club Titiboo". Yeah, yeah, giggle at that dumb name. I was workin' undercover there as a waitress. That place taught me the flirtin' arts.
I didn't know gettin' naked makes ya hungry... Hey, everyone has their favorite foods, right? What's you guy's favorite?
Everybody's got that "one special food", 'n you're lyin' if you say otherwise. What're some of yours?
"Kumatora" is kind of a pain to say, ain't it? Maybe I should use a nickname or somethin'. Any suggestions?
Uh, I guess I should explain what that means, huh? I found some super powerful gloves, called the Mystical Gloves, on a Monkalrus.
To clarify, I beat up this enemy called a Monkalrus, 'n it dropped the Mystical Gloves. They're powerful 'n sparkly.
My blonde, slightly-younger pal Lucas had a lot of healin' PSI. He could patch up your wounds, cure sickness, and even get you back on your feet when you're knocked out!
Oh, Doria was one of the Magypsies. She had a heart as big as her belly, 'n was always real nice. She never could teach me how to win with grace, though.
Rope Snake was... uh, a snake that could be used like a rope. He's was always so gung-ho about his jaw strength.
So... anybody have any favorite instruments? I'm an electric guitar kinda gal myself, but what about you guys?
Oh! You probably don't know what Soot Dumplings are. They're little critters made of soot! They only appear if a house burns down. They're rare and bring good luck if ya find 'em!
...Sorry, ~hu_tao~. I shouldn't fly off the broom handle like that. It's just... I've seen a lot of things get yanked away by death's hand. It still hurts, y'know?
The Magypsies have taught me everythin' I know, from PSI, history, and how to brush my teeth . They tried to teach me patience, but that lesson never stuck. Let's finish up, yeah?
Man, Flint would kick ass at this game. Patience is totally his forte. He spent 3 years searching for his missing son, every single day. A long poker game would be nothin'.
Ugh... hurry your butts up already! This game is gonna drag on forever at this pace.
This game is going by pretty damn slowly, ain't it? It kinda reminds me of those times Lucas would get feverish while walkin' around, and we were forced to walk at a snail's pace.
So, here's a question for you guys. How open were your parents about teachin' ya about sex n' stuff? The Magypsies were pretty nonchalant about it, so this kind of thing doesn't bother me.

This Inventory place feels much more "modern" than Tazmily, or at least, before Porky got his hands on it. This place doesn't feel any near as slimy, though. Impressive, considerin' the juices that get spilled here.

One aspect of my PSI powers is telepathy. I don't typically use that, though. It feels real crappy to barge into people's heads without askin' or wipin' your proverbial feet at the proverbial door, ya know?
I'm guessin' you like what you see, ~player~. Heh! Don't worry. You're not hard on the eyes yourself, you know.
Which do you guys prefer: Cats, or dogs? I'm more of a monkey fan, personally.
I've always been kinda proud of what I'm packin'. What do you guys think?
Since you guys have been starin' at the front, how about you tell me if the rear is lookin' good?
I don't care too much about my looks, but I admit to likin' what I've got back here. See?
Huh? A lot like who, Amy?
Hey, I don't doubt it, Nat! We're both fine-lookin' pink ladies, but I'm bettin' there's stuff you're way better at than me.
I like to hone my PSI skills, 'n keep the Nowhere Islands safe from bad guys. Gettin' naked with cute guys 'n girls might be a new hobby of mine, too.
Uh... ~Player~, did I say somethin' wrong? Amy 'n Nat are just kinda... starin' at me.
Nah, you're fine! I think it's refreshin' to talk to someone who knows exactly what they want. I plan on hittin' on ya some more.
Striking, huh? I like it! Personally, I find Nat to be pretty hot! Like I said earlier, she's got a small body mixed with large personality! There's just somethin' nice about that combo.
Haha! Straight to the point! My hoodie is baggy, but my boobs are pretty decent, too. Bigger than I'd like, actually.
Let her have her fun, Nat. We're all here to have a good time, right? I bet ~player~ was hopin' you two would bond!
Where's the fun in spoilin' the surprise, Amy? If you're wantin' to explore me, you've gotta earn it.
I''m guessin' she's tryin' to decide if she'd rather be with you, me or ~player~. I don't see why we can't mix 'n match...
It's why I wish I had smaller boobles. I wouldn't need the "support".
You're thinkin' about somethin' fun, aren't ya?
Do you even have to ask, Amy? You've been catchin' me eye this whole game, you know.
'Course I will! The big sister's gotta take charge, right?
Oh yeah, I practically live here, Mari. That means I've seen you lurkin' around here all the time. Kinda naughty of ya, ain't it?
There's a lot of guys like that, ~hu_tao~. Most can't handle the heat, but I'm wonderin' if Mr. Kennedy here is built different...
There's no shortage of men like that, ~hu_tao~. A lot of 'em get burned, but Mr. Kennedy here looks like he's made of tougher stuff.

Heehee! While Club Titiboo's uniforms are beautiful, they're also incredibly, horribly uncomfortable! I kinda hate it!
*giggle*

While I appreciate the compliment, Miss, I'm afraid that's not the case. As gorgeous as these uniforms are, they are some of the most uncomfortable costumes imaginable! It's awful!
*giggle*
Dollin' myself up was never my thing, really. I did wear a frilly waitress uniform for a while, but I hated it. That might've been because I didn't have a choice, though.
What, my hoodie isn't pretty enough for ya? I did have to work as a waitress for a while, 'n I was forced to wear a super girly outfit. Maybe I'd hate it less if I did it for fun.
Heh! This ain't exactly an outfit you'd wear on a girl's night out, I take it. I wouldn't know, 'cause I've never had a "girl's night out."
I'm guessin' that means this isn't your typical "ladies night" getup, huh? I've never had one of those before, so I wouldn't have a clue.
You betcha! My Club Titiboo uniform looks just like what you're wearin'! You seem a lot more comfortable in it than I was, though.
Heh. Good eye, little lady. You look just like I did in my Club Titiboo uniform... except you seem to actually like it.
How could you tell? Maybe you've got those fancy-pants PSI abilities I hear so much about.
No way...! Nothin' gets past you, little lady. You sure you're not one of those "psychics" people talk about?

...I won't lie. I've thought about once. Twice.
...Several times. I ain't gigglin' to that.
...Alright, you've got me. The thought crossed my mind this one time. Then another time. Then a third... But who's countin'?

My apologies, sir, but I'm not actually part of this establishment's staff. I just thought this outfit would be a hoot 'n a holler to wear.
*giggle~*

If you ordered some drinks, sir, I won't be fetchin' 'em for ya. I'm sorry to say that this is just a costume. I don't represent this establishment's quality of service!
*giggle~*
...It's kinda hard to take you seriously, talkin' about the "human form" while lookin' like a fruit-flavored robot.
Heh. "Fierce", maybe. I'm not so sure about the "cub" part, though. Then again, you seem like the "wise sage" type.
"Strong", huh? I'll take it! I'm not exactly a "cub", though. You've been around the block, I take it?
"Mimic", my ass! I'm the human-est human you'll ever meet, Badass Bounty Hunter Lady!
Pffft. I'm as human as you can get, Cool Bounty Hunter Space Lady!
...You got some kinda magical power that lets ya see through clothes? I haven't taken my hoodie off yet.
Thanks, but... I'm still rockin' this hoodie. Do your french fries let ya see through clothes or somethin'?
Fate's a pretty cheeky bastard like that, huh? We were destined to see each other naked.
Ain't that the truth? Fate's a smug bastard sometimes. It really wants us to see each other naked.
Maybe that'd be more intimidatin' if you did your fightin' yourself.
I'd probably take you a lil' more seriously if you actually did your own fightin', lady.
Yeah, it is a neat trick, ain't it? Chuckin' fireballs is an even better one.
Oh yeah, I'm real popular at parties, Revy. Up until I freeze someone solid or zap 'em with lightning, anyways.
I don't remember the Snooty Princess Guidebook sayin' that "royalty" can't be comfortable, lady. I like my hoodie!
I guess I should be followin' your example, huh? A fancy, frilly pirate is still a pirate, you know. I prefer to be comfortable.
Heh! That might be because I'm not actually royalty. It's just what my adoptive parents, the Magypsies, plus the people of Tazmily Village, call me.
Naw, I'm not "real" royalty, Petra. Everyone back home called me "The Princess Of Osohe Castle", but it's just an empty title. I don't even live in the castle!
Let ol' Historian Kumatora tell ya about the Nowhere Islands, Nami. The Magypsy legends say that they're islands... in the middle of nowhere.
I know all about the legends taught by the Magypsies! Rumor has it that the Nowhere Islands are... islands! Somewhere next to Nowhere, probably.
Well, it's true I didn't grow up around girls... but that'd be because I didn't really see anyone other than the Magypsies, who aren't either gender, really...
You've got me there, Nami. I didn't grow up seein' many people other than the Magypsies. Gender doesn't really apply to them, though.
Maybe it's called "magic" where you're from, but we call it "PSI" back home. Some people have potential, but it has to be "awakened" first.
Huh? Oh, you mean PSI? It's not taught at school back home... probably because we don't have a school. You have to have your ability to wield PSI "awakened" first.
Heh! That's me! I'm a firebrand, icebrand, and thunderbrand, all in one fancy-princess package! You look pretty tough yourself, Jim.
Ain't that the truth? The world needs more ladies with backbone. Nice tattoos, by the way. I take it you know how to throw a punch?
PSI is like magic... but cooler. It stands for "psionics", and it all comes from the mind. My PSI is all about layin' the hurt on bad guys, with fire, ice and lightning.
You've got it, Yuri! Usin' my mind, I can shoot fire, ice, or lightning! My pal Lucas can use his to heal wounds and blow things up.
You're right, Yuri! PSI comes in many different forms, but it's all from the mind. My buddy Lucas can patch you up with his, and I can shoot fire, ice and stuff with mine!
That's 'cause we don't really know where they are in the first place. They're isolated from the rest of the "world" because of the Dark Dragon under 'em.
The Nowhere Islands are isolated, Meia. The Magypsies say it's because of the Dark Dragon sleepin' under 'em. No one knows "where" the islands are.
What, am I not frilly 'n proper enough for ya? The whole "princess" thing is just an empty title everyone back home gave me.
Ha! I've always been called a "tomboy", Meia. Plus, the two guys I was travelin' with are some of the nicest people you'll ever meet.
Psh! Guys ain't scary, Meia, especially the ones I was travelin' with. Besides, I'm usually described as a "tomboy" anyways.
PSI is pretty similar to magic, I guess. I can shoot fire, ice, and lightning! The Magypsies are who "awoke" the power in me.
PSI isn't somethin' you can learn in a book. You need your potential "awoken" by a Magypsy. After that, you just... "know" how to use it.
That wouldn't surprise me. If "gods" made people, maybe that makes 'em feel guilty when people do horrible, stupid things.
I'll be honest 'n say you didn't strike me as the thinkin' type, Hu Tao. I think about stuff like that, too.
There's that word again... What's a "Vision", Hooter? Does it have something to do with your world's PSI?
"Vision", huh...? I'm guessin' that's how PSI- Er, "magic" works where you're from?
I could, but you can trust me, Mari. I don't like invadin' people's privacy. Plus, lookin' in someone's head is dangerous.
There's few things that feel as amazing as takin' a nice, long soak in a hotspring after a day of hikin'!
I've always been a fan of animals, and PSI lets me hear what they're thinkin'! I like to go around Nowhere, makin' sure all of its critters are happy 'n safe.
I'm always stayin' up late, so I can go find a cozy spot to sit 'n gaze at the stars. It's nature's light show!
Pfft! Yeah, I think I've been called that once or twice, growin' up! You learn how to be responsible in the face of constant, deadly... uh, death, though.
Heh! That's one way to put it. I've always been a fiery kid, but I had to learn to grow up fast. Bein' in constant danger teaches ya to be dependable.
Uh, yeah, actually. I love animals! Your friend is into them, too? This is gettin' freaky... Is she a Not-Actually-Royalty Princess, too?
(Something just feels... off. I don't like it.) Uh, PSI refers to "psionics", Monika. Mental powers. I can shoot lightning 'n stuff.
(This headache ain't natural. What's the deal...?) PSI is short for "psionics", Monika. I can blast stuff with lightning, for instance.
Somethin' funny, ~natsuki~?
...Yeah? What of it?
There's a buncha things I like doin', Sunburn. Hikin', stargazin', arm-wrestlin', 'n leavin' the "g" off the end of words!
I'm a fun-lovin' gal, Sunburn. I've been teachin' these lil' molecrickets how to fight. It hasn't stuck yet... Kinda like them tryin' to teach me to "speak proper" hasn't stuck.
Uh, aren't you jumpin' the gun a bit here? I mean, geez, at least buy me dinner or somethin' first.
I appreciate gettin' straight to the point, but... Aren't you skippin' a few steps here? I don't even know you yet!
You've got a good eye, Homegirl! Simple 'n fuctional is more my style, you know?
You've got that right! I prefer comfort over looks, Homegirl.
No kiddin'? That's awesome! I love the sound of shreddin' guitars!
Yo...! I haven't heard some good ol' rock since DCMC broke up... Maybe Franchouchou can scratch that itch!
Yeah, you seem more like the princess type. You've got the stick planted firmly up your ass 'n everything!
Oh, pardon me, m'lady. I was too busy fightin' monsters and being in constant danger to attend "Stuck Up Prissy Snob Princess" school.

condition.saying: I don't think I've ever seen a more snug wizardy robe than that, Miss Kuma!

case.state: Heh! Thanks, ~trixie~. Maybe bein' a "princess" who barely owns more than the clothes on her back has got somethin' to do with teachin' me humility.
That's real nice of ya, ~trixie~! I'm not really a "wizard", though. I use psychic powers called PSI! It's kinda like magic... but not!

...It ain't a contest, ya weirdo. A time-travelin', lardball dictator invaded my island home, mutilated animals to make them killin' machines, ripped families apart and tried to end the universe. Also, I'm an orphan.
...The hell's a "yankii," ~tomoko~? Some kinda stomach ulcer or something? There's nothin' magical about those, you know.
What kinda gibberish are you goin' on about, ~tomoko~? "Yankii" just sounds like some kind of skin rash. What's magical about that?
Heh, I'm glad you like my looks, but I'm not much of an artsy kinda gal, ~ignatz~. That's probably because my adopted parents were all about fashion.
Haha, thanks! I've always been a fan of pink 'n blue. I don't have much of an eye for art or looks outside of that, though. My adopted parents made me sick of it.
Polite and a good listener! Yeah, all eight of the Magypsies lived in giant, pink seashells. They've got really soft carpet indoors, and when it rains, it sounds awesome.
You've been payin' attention, I see! Yeah, each Magypsy lived in a giant seashell. They're really big on the inside, with soft carpet 'n stuff. When the wind howls, it plays beautiful music!
What, you think I'm gonna stop tryin' to get your clothes off since I've lost a round? Keep dreamin'.
If you think I'm gonna stop tryin' to get ya naked just 'cause I've lost a round, you're dreamin'.
I've been makin' good on that promise, haven't I? You're more naked-like than when we started!
You're a couple layers short of a complete outfit, ain't ya? I'd say I'm makin' good on my word.
I'm a prim-and-proper lady, Leon. I wanna get to know a guy before I take 'em home. What better way to do that than strippin' him down?
Awww, but what's the fun in that? I wanna make him squirm a little before takin' him home.
Awww, thanks, ~yuno_uno~! I'm pretty lucky that it looks good on me, considerin' it's my natural color. Hair dye ain't my thing.
That's sweet of ya, ~yuno_uno~! I'm glad it suits me, since I don't dye my hair. It's all natural, baby!
Whaddya mean, sorry? That's awesome! No one's ever drawn me before, except on those wanted posters. Can I see it?
You ain't bad company yourself, ~natsuki~! Gettin' naked with you ain't the worst thing in the world.
That almost sounded like a compliment, ~natsuki~! I'll take it. I'm glad one of the strangers I've met here is you, too.
You say that like panties aren't a pain in the ass! Literally!
I'm no comedian, ~natsuki~. Panties bein' a literal pain in the butt is just a fact.
Honestly, I wish they were smaller. They just get in the way. Feeling 'em bounce around all the time is exhausting.
Man, I wish I had a bra like that! I'm jealous of your chest size, ~natsuki~. You don't have to worry about 'em getting in the way.
I'm flattered that a scholarly gentlemen like yourself is so curious about me, but what's the fun in spoilin' the surprise?
Who knows...? A lady's gotta have a weapon to fall back on, y'know?
Awww! You look so disappointed. I am tryin' to win, believe it or not.
Haha! Sorry to disappoint ya, ~leon~. I'm tryin' to win, after all.
...You know how to strike up a bargain, Mr. Kennedy. You've got experience with that silver tongue of yours...?
...Sounds like a deal to me, Mr. Kennedy. You must've had practice with that silver tongue of yours...
Pfffft! Haha! Oh, man! The idiots who named Club Titiboo knew exactly what they were doin'! It wasn't a strip joint, ~jessie~.
Snnnrk! Oh my god! It wasn't a strip club, ~jessie~, though they knew what they were doin' when they named it "Titiboo".
You're wantin' to throw down, huh? I'm always up for that! I use PSI, but it's pretty much magic, so it what you call it doesn't matter.
I'm not one to turn down a good sparrin' session, ~laevatein~. Psi is more or the less the same thing as magic, so whatever.
Er... You feelin' alright over there, ~rosa~? I've never seen someone's pupils turn into little hearts before...
...Have you seen a doctor lately, ~rosa~? I'm pretty sure your pupils turnin' into hearts ain't normal.
"Carefree", huh? I dunno about that. It sounds like havin' psychic powers messes people up where you're from. That true?
I'm not so sure about bein' "carefree", Jimmy. Does havin' PSI mess people up where you're from?
Pfft! You crack me up, ~hu_tao~. I think seein' me runnin' around commando-style would've made my Magypsy "parents" faint.
Snnrk! You're a real hoot, ~hu_tao~. I think I would've given my Magypsy caretakers an aneurysm if I did that.
...You're messin' with me again, ain't ya? You have the weirdest ability to get in my head...

Am I goin' nuts? I'm pretty sure you said this last time I porked up my cards...
You're just messin' with me, ain't ya...? You're good at that, ~hu_tao~.
...You're askin' when I last got my rocks off, huh? When I last flicked the bean? You wanna know how long it's been since I last stroked the beaver?
You're curious about when I last finger-banged myself? You wanna know when I last paddled the pink canoe? You're askin' when my last jillin' session was?
Ain't you sweet? Thanks, ~pit~. Lucas had a lot of healin' PSI, which doesn't help ya in a brawl like Smash!
Awww, you flatter me, ~pit~. Lucas was our group's healer, which ain't all that helpful in a Smash tourney.
Oh, harumph! I say, good chap, this gaudy ruffian ruffles my frilly, stuck-up princess feathers!
This uncouth, gaudy commoner likes wearin' comfy clothes! My snobby, stuck-up princess jimmies are thoroughly rustled! Harumph!
More or less, ~larachel~. PSI 'n magic are pretty similar, though they're probably not quite the same thing.
I guess you could say that, ~larachel~. While they're probably different on some level, magic 'n PSI are pretty similar, I guess.
Much appreciated, ~heris~. I mostly just say that as a joke, though. I'm not actuallyroyalty. Everyone back home just thought I was.
Heh! Thanks, ~heris~. I'm just bein' sarcastic when I say I'm "royalty," though. Back home on the Nowhere Islands, everyone just thought I was a princess.
...No, it doesn't make ya grow a tail. It's energy that you make with your mind.
Huh? It doesn't give ya a tail. It's energy that comes from your mind.
Ever since kickin' Porky's blubbery butt, free time is something I have in abundance. I like goin' on hikes, workin' out, and takin' care of rabbits.
Free time ain't in short supply now that Porky's not stinkin' up the place. I pass the time by hikin', exercising, and lookin' after a bunch of lil' bunnies.

Nowhere!
...No, seriously, I'm from Nowhere. The Nowhere Islands, that is.

Me? I'm from Nowhere, ~fluttershy~.
...This ain't a joke. I'm literally from The Nowhere Islands.
Heh! Tell me about it. It's not like anybody put a gun to your head 'n forced ya to get naked at this place.
Finally, somebody who's talkin' my language. We all chose to come here for a good time, right? Unless someone put a gun to your head, you should just try to enjoy yourself.
Let's just say that what you're packin' in your pants doesn't matter much to me. I think I'd enjoy makin' ya squirm either way.
As far as I'm concerned, if playin' with what you've got in your pants makes ya squirm, then it's fair game. Gender doesn't really matter.
Huh? Seriously? My name scares ya? It's not like my name is "Ultimate Evil Ultra Death Dealing Killer Assassin" or something.
...I know my name is kinda long, but it's never been called "scary" before. I'd understand if it was "Ultimate Serial Killer Lord Of Bloody Death Massacre Mittens" or something...
...I've been askin' myself that same question. I spent so long just fightin' to survive that I'm not sure how to be at peace.
You see right through me, huh? Fightin' for your life gives ya a simple goal that drives ya forward. Now that it's gone, I've been feelin' a little... lost.
Oof. Yeah, that about hits the nail on the head. Lowerin' your guard ain't easy when you're so used to havin' it up.
You've said it, ~meia~. When you're always holdin' your arm up to defend yourself, it has a hard time comin' back down again.
Never heard of the "Kunai Region" before, ~yuri~. I'm from Nowhere. The Nowhere Islands, I mean.
The "Kunai Region" sounds... pointy. I'm from Nowhere, ~yuri~. The Nowhere Islands.
Hark! Thine eyes be keen indeed, Lady of the Long Ears! It's true-eth! I am a high-born Wizardess-eth!
Thou are correct-eth, Lady of the Long Ears! I have only the noblest-eth and fanciest-eth blue blood flowing through my Wizardess veins!
Heh! Guilty as charged! I do less ass-kickin' these days, but I'm still sharp. I take it you're also one of those kinds of ladies?
I don't need to fight people anymore, but I kinda miss it, truth be told. Are you scrappy like me?
His name's Salsa, 'n I think he'd have a fit if I called him a "pet". We're pals.
Callin' him my "pet" would not make him happy. He's my little buddy! His name is Salsa.
Thanks. I do literally nothing with my hair. I just roll outta bed 'n throw on some clothes.
That's nice of ya, thanks. I do pretty much nothing to it, other than washin' it! Brushes ain't my style.
You know everyone can hear ya, right? You probably don't want to be sayin' the embarrassing stuff out loud.
...I'm standin' right here, dude. I can hear ya talkin' to yourself. So can the rest of the class, too.
You want adventure stories, huh? This one time, me 'n my friends were climbin' up this huge tower, called Thunder Tower. It was zapping people's houses with lightning.
I've got a few good ones. Back home, there was this tower, called Thunder Tower, that was shootin' people's homes with electricity. Me 'n my pals blew it up.
Oh, you bet your broody booty I use my fists, ~blake_belladonna~! 'Course, as much fun as it is to give your enemies a black eye, a fist doesn't hurt like a fireball does.
You kiddin'? Me and punchin' go together better than you and lookin' disinterested, ~blake_belladonna~! Blastin' people with electricity or ice tends to sting a bit more than my hands, though.
Ha! Ain't that the truth? You've hit the nail right on the noggin, ~hilda~. I'm not a "real" princess. Everyone said I was, growin' up.
Heh! You've got a good point, ~hilda~. You're right; I'm not an "actual" princess. I was told that I was a princess when I was growin' up, but it's an empty title.
...You know when you're exhausted 'n get all cozy in bed 'n are about to fall asleep, when suddenly you remember you left the stove on?
Uh... The best way to describe it is the pure adrenalin rush you get when you're all comfy in bed and are about to conk out... and realize you left the stove on.
Zero. Zilch. Nada, even.
Literally never! Not a single time in my entire existence on this planet!
Boredom, mostly. My evil-empire-n'-tyrant-fightin' days are over. I keep my eye on the Nowhere Islands, but there's not much evil to beat up anymore.
These days? I fight the urge to take frequent naps. I already kicked out the local tyrant 'n his joke of an "empire". I do keep watch on The Nowhere Islands still, I guess.
Time, huh? That's pretty badass, actually. I can shoot fire, ice 'n lightning, plus give ya a nasty headache, but stoppin' time is something else!
This friend has time powers! That's awesome! Shootin' ice, fire 'n migraines at people is cool, but doesn't hold a candle to time shenanigans!
...Oh. You're... uh, that kinda waitress. Nah, don't sweat it. Job's a job. Do you... enjoy workin' like that?

What do you m-
Ah. You do that kind of waitress work. Well, there's nothin' wrong with it. What's it like, doin' that for a livin'?
I've got some ideas on what I'd like to try, but I haven't actually had sex yet. It's a big reason why I'm here, y'know?
Can't speak from experience, but I've got several things I'd like to try out. Explorin' this side of life is why I'm here.
Yeah, I kept it. Never could bring myself to actually toss the damn thing. Is that kinda getup super popular?
Each time I see that froufrou-ass outfit, I wonder why I can't seem to bring myself to chuck it out. Does it turn people on or something?
You said it! There's nothin' that beats feelin' all of the tight-ass muscles in your body loosen all at once when you sink into the pool.
This lady gets it! Nothing feels quite as good as lowerin' yourself into the hot water n' having your entire body loosen up! Especially after gettin' hot 'n sweaty.
Naughty, huh? I've always wanted to try wrappin' my legs around someone's head as they work their tongue... 'n use my PSI to see what things they wanna do to me after.
Something dirty... I'll admit I like idea of usin' my PSI to see what naughty stuff my partner is thinkin' about doin' to me... As my thighs are squeezin' their head.

I'd probably say something like...
"Hey, good-lookin'. Wanna see what I've got cookin'?"
...Then I light him on fire.

Alright, I think I know what I'd say.
"Hey, hot stuff. You're lightin' my fire. Want me to show ya what I mean?"
...That's when I use PK Fire.
"Well-traveled," huh? I've seen a lot of things... but I've only really been on my home turf, the Nowhere Islands.
I appreciate the compliments, but I don't think "well-traveled" suits me. I've seen a lot of stuff, but only on the Nowhere Islands back home.
Aw, c'mon, big guy! I think we both know what we're doin' at a place like this, don't we...?
Ha! We ain't here for bakin' cookies, big guy. I think we both were lookin' for a different kind of fun, yeah?
Man... Wasn't expectin' you to be outpacin' me this quick. You're sharper than ya look, ~erufuda~.
Whelp. That's what I get for underestimatin' someone in a tracksuit. Can't let ya leave me in the dust...
Burn stuff, freeze stuff, zap stuff, heal stuff, confuse stuff... That kind of thing. I can hear animals talk, too. Haven't talked to a flower before, though.
Let's see... My PSI is of the burnin', freezin', electrocutin', healin', 'n brainshockin' variety. Can't gossip with a tree, but I can hear what animals have to say.
I guess that is a plus... I scarf down magic pudding 'n magic gelatin all the time, but this hoodie is always comfortable to be in. Fightin' cyborgs might've helped with that, though.
Y'know, I never really gave my magic sweets-fueled diet much thought before. I don't scrap with cyborgs anymore, which was a great workout. Don't want my only hoodie gettin' tight...
...Magi-what now? Magicat? Magicant? Is pink hair all I need for whatever that is? I don't remember signin' any papers...
Uh... what's a magicrud? Magikarpo? Magicant? Whatever you just said. I didn't sign up for your pink-haired club...
...I'm flattered you like me, but... neither of us are wearin' sweaters.
...Hate to be a compliment-killer, but... I'm not rockin' a sweater. You aren't, either.
...I do, yeah. It's the only thing I've got from my parents. I don't know which one it came from, though.
...You're right. I'm holding the only reminder that my birth parents existed. I wonder which one this belonged to...
Well, first I have to focus on the power of friendship 'n love. After that, I just wish upon a star... and my enemies combust on the spot!
No. There's steps I gotta do first, like think about love 'n harmony. After rubbing a magic lamp for ten minutes, my enemies catch on fire.
Thanks, ~cheryl~. Truth be told, though, I prefer sleepin' butt-naked. Hope that mental image ain't too much to handle or somethin'.
Mighty kind of ya, ~cheryl~. Between you 'n me, though? I prefer sleepin' in my birthday suit. It's better that way.
Uh... pardon? Makin' up words just so you can sound cool makes talkin' pretty damn difficult.
...You're good at inventin' new, fancy-soundin' words, I'll give ya that. Not so great at makin' sense, though.
Well, you see, when it comes to castin' magic... I don't know squat. PSI, though? That's my deal. Don't get 'em confused.
If you're wantin' magical knowledge 'n magical know-how... Don't ask me. I can tell ya all about PSI, though. They're different!
Whoa! Throwin' down the gauntlet already? You speak my language, ~nagatoro~. Maybe ~player~ here would like to make a bet on who'd win!
Heh! You've got fire in your belly, kid. I like it! Who do you think would win, ~player~?
Heh. Yeah, I'm not exactly fancy-shmancy, am I? My title as "princess" is just that: A title.
Aww, shoot! Guess I'm not the picture-perfect princess I thought I was. I'm a princess in name only, ~fischl~.
Oh, this lil' thing? It's nothin' too crazy. A memento from my birth parents. It's the only thing they've ever given me.
My pendant, huh? Ain't too much to it. My birth parents gave it to me when I was a lil' squirt. It's the only thing I have to remember them by.
Psh! Boundries-shmoundries! You're a fun gal, ~fischl~. I'd be a real stick-in-the-mud to not wanna be pals with you. Can't really do the fancy talk you do, though.
Aww, no need to be so formal, ~fischl~. I'd be real snore if I didn't want to hang out with a lady like you. I can't speak in your fancy-pants parlance, though.
Fair point. I always had my teammates backin' me up when my powers went dry, but we don't travel in a big group much, anymore. Where would a fine lady like me find herself a rocket launcher?
...Huh. Yeah, you're onto somethin'. I'm often wanderin' around by myself these days, so havin' a backup missile launcher would come in handy when my PSI is depleted.
Oh man, really? I guess I've mellowed out some, but I don't think anyone's called me nice. You must've been one tough lady.
Aw! You're pretty sweet yourself, ~meia~. Nobody's called me "nice" before. You must've been a real firecracker, huh?
..."Troublesome," huh? I've been called worse. An alien bein' the one to say it is new, though.
I've got lots of stuff swirlin' around in my "troublesome" noggin, pal. What's it to you?
...If we're thinkin' of the same whiny tyrant, then you've got some explainin' to do, friend.
...Spill it. Now.
What, are my girly bits not good enough for ya?
You sure about that? I've got all the right bits 'n pieces, y'know.
..."Troublesome," huh? I've been called worse. An alien bein' the one to say it is new, though.
I've got lots of stuff swirlin' around in my "troublesome" noggin, pal. What's it to you?
Yup. I saw plenty of fights. Fightin’ angry cattlesnakes makes playing cards feel slightly less intense.
You could say that. Playin’ a dumbed-down version of poker isn’t quite as dangerous as a cattlesnake, after all. Hard to get too scared.
don’t know what you’re talkin’ about. Guess that should be expected, though, given your… un-earthliness. But how do you know Andonuts? You’ve clearly got beef with the guy.
he Phase Distorter? Dunno what kinda mumbo-jumbo that is. Probably alien, which makes sense. What’s your deal with the doctor, anyway? He steal your lunch money?
I’m perfectly capable of stoppin’ power-hungry jerks without any fancy-pants technology. I’ve dealt with one petty, lardy “king” already, ‘n I can do it again.
Tch. You delusional overlords are all the same. You’re not as childish and chubby as the last one, but I can put you down all the same.
Attendant? Who hires someone like that to bookkeep for them…?
...That’s where you went wrong, then. Hiring that guy as a secretary is just askin’ for disaster.
I’m not sure it matters, Giygas. Once Lucas pulled the last Needle, the big ol’ dragon sleepin’ under the islands woke up and changed everything. I don’t think that can be erased.
Maybe, if history was… normal, around the Nowhere Islands. After Lucas pulled the final Needle, the dragon that slept under the islands was awakened, and reality was shifted around.
(Kumatora's author refuses to describe the words she's currently grumbling to herself. Just know that it's bad.)
<i>(Out of moral obligation, Kumatora's author will spare you from the angry, frustrated thoughts running through her mind.)
...You're not wrong, Hooter. It's the only thing that connects me to my real parents. Outside of the blood in my veins, at least.
...Yeah, you could say that. My biological parents gave it to me, before... who knows what happened to 'em.

You've got it, Angel Guy! Man, what a thrill that was!
...Er, sorry if I blasted ya with Starstorm, though.

Oh yeah! That tournament was awesome, Mr. Dead Angel Guy!
...Sorry if you got hit by PK Starstorm, though.
You're right! Me not usin' PK Fire to burn some clothing is a waste. I think you'd look better nude, though. I'm sure you wouldn't mind if I burned your clothes off, right?
I wouldn't mind usin' my powers to burn off clothes. It won't be mine, though. I bet you would look much better in your birthday suit anyway.
You sure that ain't just all the romance in the air? True love 'n all that junk.
Maybe my womanly charms are workin' their magic on ya. This is the perfect place to find your soul mate, ain't it?

Oh, darn! Customers like to come to the Club and play poker after work, but I was too busy bringing people food to learn the rules. Oh well!
*giggle*

I lost? What a shame! I spent so long dolling myself up, and you want me to take my outfit apart? How uncouth, ~player~.
*giggle*

I lost, huh? Just because I'm losing some clothes doesn't mean I'll be losing my smile! I was the most popular waitress in Club Titiboo, after all!
*giggle*

A few loses aren't going to get me down! If I cried over every spilled glass of Fizzy Soda, I'd... cry semi-frequently!
*giggle*

Oh me, oh my! Whatever shall I do? A lady shouldn't be exposing herself like this, you know?
*giggle*

Oh! You ordered one "Accessory-type Strip", with a side of style? Coming right up!
*giggle*
Okay, that's enough of that, I think. If I had to say "*giggle*" one more freakin' time, I was gonna to turn inside out. Hope you enjoyed that, ~player~.
If I have to giggle one more time, I'm gonna puke my guts out. That's enough of that crap, thanks. You're a lucky ~player.ifMale(guy|chick)~, ~player~. I wouldn't do this for just anybody.
Okay, now that my frilly ribbon is comin' off, I think I can also knock it off with the "girly waitress Violet" crap. That was just a little Valentine's gift from me to you, ~player~.
Oopsie poopsie! I've got to strip my big, fluffy, frilly, goofy skirt now, huh? What a shame.
Whew! Takin' this clown costume off is kind of a relief, if I'm bein' honest. I never did like how poofy it is.
You know, I'm not really sure why I kept holdin' on to this uniform for so long. Maybe the job itself wasn't so bad. Oh well! Off it goes!
Awww, that's a shame. I was kinda enjoyin' the white-shirt-with-spats combo I had goin' on! Made me feel more like waiter than a waitress.
Guess it's time to go back to my usual, shirtless ways. Ain't that right, ~player~?
Well, I don't enjoy losin', but I enjoy wearin' this button-up shirt even less. It just feels... restrictive.
Whelp! That's the last new thing this dopey outfit's got for ya, ~player~. Sorry!
My, my. How ruthless of you guys. Rippin' off my carefully-picked clothes, just to see my... Mrs. Saturns. Barbarians.
There goes the last of my Valentine's Day outfit, ~player~. I, uh... I hope you enjoyed it a little bit.
I'm almost out, huh? What a shame. I can really feel the romance 'n in the air.
I don't know if you usually spend your Valentine's Day gettin' people naked, ~player~. You seem pretty good at it.
Can't say I mind losin' too much. This place is pretty fun, clothes or no clothes! Though, maybe no clothes is the more fun option, right?
You're really gonna make me take off the last unique item for this outfit? How cruel.
Whelp! It's time to go back to standard-ass Kumatora. You can't say I didn't try to be festive.
...Huh. Kinda weird I left these on. Guess I'm not used to socks.
That's loss number one for me. Luckily for you punks, I'll be takin' my ultimate boots off first. Everyone knows orange boots are freakin' terrifying.

I was hopin' my orange boots would be makin' you all shake in yours. Maybe the Ultimate Chimera isn't as scary as I thought...
(Cheep!)

Oh, my. You're making me take off my spooky boots. I'll probably get nightmares now. You monsters.
...Hey! I can hear your thoughts, feather-butt! Tough crowd...
My teeth ain't sharp like that pink bastard's, so I've gotta make do with these. Kinda cool though, ain't they?

(Chirp?)
What, you want to try one of these on? Don't think that's gonna work. It'd just look like a spiky tutu.
Oh me, oh my! My gloves are gonna die. Oh well!
Damn. There goes my holiday spirit. Guess I'll have to spook ya in other ways.
You guys must have some kinda vendetta against hoodies. Guess my regular one just wasn't good enough for ya. Time to chuck it on the floor.
...My hoodies just ain't safe around ya, ~player~. They always seem to be hittin' the floor before too long. Maybe I'm a little flattered, though.
Damn. No luck this time. Oh well, no use cryin' over spilled strawberry slime. Time to strip all scary-like.
Balls. Now I'm the one gettin' tricked. This ain't over, Lady Luck, ya fickle ol' bat...

Whoops. The big guns are comin' out, huh? Well, off, anyway.
...I wonder if anyone's made a gun that shoots spats. Might be kinda handy here...
Ah, for the love of- You folks are lucky I ain't unstoppable like the thing my outfit was based on. I won't even eat ya!
...Talk about bein' in a jar of pickles, rollin' down a muddy slope to nudesville. Don't get too cozy, though. I ain't outta the fight yet!
Heh! Guess they ain't gettin' to play hooky this time, either. Let's get to it, then.
Nope. For one thing, I'm not actually a princess. That's just what people call me.
I have no idea what an "ehzpur" is, but bein' "royalty" has nothin' to do with PSI. I'm not a real princess, for starters.
Oh, nevermind! It turns out I learned the amazin' ability of being trash at poker. Yay.
I can't say the idea of gettin' naked bothers me all that much. I didn't have a standard upbringin', since I was raised by the Magypsies!
I don't get to meet too many folks with a wild hair color like mine, but this places has all kinds of weird colors! I like it!
This place has a good cleaning crew, right? Like, with people n' stuff? No magic brushrooms, I hope...
You'd think they'd give us a basket or somethin' to put our stuff in. I guess I'll just chuck my stuff on the ground, like a barbarian.
Oh no, the horror... or some crap like that. I don't get complainin' about havin' to strip. That's what we're here for, right?
Nowhere.
All over Nowhere.
Guess it's time I step outta the kiddie pool, huh? Too bad there's not any actual water here. I'm a big fan of makin' cannonballs!
...You know, it's kind of a missed opportunity that there's not a lake or whatever around here. Nothing beats skinny dippin'!
I'd suggest we go swimmin' somewhere after this, but there appears to be a distinct lack of water here. It's a shame, since you're all lookin' "dressed" for it.
I'm not playin' too shabby so far, huh? Maybe this'll be a breeze! Or, maybe it'll all go up in flames in a minute. Who knows?
Whoops. Gettin' cocky never works out, does it? This is why I'm always bein' called "hasty", I guess.
That's me. I guess I'll tell ya about myself. I'm the Princess of Osohe Castle, on the Nowhere Islands! Except, I don't live in the castle, and I'm not a princess.
I'm no stranger to danger, but I haven't even lost anythin' major! I'm willin' to wager I'll be celebratin' this victory in... uh... a manger? Damn, ran outta steam..
Heh! I guess that means it's time for me to join the strippin' party. Even "princesses" like cuttin' loose sometimes.
I really gotta hand it to you guys; I was startin' to think that loss earlier was just a fluke! Oh God, I'm turning into a pun-spewing grandpa, like Alec...
You know, these gloves ain't my best pair! I've got some that glow with all the colors of the rainbow! They're the Mystical Gloves, and they're damn powerful.
Well dang, there goes my winnin' streak. I'll be doin' the streakin' if I'm not careful. Not that it scares me.
Oof, that took the wind outta my sails. Guess I gotta row my boat by hand, now. Maybe I shoulda joined that weird-ass boat club these two jokers had back in Tazmily...
Aww, dammit. Nipped my streak in the bud, huh? Well, I hope you're into gloveless hands.
Heh! Knowin' Lady Luck's tendency to make ya start losing once you start spewin' boasts, I'm not gonna brag about it. Much.
I only lost this hand 'cause I felt sorry for you chumps- pffffft, ahaha! Couldn't finish that with a straight face! Naw, I lost 'cause my hand was putrid garbage.
...Dammit. Yeah, yeah, I know I'm winnin'. I just hate losin' this pendant. It's a gift the Magypsies gave me. Don't touch it.
Whoops. Losin' a winning streak feels so unsatisfyin', doesn't it? Like gettin' a 15 hit combo in sound battles, but cockin' the last hit up...
You know, for someone who comes from a place literally called "Nowhere Islands", I ain't doin' half bad! Beginner's luck, probably.
I'm still winnin' this game, ~player~, so I hope me removin' my necklace gets you all hot n' bothered.
Damn. Well, don't get too excited. I'm still on my trinket-removin' stage. This is where some of you guys get all huffy at me, right?
Well, now the gloves are off! Er, I mean, that happened a few rounds ago already, but I meant metaphorically! Aww, you get the idea.
I'm not gonna lie; this is actually startin' to get kinda embarrassin'. To keep bein' honest, though, it's gettin' more excitin', too.
I guess you really wanted to see more of me, huh? I'm flattered, really.
Heh! Things are startin' to get real for me, huh? I'm gettin' kinda excited.
I see you over there, ~player~, lookin' all pleased with yourself. You're happy I lost, huh?
Whoops. Damn, what a display, huh? I'm technically winnin', but it sure as hell doesn't feel like it when you're close to showin' the world your birthday suit.
....It'd be no fun if I never had to strip, I suppose. Then I'd just be standing here awkwardly as everyone gets naked.
Ack! I blame you for distractin' me, ~player~! Lookin' at me like that.... how the hell do you manage to have puppy-dog eyes and that stone cold face at the same time?!
This isn't really here or there, but... fryin' pans suck as weapons. I tried usin' one once, but it was just weak and made annoying sounds.
...Oof. Ach! Friggin'... yikes! Ya might even say "Mama mia!".
Who's the unlucky chump this time? Is it ~player~? ... It's me, ain't it?
I wonder if Duster would be any good at this strip poker business. That dude has a solid poker face that also looks vaguely bum-like. Hell, he even went by the name Lucky for a while!
Hey, I ain't in last, so that's a win to me! Worryin' and being all anxious is Lucas' job.
Ya know, this game is pretty fun! The Magypsies didn't play card games, and I didn't really hang out with the Tazmily villagers much, either, so this is pretty new to me.
I can't say there's much skill to this game, but it's pretty fun! I guess that's because I'm in good company.
Well, well... time to let the girls bounce free, huh? I wonder how many guys at Club Titiboo have thought about 'em...
The bra's comin' off, huh? Fine by me! I never liked wearin' these damn things anyways.
Well, I'd rather not be losin', but hey, at least I'll be comfortable. I'll basically be wearin' my pajamas!
Time to get naked, huh? Don't mind if I do...
Well dang, there goes my winnin' streak... Now I'm just doing regular streakin'.
Urk-! I got too cocky n' messed up my lead. That's an unsatisfying feelin'... especially since I'm right on the edge of losin'.
I'm in the "lead"... but it sure as hell doesn't feel like it when I'm standin' here naked...
Heh, I guess wearin' these girly panties under my spats was a good call. I'm lookin' forward to slippin' them off, though!
I ain't afraid of gettin' a scrape or two. Hell, this one time I was gonna cut my own leg off when it got caught in a trap. Luckily for me 'n my leg, my thief buddy Duster helped me out.
That's my loss, huh? Well, it's like I always say; you can't stop a time-travelin' evil butterball dictator if you ain't willing to take some hits.
I'm up! Maybe I should do somethin' wild to dazzle you guys! Somethin' crazy! ...Nah.
Yeah, I figured this would happen sooner or later. We don't have poker games back home on the Nowhere Islands, after all.
What?! How dare you? I am royalty! This is most unbecoming of me- pfffft, ahaha! I can't finish sayin' that with a straight face!
Whoops. . Slow n' steady ain't my style... but goin' gloveless ain't, either.
Let's not get too excited, now. Nothin' all that amazin' is being stripped offa me yet.
Looks like my gloves are on the choppin' block. No glove puns, got it?
That's me. I'll probably feel more naked without my trusty gloves than I would with my bra!
Time to get slightly less un-naked, I guess.
Leapin' arrow lizards! I kinda crapped the bed with that hand, huh? Time to get rid of my last dinky item now... but this thing means a lot to me.
I guess I should say somethin' about myself, huh? I'm from the Nowhere Islands. There's not a whole lot there besides Tazmily Village, and Osohe Castle.
No sweat off my back. Or any part of my body, really! I'm not just sayin' that to make myself feel better. Probably.
Awww... time to give up my pendant. I bet you didn't notice I was wearin' one, huh?
Me again? Alrighty. You guys should be happy that I don't doll myself up like the Magypsies do, 'cause the game would still be goin' a hundred years from now!
I'm not worried about a loss here n' there. I'm still leadin' the pack, like Lucas did during our travels. We always followed him around, in a single file. Kinda weird, now that I think about it.
What're you starin' at, ~player~? ... Oh! It's my turn. You're in luck: Somethin' big is comin' off now.
Awww, man. I guess I don't have the hang of this game yet, huh? I didn't have time to do fun stuff like this growin' up, after all.
Are you allowed to show up to this place naked? ...Naw, no one's that much of a degenerate, right?
'Kay, I know this is gonna sound weird, but if anyone sees a random doorknob layin' on the ground, let me know. Lucas is still lookin' for that thing...
Alright, I'm up to bat again... Lucas'd probably start gettin' all nervous here, even though that kid has fought off armies of Pig Masks, and saved the world. Guess that's just who he is.
Usually, throwin' your clothes on the floor after a long day feels relaxin'. Usually you're doin' that in privacy, though.
Aw, crap. I'm takin' some heavy damage. PK Lifeup doesn't give ya fresh clothes, either... hey, no one said I was a comedian!
Damn. I was hopin' you were the loser, ~player~. Don't keep me waitin' too long, okay? I'm already givin' you, and everyone else, a steamy show, after all.
Who's the lucky chump this round? ...It's me, ain't it? Damn. Laughed my spats right offa me!
I ain't winnin' , but I ain't losin' either. I wonder if that's how Porky feels, locked in the Absolutely Safe Capsule of his. Not that I feel sorry for the fat bastard.
Oh, nice! I get to take this off! Never liked wearin' these things, man.
I'm not stupid, but I've never had the patience for slowin' down and plannin' things out. It's kinda bitin' me, huh?
Can't say I've ever been topless in public... but what the hell? You only live once!
I've fought giant, killer robots, giant, killer statues, and giant, killer slugs. I can handle bein' topless.
Whelp! You're gettin' the world's first Osohe strip show, ~player~. You're pretty lucky.
Oh, well. It could always be worse. I could be covered in soot after my house burned down. That's only slightly worse, though.
Time to show the world my groomin' habits, I guess. Well, this strip poker joint, anyway... This place has so many weirdos in it, doesn't it?
It's true that I'm used to sharin' a hotspring with the guys in my group, but when you're sittin' in water, all this stuff down below is outta sight. Well, here goes..
Oh boy... I kinda screwed up, didn't I? I, uh... I hope you think it looks okay, ~player~. I'm hopin' ya like it more than that, actually.
Whoa... My heart's beatin' like crazy! That makes this even more excitin', though...
My friend Duster was raised by his wrinkly coot of a father, and man, he could be a real jerk to 'em. He called him "moron" more often than his actual name! That's not how you treat your kid!
I'm already fallin' behind? Geez, didn't expect this to be an uphill battle right outta the gate...
Yowza! Takin' hits right as battle starts always gets ya riled up. I've been in more fights than I can count, so I'm gettin' into this!
Losin' my clothes while losin' at cards isn't a big deal. I've had to fight an evil, time-travelin' lardball "king" and his army of pig-themed cronies, after all.
...If this poker play doesn't scream "royalty" to you, I don't know what will.
You look surprised that I lost, ~player~. Don't be! I'm used to gettin' myself into-and-back-out-of sticky situations like this! I've seen weird stuff, trust me.
Whelp! That didn't take long. The name's Kumatora, and I'm a PSI user! That means I can shoot fire n' stuff from my mind.
Another hit?! You moron! You're a failure and a disgrace! Heh. You like my Wess Impression? He knew better than to talk like that to me.
Aw crap, things are lookin' pretty grim. Trust me, I've seen grim! I used to travel around with a mopey kid like Lucas, ya know.
What the hell, man? I'm really playin' like crap. Nudity doesn't bother me, but flat-out suckin' at the game sure does!
...Heh... I kinda wish I talked to that save frog by the door over there, the one in the little tuxedo. Actually, I don't want 'em recording this game to memory, so never mind.
I wouldn't have been able to help save the world if I just gave up when things got a lil' dicey, you know?
...Damn, what's a girl gotta do to get good cards? I sure as hell ain't doin' that lame-ass dance Wess taught me. That only works on stone doors anyway.
I mean, hey, losin' here doesn't mean I die! Well, mostly. The only thing that dies when I lose are tiny bits of dignity.
I ain't doin' so well, but hey, I'm used to fightin' tooth n' nail with everything I've got! 'Course, my fights don't usually end in nudity.
...These ain't PSI-proof cards, right? Askin' for a friend.
Time to say goodbye to my spats, huh? I'd invite you guys to its funeral... but you're kinda the reason it's dead.
...Gee, I'm really startin' to stand out, aren't I? Maybe that's how Leder feels. Dude is like... 20 feet tall! He's pretty quiet, though.
I'm gettin' a real strong craving for some ice cream. Any good places for that kinda thing around here? ...This is probably why I'm losin', huh?
Gee, I hope I'm not blowin' you away with my poker skills. Keep your applause to yourselves.
Eh... it's still early. I'm not gonna whine 'n moan... Though, I will give a friendly reminder that I can set things on fire with my mind.
Argh...! I hate losin' my pendant, just in general... but I especially don't like losin' it by suckin' at the game!
It sucks enough that I'm losin'... Now I've got to give my most prized possession, too.
Man, I'm really playin' like Cattlesnake crap... At least you guys don't have to smell that. Yuck.
Urk! Again... this is the part where Lucas scolds me, saying how "reckless", "loud" and "hasty" I'm bein'.
Well, damn, guess this'll be my last line of defense. My HP's not zero, though, so I ain't givin' up just yet!
Damn, now I gotta say "sayonara" to my underwear too? Ya don't hafta look that excited, ~player~. Heh!
Ya done good, panties. I don't normally wear these with my spats, but I figured it'd be smart to this time.
You know, I never gave much thought to my "down there" hair before. I just get rid of it when it's too much.
You're lucky, ~player~... and everyone else. There were plenty of customers at Club Titiboo that would've loved seein' me all naked-like.
...Man, this hoodie has survived explosions, volcanoes, mecha gorillas... but it couldn't survive strip poker. Figures.
Whelp. I'm all outta itty-bitty, small, insignificant stallin' items now. Off goes my favorite-and-only hoodie!
Yikes. I'm suckin' more than those weird-ass trees near the Drago Plateau... What? Somethin' on my face, ~player~?
....Don't eat mushrooms, kids. Take it from me. Oh crap, I lost, didn't I? Nice knowin' ya, hoodie...
Time for the hoodie to face the music, huh? The lame, dumb, sucky kind of music.
I mean, hey, losin' here doesn't mean I die! Well, mostly. The only thing that dies when I lose are tiny bits of dignity.
I actually prefer bein' topless... Goin' topless because you're losin' feels different, though.
Yeah, yeah, keep kickin' me while I'm down...
What the hell, man? I'm really playin' like crap. Nudity doesn't bother me, but flat-out suckin' at the game sure does!
I used to be quick to anger as a kid, but I like to think I've mellowed out as time went on. That's why I'm only slightly annoyed.
Things ain't lookin' too good for me... but if my monkey pal, Salsa, could beat up a Cactus Wolf, the meanest bastard in the desert, I can handle this game.
There's nothin' wrong with flirtin'. It's somethin' that takes a lot of practice.
...I'm glad you 'n I are gonna get along, but I still don't know who you're talkin' about, Amy.
How about you, Amy? What does a glasses-wearin' cutie like you do for fun? Though, that look in your eye is tellin' me about one kinda activity you're interested in...

Pfft. Nat, you're a tough, fiery lady with backbone! The size of your personality with the size of your small-but-womanly body gives you a special charm! Amy, ~player~ 'n I have all been lookin' at ya.
Don't sweat it, Amy. My adopted parents, the Magypsies, said I had this on when they found me.
This pendant here is pretty much the only thing I have left of my real parents, Nat. They died when I was too young to remember them.
I'm likin' ya the more you talk, Amy! You're quite bold, ain't ya? That must've been excitin', hmm?
I'll admit that I thought about comin' here without a bra... I figured wearin' it would give me more time to get hot people like you naked, though.
It makes it impossible to get bored talkin' to her, don't you think, Nat? Yes, Amy. Sometimes I like to feel the breeze under my hoodie.
Lose-lose? Gettin' to see more of me ain't that bad--
...That almost sounds like a lame pickup line, kinda like the ones I heard all the time workin' as a waitress. "Your tits are tense, let me massage 'em".
No idea, Nat. I'm lookin' forward to it, though. Spill the beans, girl!
I'm all ears, girl. I'm also about to be all naked.
Hey, I'm no one-trick pony, ~hu_tao~. Fire, ice, electricity, healin'... Variety is a good thing, ya know?
Fire's not the only thing I can do, ~hu_tao~. I can freeze 'em, zap 'em, or heal 'em, too! We'd make a good team.
Whoa...! Something's tellin' me "no" ain't an option here. Alright, alright, I'll go with ya. I'm not opposed to lookin' good.
...You'd think I just committed the most heinous crime imaginable, with that look you're givin' me. Sure, I'll take you up on that. Bein' fashionable can't hurt.
Somethin' you can do for me, huh...? Normally, I'd ask what the catch is, but... You seem like one of those sincere, trustworthy types.
Normally, an offer like that from somebody you just met would be fishy, but... You're way too sweet for it to be suspicious!
I think that big ol' tank cannon you've got strapped to your arm conveys your "intent" with the grace of a bunch of drunk, squealin' pigs on a tightrope.
...I don't know what to tell ya, lady. I don't have a spare copy of my "Genuine Human Certificate" on me. Maybe if you get me naked, you'll see a bar code on my butt.
...How exactly am I supposed to prove it to ya? It's not like I have an "Actual Human Certificate" or something. Maybe I'll have a bar code on my ass that you can scan.
No, since I'm not an idiot. Does she make fun of everyone like this, ~player~?
...You're mockin' me. Real charming friend you've got here, ~player~.
That's kinda the point, Prez. You typically zap your enemies, not your friends or club-mates, or whatever.

Yeah, why not? I'm not gonna say no to havin' fun with a sweet girl like you.
...What's a "vegan burger", anyways?
I have no idea what kinda voodoo a "vegan burger" is... Count me in, though! You seem like a fun girl.
...The Magypsies "awoke" my PSI ability, Meia. They're ancient, powerful masters of PSI, and they took me in as an orphaned baby. I use the powers they gave me to fight a gene-stealin' tyrant.
Well, you're right. My powers weren't passed down by blood, since they were given to me by the non-human Magypsies. They live for thousands of years, and gender doesn't really apply to them, either.

condition.saying: Can you confirm that you are a princess, Kumatora? It would make this picture feel more special.

case.state: I don't have an official "Fancy-ass Princess" stamp on me, if that's what you're askin'... Wait, who said you could take pictures?!

condition.saying: Maybe you really aren't a princess after all

case.state: What kinda stupid nonsense are you goin' on about? I'm not sellin' my underwear, ya weirdo!
...The hell's a "satellite", Meia? I guess that means we don't have 'em. The Nowhere Islands keep to themselves.
I'd say we don't have those, since I have no clue what a "satellite" is. The Nowhere Islands is its own little world.
Well, where I'm from you have to have your PSI potential "activated" by a Magypsy, which are strangely-dressed, long-lived masters of PSI. After that, you just kinda... "know" how to use it.

Huh. That sounds like my pal Lucas. His PSI is great at supportin' the team, with shields, healing, and he can buff us, too! He does have one extremely powerful "spell", though. He calls it "Love", and it blows everything up!
...What? You don't just say somethin' heavy like that outta the blue 'n expect people to pretend it didn't happen, ya know.
...You're messin' with me, aren't you? Is this gonna be a theme tonight?
Maps? We do have one geezer named Mapson who likes to... uh, draw maps. We can map out the islands themselves, but we have no idea where anything else is.
This one geezer named Mapson likes to map out the Islands... but we have no idea what's outside of them. We keep to ourselves.
The Magypsies were ancient beings, each one tied to one of the seven Needles around Nowhere. They were PSI masters, "historians", 'n my adopted parents.
The Magypsies were powerful masters of PSI, 'n each one was bound to one of the seven Needles, scattered around Nowhere. They kept watch over the needles, 'n were my adopted parents.
