Well, they're all gone, so you're outta luck. Besides, PSI ain't a walk in the park. Whenever you're about to learn a new technique, you get sick as hell with a fever 'n all that crap.
They're... gone, now. PSI has its downsides, anyways. Every time you learn a new move to use, you get real sick with a high fever.
Pfft, nope! I use PSI! It's way different! ...Okay, not really. It's similar to magic, but it all comes from the mind. Not everyone's got potential for it.
Yup! I guess I was handful, even back as a lil' squirt!
Heh, I've always liked that name. I wonder if they named me that for bein' a lil' troublemaker!
Heh! She's got a contagious laugh, doesn't she? You have good taste in friends, ~player~.
Haha! Hearin' her laugh is real treat, ain't it? You know how to pick your friends, ~player~.
Yeah... I don't have any memories of 'em, since I was given up as a baby. This lets me know they cared.
I was given up by my parents when I was a baby, so I don't have any memories of 'em. This pendant shows they're always with me.
Heh! I'm flattered you're lookin' there, Homegirl, but I'm not showin' off the goods quite yet.
Tryin' to get a peek already, Homegirl? Ha! I'm flattered, but I ain't given away the good stuff yet.
"Passionate", huh? Heh, I guess you're right. You know, I bet dancin' would be a lot of fun! I like being active, anyway!
"Confidence", huh? Ha, you've got me there. I never thought about it before, but dancin' might be somethin' I'd enjoy!
Yeah, something's tellin' me you guys probably aren't gonna be performin' at a place literally called "Nowhere". I'd love to visit Saga, though!
Pfft! My home is actually called "Nowhere", so I really doubt that's in your tour book! Saga sounds like a fun place to visit, if it has you guys!
I guess that depends on how you define "disaster". I mostly used my power for fightin' an evil army and its cyborgs. I haven't had to use my PSI like that in years, though.
PSI is powerful, 'n just like any other weapon, it's dangerous in the wrong hands. I used it to free my home from an army and its cyborgs. We won, and I haven't had to use my powers since.
Long-ass, boring-ass story, Saki. The short version is everybody back home had their memories altered, 'n in their "new" memories, everyone knew I was a princess.
Workin' as a waitress taught me the art of flirtin', ~leon~. Showin' the goods right away is how you ruin the tease.
Showin' you the pink stuff right away kinda kills the point of teasin', Leon. Bein' a waitress taught me how to do it right, you know.
Oh yeah, tons. Both the graveyard by Osohe Castle were crawlin' with those things. They aren't much of a threat, though zombie dogs are annoying.
More times than I can count! There were regular zombies 'n zombie dogs in the graveyard by Osohe castle. The dogs are more annoying to deal with.
Nothing, considerin' you can't form a complete sentence. Is something distractin' you?
I was just watchin' ya turn even pinker than normal! Something on your mind?
What's that supposed to mean? Sounds like your community spends too much time stickin' their nose in other people's business.
Sounds like your community needs to get their heads outta their butt 'n mind their own beeswax.
You should know all about surprise, ~natsuki~! You combine disarmin' cuteness with the sexiness of a mature woman! Play to your strengths, girl!
Well, think of it like how you catch people off guard with your cute looks. Drawin' people in, then showin' them how much of a hot lady you are is... uh, hot!
It is comfy as hell, but I don't wear it to sleep in, ~leon~. What do I wear when I sleep...? Figure that puzzle out, smart guy.
You've got a point there, ~leon~. Sometimes, you want step outta your comfort zone 'n be a little... wild.
If I'm bein' honest, I don't usually wear panties under these. It ain't comfortable. How's that for some Kumatora trivia?
These spats are comfy enough on their own. I don't usually wear panties under 'em. There's your Kumatora trivia of the day.
You sayin' you're not up to the challenge, ~leon~? Ladies like a man with confidence, ya know...
Heh. Too much to handle? I'm sure you'll find a way, somehow.
You know what? I think I'm with ya on that. If I had to choose between this pendant 'n my powers, I'd choose the pendant.
Hmmm... I think we're on the same page, Hooter. I'd choose my pendant over my powers any day.

condition.saying: I understand that, Kumatora. Practicality is quite important,

case.state: "Cute" ain't a word that's ever crossed my mind when it comes to my boots, but thanks! You know how to lay on the charm.
I dunno, lady. I don't have one lodged up there, and I'm not a real princess, right?
Oh, perish the thought, m'lady! I'd never dream of mockin' you or your uppity ways! Why, it just wouldn't be proper!

condition.saying: And you've got a pretty unique style!

case.state: You think so? I dunno. I think a literal angel stands out a bit more than some chick in a hoodie.
I'm not too sure 'bout that. I'm not the actual angel, with wings 'n everything. I'm just some lady in a hoodie.
Oh man, seein' you standin' there, minus all of your frufru clothes is gonna be satisfyin'.
Psh. Like I plan on makin' it easy for ya, ~larachel~. Seein' you standin' naked with your frufru clothes all in a pile is gonna be sweet.
It sounds like we come from very different places, ~larachel~. I'm guessin' that mages have to read dusty ol' books to learn magic where you're from, right?
That's probably because we come from pretty different places, ~larachel~. I'm bettin' that mages have to study moldy ol' books to learn magic where you're from, right?
You've got telepathy? Big deal. I've got it, too. I don't just barge into people's head without askin', though. It's kinda rude.
Whoopie, you have telepathy. Join the club. I don't just metaphorically break into people's metaphorical mental house, though. Bad manners 'n all that.
Tch! Freakin' figures...! There's always some power-hungry maniac goin' around 'n ruining lives. Good thing there's always someone to fight 'em, too. Ain't that right, Jim?
Freakin' slimy bastards...! They play with people's lives like they're toys, and they never stop until someone knocks their teeth out. You seem like the kind of guy who'd start swingin', Jim.
"Tomboy" just means you act more like a guy than a dainty lady, ~meia~. Y'know, runnin' around, gettin' dirty, rather than worrying about fashion or whatever.
Bein' a "tomboy" means you don't act very ladylike. Rather than gettin' your nails done or worryin' about your clothes, you prefer bein' active and gettin' dirty.
"Magma Grunts," huh? If they're anything like the monsters I beat up in that volcano, they had it comin'.
Can't say I've ever heard of "Magma Grunts" before, but if they're like the bad guys I fought in that volcano, they deserve it.
Long story short, he was stuck with a banana-scarfin' sleezeball, who kept a shock collar on him to keep him obedient. Me 'n my ol' geezer pal set him free.
Well, the sweet 'n skinny of it is that he was forced to be a slave for a lyin', greedy, banana-scarfin' loser. Salsa had to wear a shock collar, to keep him in line. Me 'n a friend saved him.

(Man, she makes Lucas look like a social butterfly...)
Alright, it's cool. I'm not insulted. I'm not here to fight, you know.

(Oh brother... She's even worse than Lucas was...)
Hey, it's no big deal. I'm not offended. I'm just here for some fun, so you don't have to be afraid of me.

condition.saying: usually when I think of royalty

case.state:
I'm a princess in name only. I refer to myself as "royalty" for hoots 'n hollers.
...Also, this is a hoodie, not a sweater.

Eh, I'm not really a princess in the first place. It's just an empty title. I call myself "royalty" as a sarcastic joke.
...This is a hoodie, by the way.
Well, I don't wear it to look fancy. That ain't my thing.
I'm not wearin' it to show off, especially since I'm not a fan of jewelry 'n useless trinkets. This was a gift from my birth parents. Wearin' it means they're always with me.

condition.saying: Hey, me too! 'Course, I've just got regular brown hair though...

case.state: Nothin' wrong with that! It suits ya. I'm just lucky I'm not one of those shy types, 'cause bright hair like this tends to grab people's attention.
Not everyone needs eye-searingly bright hair, man. Brown suits you just fine. Hair like mine tends to turn heads, so I'm lucky I'm not shy.

condition.saying: I've got no doubt it's naturally that pink, by the way.

case.state: Y'know, back when I worked as a waitress, customers would always ask me if my hair was natural. I didn't know it was a weird color in the first place.
It's funny you mention that, 'cause a lot of customers asked me if my hair was "natural" during my time as a waitress. I didn't know it was weird or uncommon.
Oh yeah? Is she a fan of comfy hoodies, too?
That so? I'm guessin' she loves oversized hoodies, too?
Nope. Not even half way, if you can believe it. I've just had my own fingers up in there.
Not even once, nope! Not half way, not two-thirds, nothin'. My fingers are the only things that've been in there.
...There's more than one ocean? I didn't know there were so many that one of 'em was named the "Specific Ocean".
...The "Specific" Ocean? That means there's other, nonspecific oceans out there, too, huh? Weird. I've never heard of that.
Ha! True! It usually got my point across pretty quickly. How do I remind you of this person, anyway? Is it the hair?
Heh, you've got a point! It makes quite the introduction. How am I like this person? Do they have pink hair too?
I hear ya. In my case, it was more like "A girl's gotta find a wig-wearin' amnesiac friend so she can find an egg". Same thing, really.
Tell me about it. For me, though, it was less about money, and more about finding my bass-playin', amnesiac buddy so he could tell me where he dropped his egg. Close enough, though.
Unless you're the CEO of kickin' puppies or somethin', your job doesn't mean crap. I know a thief, 'n I'd trust him with my life.
You said it. Unless your job is stealin' candy from babies, what you do for a livin' doesn't say squat about ya. I know a sheep farmer that can knock out dragos with a plank!
I'm here to explore a certain side of life that I missed out on. Havin' time to enjoy life's many perks is why I fought so hard in the first place.
Well, savin' the Nowhere Islands meant I was too busy to enjoy stuff like this. Now that it's all sparkles 'n sunshine, I can make up for lost time.
Heh! I couldn't blame ya for wantin' to get away from that. Long story short, everyone back home had their memories wiped, and everyone was given a false "role" to play.
Yeah, I wouldn't be able to stomach that, either. It's... complicated. Basically, everyone had their memories erased, 'n had 'em replaced with false ones.
Y'know what? I think I'll take you up on that. It probably won't kill me, 'n you seem like the expert on this stuff. It might even be... fun.
Hell, why not? Might as well give it a try. Who knows, maybe your expertise will make me actually enjoy tryin' out clothes.
Let's just say my hands were tied, 'n not in the way you're thinkin'. Might take you up on your offer, though. You're literally a professional, after all.
Well... My hands were tied, 'n probably not the way you're used to. But yeah, why not? A literal sex professional probably knows what she's doin'.
What? Are you tryin' to pull a fast one on me? I thought romance was about the fire in your heart or whatever...
You're yankin' my chain, aren't you? The Magypsies were always talkin' about the "fire in their hearts" or some crap like that...
...PK Fire. It's fire. Using my psychic powers. Y'know, the ones I've mentioned and showed ya...?
...Psychic fire, Mari. Like I've been talkin' about. Y'know, since the game started...?

condition.saying: Maybe I should go braless for one day like you.

case.state: Why not? Lettin' your honkers flop around in the wind would feel nice. It'll give ya a bigger crowd, too.
Let your punchin' bags hang loose, ~magical_sempai~! You'll be gettin' a much bigger audience that way. Lettin' the girls breathe would be refreshing, too!
...Yeah, pretty sure I do. Maybe we're both nut-jobs... but maybe not. Who the hell knows?
Believe it or not, I think I get it. That could just mean we're both short of a few marbles, I guess, but I'm no pessimist.
But, y'know what? I think you've gotta make the title fit you. What kind of princess are you wantin' to be?
Let this fake-ass princess give ya some real-ass advice: A label shouldn't define everything about you. You be the princess you wanna be.
...Makes sense. But, y'know what? Not knowin' what to do with your free time is kinda nice, too. Not havin' to worry about dyin' lets me waste time in a place like this.
...The future can be kinda scary, huh? But... that's what makes it worth fightin' for. It lets us embarrass ourselves in this place, which ain't somethin' I thought I'd be doin' with my new freedom.
Heh! I happen to be an expert at findin' hotsprings. I think you're gonna need it more than me, though!
Sounds like a plan! I'm good at findin' those. Good thing, too. I think you'll be needin' it the most!
Been there, done that. Lookin' all dainty 'n crap ain't my thing.
People liked it when I wore one... except for me. Not my style.
Can’t say I remember it, but according to the Magypsies, they dunked me in a magic hot spring when I was a tiny lil’ anklebiter.
I’ve always had PSI, far as I can remember. The Magypsies washed me in a magic hot spring as a lil’ tyke. No lamps were involved… probably.
It ain’t natural, but it’s a cow n' a snake, slapped together. Angry bastards. They ain’t around anymore, though.
The name’s real clever, I know. You take a cow, and a snake, and use “science” to stitch ‘em together. You won’t run into ‘em anymore, at least.
...Your defeat is inscribed in an apple. Boy, that's lame. Too bad it's not somethin' cool, like the Egg of Light.
...I can't take somethin' called the "Apple of Enlightenment" seriously. The Egg of Light is way cooler.
Absolute power and domination over others, playin’ with people ‘n their lives like they’re toys. How is you tryin’ to keep PSI for yourselves any different?

He fought for himself, ‘cause he could. He wanted to lash out at the world around him, like a bratty kid who got spanked. You say people with PSI are a threat, but let me guess: They didn’t even know you existed.
…No wonder Andonuts seemed so… defeated. I’d want to live in a trash can too, if somethin’ I built was used by Porky.
Well… Andonuts always hangin’ out in trash cans makes a bit more sense, I guess. I’d want to hide, too, if I was in his shoes.
I came here to play strip poker, man. Normally, I’d be tryin’ to kick your ass six ways to Sunday, but they’ve got rules here. What is your plan?
Plan? Lookin’ at naked people as I play strip poker. I’m usually a lady of action, but they frown on violence and people bein’ set on fire here. What are you hoping to accomplish, Giygas?
Huh? What’cha talkin’ about~? I’m an innocent, pure maiden. Who sucks at poker. I’m as pure as… snow? Is snow pure?
Dunno what you mean, Mr. Alien~ I’m as innocent as… uh… snow. Yeah, snow.
"Pyrokinesis", huh? I'm guessin' that's fire-related. Do you get to choose what kinda powers your "Vision" gives ya, or is it set in stone?
Yeah, it sounds like they ain't too different. Are your powers something you're born with, or do you get to choose?
I'm glad you still enjoy hangin' out with me, ~player~, even if ladies aren't your thing. Most friends probably don't do this kinda thing, though.
I'm probably not the kind of Valentine you were hopin' for, ~player~, but I appreciate you spendin' time with me anyways.
You know, hangin' out at a strip poker game is probably not what most friends do with each other, especially on Valentine's Day. I guess we're a couple of weirdos, ~player~.
Gettin' back to my room 'n rippin' this thing offa me was one of the best parts of my day, ~player~. I've gotta say, though, I'm kinda enjoyin' the look you're givin' me as I take it off...
Nothin' felt better than takin' this goofy-lookin' mess off at the end of my shift, ~player~. I wonder if you strippin' it off me would feel better, though...
Heh. It's nice to know you still find me good-lookin' in girly stuff too, ~player~. I wonder which outfit of mine you like more...? Probably my birthday suit, knowin' you.
At least you're a good sport about it. Lucas doesn't like usin' PK Love on people, so he asked me to help 'em out.
You're pretty tough, ya know? Lucas told me he didn't want to use PK Love on you guys, so that's why I step in for Starstorm.
Yup! He was the main healer of our group, though he was no slouch in the power department, either. That kid can make give ya a nasty whack with that stick of his.
Oh yeah, he was always takin' care of healin' in our group. Like you said, he's no pushover, though. He can give a nasty bonk with that stick he carries around.
Sadly for my lil' monkey pal, I can't conjure up bananas. I can set things on fire, or freeze 'em, or zap 'em.
Heh! I've got a monkey friend who'd love some banana PSI, but mine's all about fightin' stuff with fire, ice, and lightning. That kinda thing.

Oh, fiddlesticks! Shoes harbor a true lady's soul, you know? I'm so upset I have to take them off...
*giggle*

Can you imagine a lady wearing boots? How silly! The only hike I take is going to the beauty salon before and after work!
*giggle*

You know, there used to be a few customers that were always staring at my shoes. I guess they were awestruck by my fashion, huh?
*giggle*

I don't think I'll be missing these too much. They get caught on things sometimes. It's led to a few unfortunate spills...
*giggle*

I didn't know the names of these cuffs until recently. I always called them "Wristy Bandy Thingies". Silly, right?
*giggle*

These look cute, but don't really do anything. They slide around sometimes, too. Kind of a pain in the as- er, pain in the asphalt!
*giggle*
I figured it'd be a little boring for you to see me strip the exact same outfit off as last time, ~player~. If variety is the spice of life, it probably applies to gettin' naked, too!
Pardon me for bein' forward, but you kinda caught my eye last time we did this, ~player~. I thought you might enjoy seein' me wear something eye-catchin', too!
The constant gigglin' I had to do back at Club Titiboo gave me heartburn, but what I really hated was wearin' this eyeshadow nonsense. Ugh.
It's been years since I last put on this girly makeup junk. I forgot how it takes forever to put on. No thanks, spanks!
You're a real cutie, ~player~, so I didn't mind puttin' this makeup on for ya as a special treat. I'd say it's time to wipe it off now, though. If I lose, I don't want it runnin' down my face.
I wonder how many of those factory-workin' idiots that came to Club Titiboo after work wondered what "Violet" looks like under her shirt... You're pretty lucky, ~player~!

You know, I used to get ogled by all kinds of perverts back when I was workin' as "Violet" at Club Titiboo. They'd probably be losin' their minds right now... if they had any in the first place, at least.
You'd be makin' a lot of people jealous, ~player~, if they knew you got to see "Violet" take her clothes off. I don't mind showin' off for you,though.
I will admit that this fru fru-ass bra is pretty damn comfy! It's soft. Not as soft as my honkers, but still!

One perk this bra has is that it keeps my perkiness comfortable!
...That was bad. I was tryin' to say it's soft and keeps my jigglies comfy.
Well, hey, now you can tell your buddies that your Valentine's Day ended with me takin' off my top for ya, ~player~.
Remember when I said there's no more surprises? Well... I might've, just slightly, blatantly lied.
I'm glad I'm not posin' as "Violet" anymore, because it's probably bad manners for a waitress to tell a little, white, tiny complete lie.
I feel like I'm forgettin' something... What is it...? Oh yeah! I might've fibbed earlier, ~player~.
...I was gonna make some kinda sock pun, but I don't really feel like makin' myself puke.
Y'know, knee-high socks like these ain't too bad! I wouldn't wear 'em to sleep in, but they're more comfy than I thought.
...Nope. You just can't make socks scary... unless you're Duster. Damn.
...Ain't much to say here. They're like my normal boots, but more orange. If I ever need to camouflage myself in a vat of orange juice, I'll break these out again.
Orange ain't a bad color. Not as cool as pink, but it still grabs your attention!

I wonder what kind of horror stories boots would tell if they could speak.
...Man, I gotta stop eatin' sweets before bed. The sugar makes my brain stupid.
(...Chirp.)
Never liked bracelets, but these things're pretty mean lookin', right? I think I get why bad guys tend to slap spikes on everything.
I kinda wish I had these back in the day. Rainbow gloves are neat as hell, but the spikes on these are just badass!
These aren't as deadly as that Chimera's bite, but you still don't want to step on 'em when you're goin' to the bathroom at night.

I ain't usin' Queso as an extra layer. He's my buddy, not some tool. Ain't that right?
(Chip Chirp!)

Queso is helpin' me out, but he ain't something to strip. He's a bird, not clothing.
(Chirp choop!)
...Since when do birds go "choop"?

Unlike the not-so-Ultimate Chimera, there's no button on the back of this hoodie. You can't turn me off, sorry!
...Unless you're eatin' cheese.
That Ultimate Chimera was pretty hardcore... but it didn't have many tricks up its sleeve. Probably because it didn't have those. Guess I'm like that too...
My spats are goin' down, again... Guess you guys have already figured me out. I've got no surprises left up my metaphorical sleeve..
Nothin' special this time around. You've already seen me do this before, ~player~... Sorry for borin' ya.
I'm glad I sent Queso over there. Didn't really need to hear what a bird has to say about these things floppin' out.
People never get tired of seein' these things, do they? Guess you need something warm 'n soft to hold on to when you're feelin' scared sometimes.
Guess I'm kind of a party pooper. Boobs ain't scary. To most people, anyway.
Guess I'll start by takin' off my boots. These look heavy, but kickin' is more Duster's thing.
Fashion ain't my... uh, style. I like these boots, though. They're comfortable and durable!
Despite bein' raised by a group of super divas, I don't care about looks enough to doll myself up. My boots are gettin' tossed first.
If ya couldn't tell, pink is my favorite color. Anyone who wants to mouth off about it lookin' girly will find these planted firmly up their ass, alright?
According to Duster, I'm what most folks call a "tomboy". I've just never cared about fashion n' all that crap. These boots are the only footwear I own, actually.
These boots are the only footwear I have. They're tough 'n reliable, so why would I need anything else? Fancy-schmancy ain't my thing.
Guess I gotta kiss this lil' pendant goodbye for now. I'm not one for fancy jewelry, but this pendant means a lot to me.
My Mom and Dad died when I was a lil' baby, and the Magypsies took me in, and did their best to raise me. This pendant here is a gift they gave me. That means nobody touches it, got it?
See this pendant, ~player~? This was given to me by the Magypsies. It's the only keepsake I have of them. I can trust you to not swipe it, yeah?
My Mom and Pop gave me this lil' pendant sometime before they died. Lucas also had a badge given to him by his parents, too. I bet most families have little keepsakes like these.
Are you curious 'bout my pendant, ~player~? The Magypsies say they found me wearin' this when they found me. Please, make sure nothin' happens to it, 'kay?
These gloves aren't accessories. They're actually my butt-kickin' tools of choice! After PSI, that is. Wait, would it be butt‑punchin' instead?
Ya know, I got some gloves that look way cooler than these ones, called the Mystic Gloves.They glow like a rainbow. I didn't think I needed to take my best pair to a nude bar, though.
Whenever I'm not usin' my PSI abilities in battle, I'm slappin' and sockin' bad guys with these bad boys here! Anyone who tries to swipe these gets frozen on the spot, capiche?
You know, these gloves are pretty tough. I'm always slingin' fire and ice magic all over the place, but it doesn't seem to rough 'em up at all.
Ugh. Whenever Alec is around, he always makes sure to spew some lame-ass pun about my gloves. He's Lucas' gramps, so I don't say anything, but damn is it annoying!
You know, I started wearin' these things when one of the Magypsies, Lydia, kept tryin' to get me to wear mittens. I kept cuttin' off part of em' off so my fingers were free.
Ya know, it feels kinda weird takin' this thing off...and not just 'cause I'm doin' it at a strip poker game! I'm pretty much always wearin' this thing.
Whelp, you guys are gettin' the good stuff off me. I wonder if you'll get to see any more...?
Cool hoodie, right ~player~? I made it myself. The Magypsies taught me how ta work needle and thread. I'm always gettin' scrapes, so knowin' how to repair my clothes comes in handy.
My adoptive parents, the Magypsies, are all a buncha divas, and are always dollin' themselves up with makeup n' crap like that. That just ain't me. This hoodie is the only outfit I really have.
I know I have pink hair, and have pink boots, but to tell ya the truth, ~player~, this hoodie bein' blue just feels right.
I guess you guys have earned this... but you're gonna have to try harder to see the rest!
Damn, I'm really startin' to run outta options here. Guess it's time to chuck these spats off to the side.

When I was younger, I used to run around with just my underoos on under my hoodie, but Ionia kept tellin' me it wasn't "modest", so I started wearin' these. I'm glad I did, 'cause it gave me an extra layer to use.
Ya know, these shorts are pretty damn comfy! The fabric they're made of is kinda stretchy, so I've been able to wear 'em even after some growth spurts! I kinda like how they show off my hips, too.
"Spats" is kinda a weird name for these shorts, ain't it? It makes me think of a spitoon, kinda like the one Duster stole from Osohe Castle, except that spitoon was all shiny n' crap.
When I was a young lil' squirt, I used to run around commando under this hoodie. My parents were none too pleased when they learned I was doin' that, and made me wear these.
I might not have an amazin' rack, but I do have a nice butt. These spats could really show that off... but you'd probably like the view without em' better.
'Guess I'm goin' topless now! I'm used to throwin' this thing off when I get some alone time anyway. It's just so damn restrictive!
While my boobs ain't huge, they're still bigger than I'd like. When they were smaller, I didn't have to wear one of these stupid bras.
You won't see me complain about throwin' this bra off. Never liked how damn hot they are. Don't even get me started on how irritatin' it feels to get crumbs in 'em too!
I don't mind throwin' this thing onto the pile, not gonna lie. I know they're here for support n' whatever, but it just feels way better to have 'em off.
Nah, I'm not embarrassed about showin' my chest. If guys can do it, why can't us gals? I enjoy the sight of a bare man chest, so I should be able to enjoy a nice pair of booba too!
I never liked how hot these things can make ya feel, so I'm kinda glad to chuck it off! You don't seem to mind either, ~player~. Bein' subtle ain't your strong suit, is it?
Maybe I should be more worried that I'm gettin' close to losin', but honestly, screw bras! They're just a pain in the butt. Not wearin' 'em is one of things I miss most about bein' a kid.
Heh... I hate to break it to you, ~player~, but I wore these girly-ass panties just to stay in the game a little longer! I normally go without 'em!
I don't really get why some people call this thing a "pussy". Hell, I've even heard it be called a sea otter by these two comedy-duo weirdos. Talk about a mood-killer.
Well, crap. The air's so heavy with romance that I gotta drop my drawers. How lovely.
Whelp! These prissy panties helped keep me in the game a little longer, so good thinkin', me!
Joke's on you guys! I would've been outta the game by now if I went commando, like I normally do!
Time to show you guys how we do nudity in Osohe Castle! ...We, uh, get naked. Like this.
I'm almost out, but don't count on me losin' just yet, buster! You've gotta earn it!
Sorry for what, Nat? If we're gettin' naked, we might as well do some flirtin' too. Amy seems fun, 'n you do too.
Yeah, I was kinda gettin' that impression, Amy. Explorin' that side of life is why I'm here, you know? You've got my attention, so hopefully I can keep yours.
Uh... Yeah, actually, I can imagine it. I can imagine you 'n ~player~, you 'n Amy, and you 'n me! Any and all combinations would be a fun time.
I don't care much for fancy jewelry, but this thing means a lot to me. I don't have much inside my seashell house either, Amy. Do you just like livin' simple-like?
Awww... Ain't that sweet, ~player~? I'm bettin' they both think of you the same way... Even if they don't like showin' it.
I think you should be imaginin' what you'll sound like while I work my magic on ya! I bet I could make ya squeal.
I haven't had two pretty ladies complimentin' me like this before! You two are great catches, too!
Well, yeah. Ain't the thrill of danger part of the appeal? Also, I've never felt guilty masturbatin' before...
You, uh... You feelin' alright, Amy? I'm guessin' you were thinkin' steamy thoughts, but I don't want you passin' out or somethin'.
Haw! You were settin' up a line with that! You're a riot, Amy. I'm glad I got to meet ya!
Nah, you're totally the kinda girl I'd like, Natsuki. Imagine the two of us gettin' intimate, while seein' ~player~ takin' care of Amy. I know I'm into it!
I've got quite the sweet tooth, Amy, so I'm bettin' I taste real sweet. I wonder how well you can keep tastin' me while I'm workin' my own tongue on ya...

condition.saying: (<i>J-just treat it like one of those yuri manga

case.state: Heh. I'd say she's likin' that idea, if that blush is tellin' us anything.
I'm not sure he knows what he's getting himself into. Well, us, obviously, but I wonder if he can handle it...
I'd say it's an outright death wish. Besides the obvious, I doubt he knows what he's gettin' himself into...
Oh yeah? I wish there was a gauntlet layin' around, so I could put it on and then throw it down! I'm not leavin' here unfulfilled either, ~hu_tao~.
Throwin' down the invisible gauntlet, I see! I came to this place with one goal in mind, ~hu_tao~. You bet your goofy butt that I'm not leavin' here unsatisfied either!
Hey, I'm just lookin' for new experiences. How about we work together instead of fightin'? I'll even let ya keep 'em.
I kinda get the feelin' you're playin' the long-game here, Hooter. I'm just lookin' for some fun, new memories to make. If we work together, I'll let ya keep 'em.
You're one silver-tongued fox, you know that? I'll give your offer some thought, Puddin'!
You really are sweet as pudding, ain't ya? Let me think your offer over, Puddin'!
I'm not buyin' that was an "accident", but I'm flattered all the same. You've still gotta earn it.
Come on, you can't just call a clown a "New Age Retro Hippie" and expect me to believe ya. I'm flattered, though!
Then why are ya dressed like the most heavily-armed 'n paranoid astronaut? You're sendin' me mixed signals, here.
...You're the master of the mixed message, you know that? If you weren't lookin' for trouble, then why did you come here in an astronaut's version of a tank?
We beat him, Meia. He can't harm anyone ever again. Thing is, there's always gonna be someone like that. It's up to all of us to stop 'em when they show their ugly faces.
He lost, Meia. Me 'n my friends beat him. Bastards like that always show themselves at one point or another... and so does someone who fights back!

There's not a manual on it, ~meia~. It seems to me that PSI can be awakened in times of great stress or danger.
...Or a hotspring.
The Magypsies never gave me their copy of "PSI For Nerds", ~Meia~. From what I've seen, it usually is "activated" when you're in danger, or dangerously emotional.
You don't beat around the bush, huh? That's exactly the kinda girl I'd want sittin' in my lap, you know...?
Vision? Pyro? You mean PSI? I know you're baitin' me here, lady.
"Aiya" my butt... Now you're tryin' to confuse me by throwin' out random words. I can use PSI. What of it?
Uh, yeah? That look in your eye is tellin' me you've got some kinda history with it.
Summer is when the sun burns its brightest 'n hottest! Sounds like a fittin' name for you, ~natsuki~.
I dunno, it sounds like a pretty badass name to me! Summer brings the heat, like you!
You ain't far off the mark, ~natsuki~. I've always been active, hikin', runnin', and fightin'!
What can I say, ~natsuki~? I'm scrappy! I'm always hikin' and explorin', too!
Everybody gets somethin' like this, at some point. Somethin' that's more valuable to ya than any trinket. You will too.
Pffft. Don't worry, Homegirl. I'm not gonna report ya to the language police.
This game is pretty raunchy as-is, don't you think, Homegirl? What's the harm in swearin'?
You know, I'm glad I came up with "Homegirl" as a nickname for you, Sakura. You're just about the sweetest lady I've ever met.
I agree, Sakura. That "Homegirl" nickname just keeps gettin' more 'n more fitting. You're a good person, you know that?
You kiddin'? That's why this game exists, you know! Besides, you 'n ~player~ keep oglin' each other, so what's the harm in including me?
Is that so? You've already been oglin' ~player~, so it'd be rude to leave me out, right?
Pfft! So much for that conversation. I'm not gonna lie though, Hooter: You're plenty hot yourself! Your eyes are cool lookin', too!
Heh. Stayin' on-topic isn't your thing, huh? I'm bettin' you taste spicy too, Hooter! I like your eyes, too.
Pffft! Is smooth-talkin' Leon gettin' shy?
Awww! Seein' a smooth-talker like you gettin' flustered is adorable.
Talkin' about zombies gets ya in the flirtin' mood, huh? Kinda weird, but I'll take it!
That's kind of a huge topic change, ain't it? If that gets ya to flirt, though, I'm not gonna complain!
...Thanks, ~natsuki~. You, uh, might wanna work on your delivery.
...I know I said I'm no comedian earlier, but... Ya shouldn't explain your jokes. Kinda kills 'em when ya do.
Oh-ho! You've already been seducin' ~player~ with your charms, huh? I knew you had it in ya!
Snnnrk! Oh, man! She's sayin' that like she's heard it before! You must be one hell of a smooth-talker, ~player~.
Believe it or not, pink's my natural hair color. If I keep suckin' at poker like this, I'll show ya some proof!
Ha! Play your cards right, pal, n' maybe I can give ya a new favorite color!
You know what they say about guys with big hands, ~leon~...
I assume you know the ol' saying about men with big hands, right...?
Is that so...? What might that be, hmmm?
I'm pretty damn sure this makes me an idiot, but... Somehow, I feel like I can trust ya on that. You're not so bad, Hooter.
I'm probably a dumbass for believin' in a death-obsessed weirdo, but I feel like you can be trusted, Hooter. You're not so bad after all.
I guess you could even say it's like writin'! If ya don't practice, you start puttin' out crap. Just imagine that with the added bonus of settin' stuff on fire.
Well, if you don't keep writin', your ability to write non-garbage decreases. PSI just has the perk of also blowin' stuff up.
Well, there was a big ol' castle back home, but it was old, fallin' apart, and infested with spiders, party animal ghosts, and haunted paintings.
We did have Osohe Castle, but it was dusty, moldy, crumblin', and infested with party-lovin' ghosts, stinky ghosts, spiders and killer paintings.
Alright, nice! Props to you for stickin' it where the sun don't shine! Metaphorically, I mean.

I knew you were a go-getter, ~jim~. Nice job shovin' your boot right up their asses!
...Not literally, though. That'd be weird.
Okay, that's something I've heard of. They tried to get me to use those doohickeys at my waitress job. I told 'em to shove it.
Computers, huh? I think that's what they wanted me to use to seat people when I was workin' as a Club Titiboo waitress. No thanks.
Heh! You sure about that? I have a tendency to talk smack after givin' a smack-down. A boring hero guy wouldn't rub it in.
Ha! I dunno, ~mari_setogaya~. I like to rub a lil' salt in the wound when I win. At least a boring hero guy wouldn't make fun of ya for losin'!
Messin' with the natural order of things is for dumbasses, tyrants, 'n dumbass tyrants.
People tryin' to meddle with nature is a crappy-tastin' recipe for disaster. Tyrannical idiots are usually the ones tryin' to do that.

Pffft!
Yup! Every princess worth their snooty, fancy salt knows about the posterior stick. What kinda barbarian are ya?

(Oh my god.)
What, you never heard of the sacred, dainty posterior stick? Any ol' princess knows what those are. And you call me the fake one...
...Yeah, the first thing they teach ya in Genuine Princess For Real School is to never laugh like that. You should try not doin' that.
Alright, lemme give you some advice. A princess never cackles like that. That's basically the first thing they teach ya at Actual Princess I Swear School.
That little monkey is one tough nut cookie. He probably would've beat up that bastard all by himself 'n saved his monkey girlfriend without that collar on 'em.
Not that Salsa was weak 'n helpless. The collar was the only thing holdin' him back from savin' himself 'n his girly monkey.
Heh, thanks. Fashion ain't even close to bein' my passion, but I do like havin' my boots match my hair.
I'll admit that it feels pretty nice to hear ya say that. You couldn't pay me to worry about what outfit I'm wearin', but I've always liked havin' my boots 'n hair match.
Yeah, you're right. It's more of a memento from my birth parents. Wearin' it makes me feel like they're always with me.
Yup. This was a gift from my birth parents. Wearin' it means they're always with me.

condition.saying: The more we progress through this game

case.state: Are you tellin' me I'm not the fanciest, frufru-ass princess that you've ever met? You wound me, madam.
I'll have you know I'm overflowin' with refined manners 'n all that crap, madam.
You're not offendin' me, kid. I'm just here to have a good time, 'n I bet you are, too. Gettin' naked won't be any fun if you're scared of me the whole game.
Don't sweat it, kid. We're just here to have a good time 'n see each other naked, right? It won't be any fun seein' my boobs out if you're scared of me.
...You can't turn it off? Uh, yikes. I don't think I'd want to hear everyone's desires or whatever all the time. You need better headphones, lady.
...Not gonna lie, that sounds like torture. You need better ear muffs, 'cause there's some messed up people out there with messed up "desires" or whatever.
PSI's a little different. Once your potential is "awakened," you can use it whenever you want! It all comes from the mind.
You need "tomes," huh? PSI's more convenient. Once you have your potential "awakened," you're good to go! You just think, 'n blast stuff with your mind!
Wow. Cut right to the chase, huh? I like it. I'd say your chances are lookin' good!
Ha! I gotta respect someone who's not afraid to tell people what they want. Let's just say ball's in your court.
Dunno what kind of retirement plan covers that, but who cares? Anyone who says a lady can't take pleasure in her work need to get the stick outta their ass.
Heh! Not sure what other job uses those skills, but don't let that stop ya! Takin' pride in your work ain't a crime. Anyone who says otherwise can jump in lava.

...What's the big deal? It's not an insult. Men just tend to be a little rougher around the edges, y'know?
...Well, no, you don't, huh?
...Don't get your bodysuit in a bunch, ~meia~. Men just tend to be rough-'n-tumble types. It's not a put down. Not that I could blame ya, considerin'...
I'm not sure if you're offerin' to give me lessons, or to get your own fingers up into my business. Either way works for me, I guess!
Gotta be honest with ya, ~mari_setogaya~, I'm not sure if you're wantin' to teach me how to get laid, or if you're wanting to lay with me. I'm fine with either way!
Pft! Do I look "old-timey" to you? You could be teachin' me what I'm supposed to do to Prince Charmin' once he serenades me. Save the romantic crap for later.
Heh! I don't think "old fashioned" suits me, lady. Maybe if you teach me the ropes, I'll be sweepin' someone else off their feet.
...It's not happenin', like... right here, is it? I'd like to take it somewhere else, at least...
Er, you don't mean right here on the floor, do ya? Somewhere a little less public would be better, don't ya think?
It is what it is. Everything worked out in the end, and now I have all the time in the world to suck at poker.
Hey, it's not so bad. After all, I have the freedom to waste time 'n lose at poker now. I'd say that's a good enough end to that story.
Fair enough! Tryin' out new things is what keeps life from gettin' all stale.
Heh! True! Life gets all crusty 'n musty without changin' things up sometimes, y'know?
You've got spunk, ~hilda~. I'm likin' that determined twinkle in your eye!
Heh! You've got some fire in your belly, ~hilda~. You've got more spunk than I thought!

Somethin' about the way you said that is vaguely disturbin', but hey, I'm always happy to meet a fellow psychic!
...That isn't tryin' to kill me, anyway.
Well, as long as you're not tryin' to explode my brain, it's nice to meet ya, ~cheryl~. Even if you are givin' me low-key disturbin' vibes.
Oh my, Heather. How forward of you. You've got my attention...
Is that so...? I wonder what kind of ideas are floatin' around in that noggin of yours...
...It's not easy. I know, believe me. But... that makes it worth doin'. I'm glad we're doin' this together, ~meia~.
...As one lady to another, I get it. I'm glad we've met, ~meia~. Makes it more meaningful to do it with someone who understands, right?
George? Never met ‘em. Maybe he used to play strip poker with the Magypsies or somethin’. They were pretty old.
That name’s not ringin’ any bells. The Magypsies have been around for a long-ass time, so maybe they knew that guy back in the day.
Cross who with what now? I’ve met Dr. Andonuts, at least. Dude loves trash cans. Kinda weird, now that I think about it.
Man with dungeon…? Dunno what that means, but I know who Dr. Andonuts is. The trash can scientist, yeah?
...Ah. That’s your play, then. If you were stopped before, you can be stopped again. Maybe by a pink–haired PSI slinger, even.
Hm. You’ve lost once, pal. You can lose again. Who knows? Maybe I’ll be the one to kick your ass this time.
...Porky. You know Porky. Why do you know Porky? That idiot couldn’t have come up with time travel technology on his own… Did you give it to him?!
..Ain’t nothin’ “perfect” about that guy. Given how everything played out, I’d say he played you for a pawn, Giygas.
...You were just another toy for him to use, huh? Discarded with, like all the rest. That’s how it always is with Porky…
...By making me take my tits out? Great plan, genius.
You can't take over the planet if I have my clothes on? How... cunning.
Reminder that it’s your fault that happened, buster. Thanks for nothin’.
Yeah, ‘n who had the bright idea to give that lardy lunatic all that power, huh?
Psssh! Whatever you say, ~natsuki~. You were gettin' hot 'n bothered by ~player~ standin' over there, I'm sure.
What's wrong with starin' at pretty ladies gettin' pretty naked? Live a little!
Still, I'm glad I wore 'em here. It let's me tease ya just a bit longer.
They're lettin' me keep the good covered just a little bit longer, though. What's the fun of a strippin' game without a little tease?
No panties this time! You looked a lil' heartbroken in the last game we played.
I figured you might've missed seein' this, so I skipped the panties. Pretty generous, you know?
Heh. That cute expression you're makin'... Don't change it, 'kay? I wanna remember it for a long time...
I'm sure this reveal isn't super excitin' for you, ~player~. Still, it felt like a good idea. I'm more used to nothin' under my spats anyway.
No panties this time! Pretty sneaky, right, ~player~? It's more comfortable this way.
Be glad you don't have to wear panties, ~player~. They ain't very comfortable.

There we go! All done! I'm already feeling naked without my precious shoes.
*giggle*

In the spirit of sportsmanship, I took off two things this time. Don't expect that to keep happening, though!
*giggle*

I wonder if this fine establishment has a spa room. Nothing beats the feeling of soaking your feet after a long day of work!
*giggle*

All done~! I hope that wasn't too wild for you fine folks.
*giggle*

There were plenty of customers at Club Titiboo who would've loved to see "Violet" lose her clothes. Keep this a secret between us, okay ~player~?
*giggle*

I don't want things getting too wild. It just wouldn't be proper, right?
*giggle*
I think I'll keep my hair up like this, though. It's for Valentine's Day, after all!
Don't worry though, ~player~. I'm gonna keep my hair up all nice 'n girly for ya. Just don't expect me to start wearin' it every day.
Whew! I don't know how so many ladies can wear that crap 24/7. No thanks! Oh, but I'm keepin' my hair like this for ya, ~player~. Ain't I a sweetheart?
Ahhhh~! That's better. That skirt's way heavier than it looks! Wearin' it all day is a workout.
Wow! I kinda forget how heavy that damn skirt is until I take it off! I used to have to wear it every single day, too...
Man... That's a relief. If anyone tells ya that this uniform is comfortable, don't trust 'em with your bank account or something. They're liars!
Bam! Even my bra is frilly 'n girly! You can't say I didn't go all out for this outfit, ~player~.
Like the new bra, ~player~ 'n the rest of you fine folks? I went the extra mile for Valentine's Day.
I hope you're likin' the bra, ~player~. I sure as hell don't! I don't like wearin' normal-ass bras, much less frilly ones like these.
What's that look for? They haven't changed since the last time you saw them, ya know.
...I'm glad you wanted to play with me again, ~player~. I really mean that.
All jokes aside, I'm really happy that you wanted to see me again, ~player~. It means a lot.
Heh! At least normal-ass Kumatora is still pretty awesome! Let's get goin' already!
I don't need fancy costumes to still be tough 'n scary, you know! Let's keep rollin'!
I don't care about dressin' up, but... I'll admit that I was pretty proud of that costume, ~player~. Hoped you liked it. Knucklehead.
The Boots of Evil have been beat up n' defeated, so let's kick off the next round!
Alright. Toss 'em in the pile. Let's go!

You shook me right outta my boots!
...Ow. My entire body seized up a little. You know you made a bad joke when your own body is disgusted...

You're chippin' away at my outfit, but the best bits are still on me!
(Cheep?)
Yeah, you're one of 'em, little dude.
Alright, let's get back to it. You haven't scared me yet!
Oh no, my hands are baaaaaare! Make sure grandma ain't watchin'! She might just pass out from the scandal.

Thanks for hangin' out with me, Queso. See ya back home.
(Cheep!)
I, uh, don't know if they'd sell booze to a bird. Can't hurt to try, though.

See you around, little man.
(Cheep cheep!)
Yeah, I'm sure the ladies will dig the little hat. It worked with Flint, y'know.

Take it easy, Queso! I'll give ya some snacks later.
(Cheep!)
Uh... I don't think ice cream on pizza sounds very good, but whatever floats your feathered boat.
-Pffft, nope! Not wearin' panties this time around! Bet ya weren't expectin' that. Somethin' tells me it's not fear you're feelin' right now, though.
-Sike! No underwear this time! It wouldn't be any fun if I didn't mix things up a bit.
Bam! How'dya like them bottomless apples? I'm more used to goin' commando under the spats anyways.
Yup. Here they are! There's nothin' special about 'em in this costume, but who cares? Not everything has to be themed around somethin'.
...Heh. Whippin' the girls out still makes my heart race a little bit. I like this game.
...Nope! Still not used to gettin' stared at. It ain't all bad, though...
I might not be doin' too well, but I ain't gonna give up! Both my teammates and my enemies have described me as "annoyingly persistent", ya know.
Losin' at the game sucks on ice, but... Wait, that's kind of a weird expression, ain't it?
I hope you like what you see, ~player~. Not many people get to see "Princess" Kumatora sans her hoodie!
I've never been one of those kinda girls who obsesses over their looks, but I like to imagine I ain't hard on the eyes. How do I look?
I'm guessin' my defense is takin' a huge hit from sheddin' all these clothes off. Eh, I prefer dishin' it out anyway!
Whelp. As naked as the day I was born. Or so I'm told, anyway. If you try to tell me you can remember the day you were born, you're a liar.
Down to my last hit point! I still got some fuel left in the tank, n' I don't plan on makin' this easy for ya!
I won't whine 'bout bein' naked. It was my own piss-poor playin' that got me here, after all.
If a kid like Lucas managed to tame a freakin' Drago, I think I can handle bein' a little underdressed.
Well, here I am, standin' here in the nude. ...How do I look?
Yeesh, that was some pretty damn awful poker playin' on my part. Guess you guys earned this! I make for a decent sight, I hope...
Okay, that's done. You guys want a slightly unclean, not very tasty nut cookie or somethin'?
Man, I wear these things so often that I forget how heavy these dang boots are! Maybe that's why I'm not as quick as Boney or Duster...
Ya know, these lil' bastards are pretty bulky, but I wear 'em so much that I sometimes forget to take em' off when I go to bed. My feet feel so damn naked now...
If you're one of those foot lovin' weirdos, just know I ain't shamin' your weird, bizarre kinks.
Now that I've kicked off my boots, it's time to step it up a notch! ... I think that burned my soul a little...
Just some minor damage, nothin' more. I don't think we need to bust out the healin' PSI quite yet.
Just 'cause I'm gloveless doesn't mean I can't smack the crap outta ya.
I'm sure watchin' me remove my gloves was real excitin', but let's deal the next hand already!
...Can't say I have much stunnin' commentary to give 'bout takin' my gloves off. You want me to say a pun or somethin'?
Am I makin' any of you guys drool in excitement yet? Maybe takin' my gloves off was too risqué for this place to handle.
Nobody lays their grubby mitts on these... uh, mitts, got it?
I'm now marginally more naked than I was a second ago. Real excitin', I'm sure.
Alright, it's off. If this is missin' when the game's over, I'm gonna have a lil' chat with each n' every one of you guys, got it?
I'm real glad Duster found it on the floor back at Osohe Castle. I can't believe I dropped the damn thing...
Nobody gets their grubby mitts on my pendant. We clear on that?
I'm trustin' you guys to not touch this, alright? If ya try, I'll have to knock some teeth outta your noggin.
Unlike Lucas' Franklin Badge, this doesn't reflect lightning. Keep that in mind if ya get the bright idea to swipe it.
Just a reminder that my PSI power's ain't for show. Try to remember that if you feel the sudden urge to touch my necklace.
Yup, I'm wearin' panties, too! It ain't as comfortable, but I'm tryin' to win, ya know.
Man, I'm glad I decided to wear underwear under the spats...
Try not to get too excited over there, ~player~. I'm gonna get ya naked in no time!
I wasn't the biggest waitress at Club Titiboo, but I think I've got plenty to work with, don't ya think?
I'm sure plenty of people would've liked to see me workin' topless like this. They're missin' out!
Not too shabby, right, ~player~? They're a bit bigger than I'd like, but that doesn't seem to bother you any.
Maybe things'll go in my favor now! I find these things make good distractions in clothes, so they must be deadly outta 'em!
Not too bad, right? I'm plannin' on takin' a good look at all of you guys when ya shed your clothes, so I won't mind too much if ya wanna take a look too.
Heh! I thought that might change your tune. Keep choppin' trees with that axe of yours. It's badass and gives ya a workout!
Nothing worth havin' comes easily, you know. Life would be pretty boring is there wasn't any challenge in it.
Hey there, big guy. Is there any chance you're related to a guy named Leder? He's massive, and rarely speaks. You're... actually suspiciously similar...

You're pretty damn tall, ~player~! It's hard to impress me with height, since there's a dude named Leder back home, who's sole job is to stand around, and sometimes ring a bell. He's like...20 feet tall!
I ain't short, but I sure as hell feel like it next to you, ~player~! 'Course, you're not exactly Leder levels of giant, but hell, who is ?
Geez, ~player~. Bein' so tall 'n quiet makes you look like Leder's kid! He's the bell ringer in Tazmily Village, and his sacred duty of standing around bein' tall is what he's famous for!
Ya know, I don't think I've ever seen a guy with pink hair before. The only people who have it are myself n' the Magypsies.
Well, look what we've got here! A new member of the Stylin' Pink Hair Club! You weren't raised in a seashell house, were ya?
Heh. Nice hair, ~player~. The pinker your hair, the bigger the butt you kick! It's pure science.
Your name's ~player~, right? Nice to meetcha. You seem a lil' bum-like, but the other bum-lookin' guy I know is cool, so somethin' tells me we'll get along.
~player~'s up. I can't tell if you're the strong n' silent type, like Flint, or just shy, like Lucas. Either way, I'm lookin' forward to gettin' to know ya.
Nice to meetcha, ~player~. I got the feelin' that we'll get along just fine. It doesn't hurt that you're kinda good lookin', too.
Your name's ~player~, right? That's kind of a cool name. I feel like I've heard it somewhere before...
You're really not much of a talker, are ya? Nothin' wrong with that. I'd prefer a quiet, cool guy over someone who's mouth never stops makin' noise.
I do feel kinda bad for ya, ~player~... but watchin' a cute guy get naked in a hurry ain't exactly "torture", either.
Are you tryin' to tell me my flirtin' is workin' its magic, ~player~? I'm flattered.
Heh! You're just the guy I was hopin' would have a losin' streak, ~player~.
Whoa! I knew my flirtin' worked on most of the men at Club Titiboo, but none of 'em started rippin' their clothes off, ~player~!
You know, ~player~, I wonder how fast you'd be takin' your clothes off for me if it was just the two of us...
Yikes. Sorry, ~player~. That's gotta be frustratin'.
Just try to stick to pairs, man! Don't go chasin' the flushes or whatever hocus-pocus they're called.
Hey, I know you're not into ladies, ~player~. I'm into guys, though. Am I still allowed to enjoy lookin' at ya?
Keep your chin up, dude! One little stroke of bad luck ain't gonna kill ya, probably! Most likely!
One strategy to keep in mind is to... actually look at your cards, ~player~. Just a suggestion.
Mmph... I'm glad I got to meet a proper gentleman like yourself, ~player~. Thanks for givin' me more 'n more to look at!
I bet you're not trying to do this for my benefit, ~player~, but I appreciate it all the same.
Mmmm... Oh, it's you again, ~player~? It's like you read my mind....
Hahaha! Is somethin' distracting ya, ~player~? Too bad!
Wow, even more from ~player~? I'm so for that, frankly! Honestly! Bluntly, even!
Oof. This is like watchin' a car crash in slow motion, ~player~. Tough luck.
Okay, whatever strategy you're usin' sucks, ~player~. Try switchin' gears!
You know you're supposed to keep your clothes on, right?
Nope! That's not a good hand either, buddy. Try again!
Ain't you sweet, ~player~? I thought I was gonna be at disadvantage tonight, bein' new to poker 'n all. Who says chivalry is dead?
I bet you and Lucas would get along, ~player~. He's pretty quiet, like you, but a damn tough kid. Don't tell him I called him "kid", though. He hates that. Not that it stops me.
You know, this ain't the kinda place I'd expect to meet shy types like you, ~player~. I guess you're not too shy then, huh?

Alright, this is kinda a weird question, but are you a cheese kinda guy, or a "cheese is literally the devil" kinda guy? Back home, it always seemed ya either love it, or hate it. I ain't a fan, honestly.
I wonder if you have any PSI potential, ~player~... Lucas had plenty, 'n he was a quiet guy too.
That expression on your face... it's the expression of someone who has some strippin' to do! Hop to it!
The Magypsies lived in these big, pink seashell houses. I live in one of 'em now. Maybe you'd like to see it sometime...?
Heehee! You looked kinda sad when I took off my spats. Don't worry, I don't have anything else under my bra or panties! You've gotta beat me first, though...
Yeah, yeah, ladies first 'n all that crap... but I'd much rather get a good look at you, ~player~.
Close, but no cigar, man! ...No, seriously, no cigars. I hated havin' to smell that crap at the Club...
I wonder which of us is gonna lose first, hm? Who knows, maybe we'll even have to forfeit together...
Hey, handsome. It looks like you're up to bat. What're you gonna show me, hmm?
Say... Do you have a significant other, ~player~? No reason, of course.
You'd think these spats would be uncomfortable 'cause they're so... form fitting. Luckily for you, I find 'em comfortable.
I've seen you lookin' at me, ~player~... It's only fair you give little ol' me somethin' to stare at, too...
I'm not used to havin' my heart race when lookin' at someone, you know? I wonder how fast it'll beat when I get to see more of you...
Tazmily is a quiet, humble little place. Like you, I guess! What's your hometown like, ~player~?
Growin' up with the Magypsies wasn't always easy, ~player~. They spent at least four hours applyin' makeup to their face. Every day! Ugh...
Since losin' my pendant is sort of, partially 100% your fault, ~player~, I'm expectin' something good!
You know, a quiet guy like you would make a great thief! My friend Duster has mastered the Thief Arts. Maybe he'd teach ya!
You know, ~player~, that pendant of mine doesn't just have sentimental value to me. It also gives my PSI a lil' boost!
Do ya like kickass music, ~player~? You should come see DCMC with me sometime! Nobody can get a crowd of people hyped like those dudes can.
Hmm? What's that glowy thing in your hand, ~player~? I've seen you look at it a couple of times. It's not a tiny happy box, is it?! Trust me ~player~, those things are bad news!
Call it a hunch, but I get the feelin' this ain't your first rodeo, ~player~. Do you wrangle... uh, naked bulls often...? This metaphor isn't workin'.
My pal Lucas makes crazy-good omelettes! His Mom made 'em even crazier and good-er, he says. You should try 'em sometime.
Looks like that's you again, ~player~. Let your body do the talkin'! Unless you're takin' somethin' lame off. Ya weenie.
I hope you know that you bein' quiet isn't gonna stop me from talkin' to ya, ~player~. You seem nice!
You've gotten my royal boots off, so I expect somethin' great in return.
Oof, bad luck. For you, anyway. The rest of us are eager to see whatcha got!
It ain't wise to rush into danger without a plan, ~player~. That's got nothin' to do with this game, though.
Oh, nice! ~player~ lost! Are you gonna blow our socks off?! ...I guess I'd have to have some for that, though...
Sorry, ~player~! That's the way the strippin' cookie... uh, strips! I guess! Whatever!
Heh! I think flirtin' works best when we're both losin' our clothes, don't you agree?
I bet lots of the guys who came to Club Titiboo would be jealous, ~player~... They never got to see "Violet" lookin' this underdressed.
I like ya, ~player~... That's why I want you to lose. Sorry!
Do you like the size of my bazoobles, ~player~? I think they're big enough to notice, while small enough to not get in the way.
Whelp, you've clearly-nn! -Clearly beat me to the punch. Give me somethin' to- Ah! -Look at!
That's a nice spot... Oh, it's ~player~. Unf... mmm! Don't mind me over here.
O-oh, it's ~player~! H-hey, give me somethin' nice to look at? I'm givin' you a show, after all!
Yeah, c'mon! Show me- oh! -Show me what you're made of, ~player~! I like what I've seen so far...
Ahn... Ah! R-remind me to take some poker lessons after this. Maybe you could teach me, ~player~. Mmmf...
Heh! You won't be seein' my work my "magic" on myself quite yet. Show me somethin' good!
You've already got the one-and-only Kumatora naked. You might as well try 'n get her to lose, right?
I'm fine with lettin' you see me naked, ~player~, so you better be fine with lettin' me see you naked.
Heh! So close, yet so far! Like TaneTane Island... Actually, let's not think about that hellhole...
That's you, good-lookin'. I'll be watchin' very carefully now!
This would've been kinda nice to see a bit earlier, but better late than never... or whatever.

Back in Osohe Castle, I had to fight these ghosts, and hoo boy, did they stink! I wonder if they smelled back in life, or the afterlife is just gross or somethin'.

I hope you don't have too many more of those left, dude. I can be patient... but I don't wanna be!
Man, I'm gettin' thirsty. What kinda drinks do they have around here, anyways?

There's this little frog with a car burnin' rubber around Tazmily! I love watchin' him do tiny donuts.

Oh yeah, now I'm gettin' hot 'n heavy.
Does anyone know what you're supposed to do with a Dolphin Ossicle? They keep washin' up on Tazmily's beach.
How lewd. No wonder this place has such a long waitin' list.
Next round! Let's go! Onward! Forward! Other similar words!

...Damn. I was tryin' to think of a joke, but I was never much of a comedian. Usually, everythin' else goin' on around me is weird enough that I didn't have to make jokes myself.
